en: Marisa Limon, senior director of advocacy and planning at the Hope Border Institute, said advocates began learning about expulsions of Cubans and Nicaraguans from El Paso on Monday and later confirmed the new practice with U.S. officials.
nya: A Marisa Limon, mkulu woyang'anila kulimbikitsa ndi kukonzekera ku Bungwe lotchedwa, Hope Border Institute , anati olimbikitsawa anayamba kudziwa za kusamutsidwa kwa anthu a ku Cuba ndi ku Nicaragua kuchokera kwa El Paso lolemba ndipo anatsimikiza mchitidwe watsopanowu ndi akuluakulu a boma la America.
mt0: <pad> Marisa Limon, mkulu woyang'anira kampeni ndi kupanga ku Hope Border Institute, adati oyang'anira ntchito za chilungamo adayamba kudziwa za kubweretsa anthu aku Cuba ndi Nicaragua ku El Paso Lolemba ndipo kenako adatsimikizira zochita zachilendo izi ndi ma U.S. officials.</s>

en: Limon said the administration is "trying to get every last bit out of Title 42" before it expires. She called it "sobering" but consistent with the administration's efforts to have other countries in the Western hemisphere take more responsibility for hosting people fleeing their homes.
nya: A Limon anati  utsogoleri wawo ukuyesetsa kudziwa mapeto onse a mutu 42 usanasiye kugwira ntchito. Iwo anaufotokoza kuti ndi wanzeru koma pakuyenera kuti atsogoleri aziikilako khama kuti maiko ena a kumadzulo kwa dziko lapansi akhalenso ndi udindo wosunga anthu othawa kwawo.
mt0: <pad> Limon anati boma "likufuna kupeza chinthu chilichonse chomaliza kuchokera ku Article 42" musanathe. Iye adanena kuti ndi "zovuta kwenikweni" koma zogwirizana ndi zomwe boma likuyesera kuti mayiko ena mu hemisphere yakum'mawa azitha kutenga ntchito zambiri pothandiza anthu amene akuthawira mdziko lawo.</s>

en: Mexico Relocates Migrant Camp; Haitians Appear at Border
nya: Boma la Mexico lasamutsa misasa ya anthu osamukira mu dzikolo; anthu aku  Haiti aonekera pa malire a dziko.
mt0: <pad> Mexico isintha kampu ya anthu omwe akuyenda; a Haitians abwera pa mzere wa dziko lawo</s>

en: Mexican authorities said Tuesday they have relocated a migrant camp that sprung up in a park in the border city of Reynosa, moving about 2,000 people from Central America and Haiti to a shelter in the city, across the border from McAllen, Texas.
nya: Akuluakulu a boma la Mexico lachiwiri amati asamutsa msasa wa  anthu olowa mu dzikolo omwe unatulukira ku ndime  mu mzinda wa malirewo wa  Reynosa,  asuntha pafupifupi anthu mazana awiri kuchoka pakati pa Boma la america ndi Haiti kupita ku malo  ena owasungilako  kuolokera ku malire ochokera ku McAllen Texas.
mt0: <pad> Akuluakulu a ku Mexico adanena pa Chitatu kuti asintha malo okhalapo anthu omwe anali kubwera kuchokera ku Central America ndi Haiti, amene anali kubwera kuchokera ku Texas.</s>

en: The camp of migrants mainly from Guatemala, El Salvador, Honduras and Haiti sprung up after U.S. officials, citing the pandemic, invoked a health rule that denies migrants a chance to seek asylum.
nya: Malo okhala anthu osamukila dzikolo makamaka ochokera ku dziko la Guatemala, El Salvador, Honduras ndi ku Haiti kunachuluka anthu pamene akuluakulu a boma la America  anabweretsa lamulo la zaumoyo loletsa anthu osamukira mu dzikolo kupeza mwayi wopatsidwa chitetezo chifukwa cha mliri.
mt0: <pad> Camp ya anthu omwe ndi nzika zaku Guatemala, El Salvador, Honduras ndi Haiti inabuka pambuyo pa akuluakulu a US, poyambilira pofotokoza za matenda, kukhazikitsa lamulo la zaumoyo lomwe limakaniza anthu amene akufuna chitetezo cha mthupi kuti apeze asylum.</s>

en: Mexico's National Immigration Institute said the migrants were taken around midnight Monday to the shelter, which it said will have better hygiene and food services.
nya: Bungwe loona zolowa ndi kutuluka kwa anthu mu dziko la Mexico lotchedwa ( Mexico's Immigration Institute linati  anthuwo anatengedwa lolemba pakati pa usiku kupita ku malo owasungilawo amene akuyenera kukhala a ukhondo komanso chakudya chabwino.
mt0: <pad> Institute ya National Immigration ku Mexico yati anthu amenewa adatenga nawo mbali m'nyumba ya chitetezo yomwe idzakhala ndi utumiki wabwino wa hygiene ndi chakudya.</s>

en: But on Monday, people in another border city, Nuevo Laredo, said hundreds of migrants, mainly Haitians, have streamed into that city, which is across the border from Laredo, Texas
nya: Lolemba lomwelo anthu ochokera ku malire a dziko a ku Nuevo Laredo anafotokoza kuti anthu opitilira makumi khumi makamaka a dziko la Haiti anakhamikira mu mzindawo umene uli mbali yoyang'anana ndi malire a dzikolo kochokera ku Laredo, Texas
mt0: <pad> Koma m'mzinda wina wa dziko la Mexican, Nuevo Laredo, anthu akuti mazana a anthu omwe ali ndi ufulu wosamukira ku America, makamaka a Haiti, adalowa m'mzindawu, womwe uli pafupi ndi mpaka wa Texas ndi Laredo.</s>

en: The rush apparently started after the U.S. began processing some asylum-seekers there.
nya: Kukhamikilako kunayamba pamene boma la America linayamba ndondomeko yopereka chitetezo kwa anthu othawira mu dzikolo.
mt0: <pad> Mzere wa anthu wofuna kukhala m'dzikomo unayamba pambuyo pamene US inayamba kuchita processing kwa anthu amene amafuna chitetezo.</s>

en: The Catholic bishop of Nuevo Laredo said Monday that migrant shelters there are overcrowded, with some migrants sleeping outside in tents.
nya: Mkulu wa mpingo wa katolika wa ku Nuevo, lolemba apati malo okhalako anthu osamukila mu dzikolo  ndi othinana pamene anthu ena akugona panja pa misanja.
mt0: <pad> Mkulu wa mpingo wa Katolika wa ku Nuevo Laredo adati malo ogona anthu omwe ndi nzika ali ngati msasa, ndipo ena mwa nzika akugona kunja mu ma tent.</s>

en: Bishop Enrique Sánchez Martínez said migrants started streaming into Nuevo Laredo in late April, though the city isn't usually popular among migrants, in part because it is dominated by the violent Northeast drug cartel.
nya: A Bishopu Enrique Sanchez Martínez anati anthuwa anayamba kulowera ku Nuevo Laredo ku mapeto kwa mwezi wa Epulo, ngakhale mzindawo sudziwika kwambiri ndi anthu ochokera maiko ena, chifukwa unadzadzidwa ndi zigawenga za ku Northeast drug carte
mt0: <pad> Bishop Enrique Sánchez Martínez said migrants began streaming into Nuevo Laredo in late April, though the city isn't usually popular among migrants, in part because it is dominated by the violent Northeast drug cartel.</s>

en: "It is new for us because this is the last place they come, due to the conditions of our border, of our city, which are sometimes adverse for migrants," the bishop said. "But since they opened the door in the United States to asylum requests, a lot of them came in large groups."
nya: ‘Izi ndi zachilendo kwa ife chifukwa awa ndi malo omalizira amene iwo sangabwereko, chifukwa cha mkhalidwe wa  malire dziko lathu, mu mzinda wathu umene umatsutsana ndi anthu osamukila mu dzikoli” anatero mkulu wansembeyo. Koma chifukwa a Boma la America linatsekula khomo lopereka chitetezo ndi malo kwa anthu othawira mdzikolo, ambiri mwaiwo anabwera mwa unyinji.
mt0: <pad> "Ndinthu watsopano kwa ife chifukwa nthawi zambiri anthu amabwera kuno podzera m'maboma athu, mzinda wathu, zomwe zimapangitsa kuti anthu ena akhale ndi mavuto," bamboyo adatero. "Koma kuyambira pamene United States idayamba kupereka malo okhalamo anthu amene akufuna chitetezo, ambiri mwa iwo anabwera m'magulu."</s>

en: Marvin Ajic, the director of the Casa Nazareth shelter, said that around April 16, Mexican authorities notified the shelters that the United States would resume processing asylum claims for humanitarian reasons.
nya: A Marvin Ajic, mkulu wa malo osungira anthu a ku Casa Nazareth anati pa 16 Epulo, akuluakulu a boma la Mexico anadziwitsa anthu a ku malo osungidwawo kuti boma a America liyamba  ndondomeko yothandiza anthu othawira dzikolo pa zifukwa zothandizila anthu.
mt0: <pad> Marvin Ajic, woyang'anira nyumba ya chitetezo ya Casa Nazareth, adati pafupifupi mwezi wa April 16, maboma a ku Mexico adadziwitsa malo okhalapo kuti United States idzayamba kubwezeretsanso zopempha za chitetezo chifukwa cha zifukwa za chilungamo.</s>

en: The U.S. had begun allowing more people in, especially Central American adults, to prepare for lifting Title 42 — a pandemic-era health rule that denies migrants a chance to enter the U.S. seek asylum — on May 23. But a federal judge in Louisiana ruled last week that the government could not unwind the rule before the end date.
nya: Boma la America linali litayamba kulowetsa anthu mdzikolo makamaka akuluakulu a pakati pa dziko la America pokonzekera kuchotsa mutu 42, lamulo la nthawi ya mliri limene limakaniza anthu kusamukira mdziko la America kufuna chitetezo. Pa 23 Meyi, oweruza milandu wa ku Louisiana sabata yatha analamula kuti boma silingathetse lamulolo tsiku lane lisanakwane.
mt0: <pad> U.S. idayamba kulola anthu ena kulowa, makamaka achikulire a Central American, kuti athe kutenga Title 42 — lamulo la nthawi ya pandemic-era la umoyo lomwe limakaniza anthu kupita ku U.S. kukafuna asylum — pa Meyi 23. Koma mkulu wa chilungamo wa federal ku Louisiana adanena sabata yatha kuti boma silikhoza kuchotsa lamuloli mpaka tsiku lomaliza.</s>

en: "The (Mexican) immigration officials organized things with the shelters, and the plan was to send people who had been waiting a long time, without any checks, basically anyone," Ajic said.
nya: Akuluakulu oona zolowa ndi kutuluka mdziko la Mexico anakonza zinthu ndi malo osungilako anthuwo,  ndondomeko yawo inali yotumiza  kwawo anthu omwe amadikilira kwa nthawi yaitali opanda kusechedwa makamaka aliyense, anatero a Ajic.
mt0: <pad> "Akuluakulu a (Mexican) immigration adapanga zinthu ndi malo ogona, ndipo njira inali kutumiza anthu amene anali kulinda kwa nthawi yayitali, popanda kukayezetsa, mwachidule aliyense," Ajic adati.</s>

en: That apparently drew the attention of other migrants, including Haitians.
nya: Izi zinakoka mitima ya anthu ena ofuna kulowa mdzikolo kuonjezerapo achokera ku Haiti.
mt0: <pad> Iye akuti adakopa chidwi cha anthu ena, kuphatikizapo a Haitian.</s>

en: In September, similar rumors sparked a rush by about 15,000 mostly Haitian refugees to the Texas border, where they camped under a bridge. U.S. officials began large scale deportations of Haitians while also allowing thousands to remain in the U.S.
nya: Mwezi wa september, phekesera ngati zomwezi zinachititsa anthu othawa nwawo okwana  15,000 a ku Haiti kupita ku malire a dzikolo a  ku Texas kumene anamangako misanja pansi pa mlatho. Akuluakulu a boma la America anayamba kubweza  kwawo gulu la anthu a ku Haiti pamene ena  mazana mazana analoledwa kukhala mu dziko la America lo.
mt0: <pad> Mwezi wa Seputembala, nkhani zofananazi zinachititsa kuti anthu pafupifupi 15,000 a mtundu wa Haitians abwerere ku Texas, komwe adakwera m'madzi. Akuluakulu a U.S. anayamba kuchotsa anthu ambiri a mtundu wa Haitians kunja kwa United States, ngakhale amayambitsa chisankho chotumiza anthu ambiri a mtundu wa Haitians kunja kwa United States.</s>

en: Ajic warned migrants against coming to the border, noting the risks. On Monday, Mexico's National Immigration Institute said that so far this year, it has pulled the bodies of 19 immigrants from the Rio Grande, also known as the Rio Bravo.
nya: Ajic anachenjeza anthu ofuna kusamukira mu dzikolo kudzera ku malire a dziko la America poona zoopsa zake. Lolemba, oona za kulowa ndi kutuluka mdziko la Mexico anati chaka chino, achotsa matupi a anthu khumi ndi asanu ndi anayi kuchokera ku Rio Grande komwenso kumadziwika kuti Rio Bravo.
mt0: <pad> Ajic adachenjeza anthu amene akuyenda kuti asabwere ku mtunda, ndikufotokoza zoopsa. Lolemba, National Immigration Institute ya Mexico yati mpaka pano, idapeza matupi a 19 omwe anali kubwera ku Rio Grande, yomwe imadziwika ndi dzina lake Rio Bravo.</s>

en: New US Rule Grants Automatic Work Permit Extensions to Noncitizens
nya: lamulo latsopano la ku America likupereka nthawi yoonjezera ziphaso zogwilira ntchito mu dzikomo kwa anthu amene ndi ochokera maiko ena payokha.
mt0: <pad> Njira yatsopano ku US imapereka chilolezo chakugwira ntchito mwamsanga kwa anthu amene si nzika zadziko la America.</s>

en: U.S. Citizenship and Immigration Services (USCIS) announced Tuesday that it would automatically extend for 360 days the work permits of immigrants who applied to renew their work authorization amid the current backlog in processing times.
nya: Ogwira ntchito yöpereka ziphaso ndi oona zolowa ndi kutuluka mdzikomp lachiwiri analengeza kuti aonjezera pawokha masiku 360 ololeza anthu osamukira mdzikolo kugwirabe ntchito  kamba ka kuchedwa kulongosola mapepala komwe kukuchitika.
mt0: <pad> USCIS inanena pa Chiwiri kuti idzawonjezera kwa masiku 360 ma permits of immigrants amene adapempha kuti azitha kugwira ntchito mdziko la America chifukwa cha kuchuluka kwa nthawi zofufuza.</s>

en: The new notice expands on the 180-day extension USCIS announced in November. It is expected to prevent about 260,000 immigrants from losing their work permits in the next 18 months. It will also give the agency extra time to clear applicants waiting in line, the agency said in a statement.
nya: Chidziwitso chatsopanochi  chaonjezera pa masiku 180  amene a bungwe USCIS analengeza mu mwezi wa Novembala. Izi zikuyembekezeka kupewetsa anthu osamukira mdzikolo okwana 260,000 kutaya ziphaso zawo zogwilira ntchito mdzikolo kwa miyezi 18 yomwe ikubwerayi. Izinso zipereka nthawi yokwanira ku nthambiyo kuti ilongosole ndandanda wa anthu omwe akudikilira kuthandizidwa, nthambiyo inatero.
mt0: <pad> Nkhani yatsopano idzawonjezera 180-day extension USCIS inanena mu Novembala. Ikuyembekezera kupewa anthu oposa 260,000 kuchotsedwa kwa ma permit awo ogwira ntchito m'miyezi 18 yotsatira, ndipo iperekanso nthawi yayitali kuti athe kumaliza anthu omwe ali m'ndandanda, akuluakulu a boma adatero.</s>

en: "This temporary rule will provide those noncitizens otherwise eligible for the automatic extension an opportunity to maintain employment and provide critical support for their families while avoiding further disruption for U.S. employers," USCIS Director Ur M. Jaddou said in a statement.
nya: Mu kufotokoza kwawo bwana wa bungwe la  USCIS a Ur M. Haddou anati lamulo lakanthawi kochepali lipereka mwayi kwa anthu emene sali mnzika za  mdzikolo kuti akhalebe akugwira ntchito mdzikolo kuti azithandizabe mabanja awo pamene akupewa kusokoneza ogwira ntchito a boma la America
mt0: <pad> "Chilamulo ichi chachiwiri chidzawapatsa anthu amene sanali nzika zadziko la America mwayi wokhala ndi ntchito komanso kupereka thandizo lofunika kwambiri kwa mabanja awo, popanda kusokoneza ntchito za antchito a U.S.," USCIS Director Ur M. Jaddou adatero mu chikalata.</s>

en: The extension, which takes effect Wednesday, aims to stabilize operations for U.S. employers and help people with pending employment authorizations who have a job and are working in the U.S.
nya: Kuonjezera nthawi ku komwe kuyambe kugwira ntchito lachitatu, kukhazikitsa  kagwiridwe ntchito ka anthu  a boma la America komanso kuthandiza anthu a ku  America amene ndi ovomelezeka  kugwira ntchito mu dzikolo komanso ali pa ndandanda wodikilira kulembedwa ntchito.
mt0: <pad> Mzere wowonjezera, umene umayamba m'bale, ukufuna kuthandiza makampani a US ndi anthu omwe ali ndi chilolezo cha ntchito amene ali ndi ntchito ndipo akugwira ntchito ku US.</s>

en: USCIS is the agency in charge of handling the nation's immigration paperwork. In recent years, it has struggled with backlogs, an issue made worse by the COVID-19 pandemic and budget shortfalls.
nya: USCIS ndi nthambi yomwe imayang’anira mapepala onse a anthu olowa ndi kutuluka mdzikomo. zaka zapitazo nthambiyi yakhala ikubwelera mmbuyo, mliri wa covid-19 ndi vuto la ndondomeko zachuma ndikomwe kunaonjezera kubwelera mmbuyoku.
mt0: <pad> USCIS ndi akuluakulu omwe amayang'ana zolemba za chikhalidwe cha mdziko la America. Mzaka zapitazo, idakumana ndi mavuto osiyanasiyana, nkhani yomwe yawonjezeredwa ndi COVID-19 pandemic ndi kuchepa kwa ndalama.</s>

en: In April, Jaddou told U.S. government officials during a congressional hearing that USCIS had 8.5 million pending immigration cases, including those seeking green cards and U.S. naturalization.
nya: Mwezi wa epulo a Jaddou anauza boma la America ku msonkhano wawo kuti a USCIS anali ndi milanduyodikila kuweruzidwa yokwana 8.5 million, kuonjezerapo ya anthu ofuna kupeza chiphaso chokhalira mdzikomo cha green card, ndi ena ofuna kutsimikiza kuti anabadwira mdzikomo.
mt0: <pad> Mwezi wa April, Jaddou adauza akuluakulu aboma la US kuti USCIS ili ndi mavuto okwana 8.5 miliyoni a anthu omwe akufuna green card ndi U.S. naturalization.</s>

en: She said more than half of those pending cases were taking longer than the agency's normal processing times.
nya: Iwo anati kupitilira theka la milanduyi yodikira kuzengedwayi  inatenga nthawi yaitali  nthawi yomwe nthambiyi imagwira nthawi zonse.
mt0: <pad> Iye anati magawo oposa hafu mwa nkhani zimenezi zimatenga nthawi yayitali kuposa m'mene bungwe limachitikira.</s>

en: Asylum-seekers, immigrants adjusting their status to permanent residence and other noncitizens going through the U.S. immigration process are among the noncitizens affected by the latest work authorization extension.
nya: Anthu othawa mavuto mmaiko awo , osamuka maiko akwawo ofuna kukhazikika mdziko la America ndi ena amene si mzika za dzikolo ndi amene akhudzidwa ndi ndondomeko yoonjezera nthawi yogwira ntchito mdzikoli.
mt0: <pad> Mtundu wa anthu amene akufuna chitetezo, omwe amasintha maudindo awo kuti akhale m'dziko la U.S. ndi ena amene akupita kudzera mu njira ya ufulu wogwira ntchito yatsopano ndiwo anthu amene sakhala nzika za U.S. omwe adakhudzadwa ndi ndondomeko ya ufulu wogwira ntchito yatsopano.</s>

en: The agency had reported that processing times for asylum applicants looking to renew work permits increased from seven months in 2017 to 11 months in 2021.
nya: Nthambiyi inafotokoza kuti inaonjezera nthawi kwa anthu othawa maiko akwawo kamba ka mavuto  kuchoka pa miyezi isanu ndi iwiri mu Chaka cha 2017 kufika pa miyezi khumi ndi umodzi mu Chaka cha 2021.
mt0: <pad> Akuluakulu a boma adanena kuti nthawi zofufuza za anthu omwe akufuna kukhala ndi chilolezo cha ntchito kwa anthu amene ali ndi ufulu wa chilumbachi inakula kuchokera ku masiku 7 mu 2017 kufikira masiku 11 mu 2021.</s>

en: In March, USCIS announced a program to reduce backlogs, including the expansion of premium processing for certain applications where applicants could pay a higher fee to expedite paperwork processing.
nya: Mu mwezi wa M alichi, a USCIS analengeza dongosolo lochepetsa kubwelera mmbuyo, kuonjezelaponso kakonzedwe kapamwamba ka  mapepala komwe anthu  ena atha kulipira mtengo wokwelerapo pofulumizitsa njira yokonza ziphaso zawo
mt0: <pad> Mwezi wa Marichi, USCIS inanena njira zochepetsera mavuto, kuphatikizapo kuwonjezera processing premium kwa ma application ena komwe osankhidwa angapeze kuti ndalama zambiri zidzaperekedwe kuti ntchito zofufuza mapepa zizichitike mwachangu.</s>

en: According to the USCIS, most of the announced changes simply restore options offered before the Trump administration's slowdown of USCIS processing and before the COVID-19 pandemic further slowed the agency's resources.
nya: Malinga ndi bungwe la  USCIS, zambiri zomwe zinasinthidwa zinabwezeletsa njira  zingapo zomwe zinaperekedwa  utsogoleri wa a Trump usanachedwetse ndondomeko ya USCIS komanso matenda a covid-19 asanachedwetse zipangizo za nthambiyi.
mt0: <pad> Mwa USCIS, ambiri mwa kusintha komwe kwalengezedwa ndi USCIS ndiko kubwezeretsa ma options omwe analipo pamene Trump administration inachepetsa processing ya USCIS ndipo COVID-19 pandemic inachepetsanso mphamvu za bungwe.</s>

en: "For several years, USCIS has been in a precarious financial situation that has impaired the efficient completion of caseloads. The COVID-19 pandemic exacerbated these challenges in 2020, in addition to a hiring freeze and furlough threat leading to workforce attrition and severely reduced capacity. In 2021, before USCIS could recover from these fiscal and operational impacts, there was a sudden and dramatic increase in EAD (Employment Authorization Document) initial and renewal filings," according to the USCIS statement.
nya: “Kwa zaka zambiri, bungwe la  USCIS lakhala ndi mavuto a zachuma ochuluka zomwe zimachedwetsa kumaliza ntchito zochuluka. Muliri wa covid-19 unakulitsanso mavuto omwe analipo kalewa mu Chaka cha 2020.  kuonjezera apo iwo sanathenso kulemba ntchito anthu ena, komanso chiopsezo chokakamizidwa kusiya ntchito kwa anthu chifukwa cha vuto la za chuma zomwe zinadzetsa kuchoka kwa anthu pa ntchito zawo. Mu Chaka cha 2021, bungwe la USCIS lisanabwelere mchimake, panali kuchuluka mwadzidzidzi kwa mapepala a anthu ofuna kulembedwa ntchito”, kuchokera ku ndemanga ya a USCIS.
mt0: <pad> "Kwa zaka zambiri, USCIS yakhala ikuwombera ndi mavuto azaka zosiyanasiyana omwe adapangitsa kuti ntchito zomaliza zilembedwe mwadongosolo. Nkhani za COVID-19 zinawonjezera mavuto awa mu 2020, kuphatikizapo chiopsezo cha kulembera anthu komanso furlough threat leading to workforce attrition and severely reduced capacity. Mu 2021, pamene USCIS idayamba kubwezeretsa mavuto azaka zosiyanasiyana, kunali kuchuluka kwa EAD (Employment Authorization Document) koyamba komanso kusintha," malinga ndi zomwe USCIS inanena.</s>

en: The USCIS historically has been underfunded because most of the agency's funding comes from application fees that have stalled at $5 billion a year since 2019.
nya: Mbiri ya bungwe la  USCIS ikuonetsa kuti bungweli lakhala likulandira thandizo la ndalama lochepa chifukwa ndalama zothandizira nthambiyi zochuluka zimachokera ku malipiro a anthu amene amafika ndalama zokwana 5 biliyoni pa Chaka kuchokera mu Chaka cha 2019.
mt0: <pad> USCIS nthawi zonse yakhala yosowa ndalama chifukwa ndalama zambiri za bungwe zimachokera ku msonkho wa ma application omwe akhala pa $5 biliyoni kwachaka kuyambira 2019.</s>

en: What Is the US-Launched 'Uniting for Ukraine' Program?
nya: Kodi ndondomeko ya “Kugwirizana kwa dziko la Ukraine”  yomwe inakhazikitsidwa ndi boma la America ndi chani?
mt0: <pad> Kodi 'Uniting for Ukraine' ndi chiyani?</s>

en: U.S. President Joe Biden recently announced the Uniting for Ukraine program, which aims to streamline the process for Ukrainians who have fled their country and are seeking safety in the United States.
nya: Mtsogoleri wa dziko la America a Joe Biden posachedwapa walengeza za ndondomeko ya mgwirizano  wa dziko la Ukraine. Cholinga chake ndi kukonzera njira anthu a dziko la Ukraine amene anathawaa dziko lawo kufuna chitetezo mu dziko la America.
mt0: <pad> President wa U.S. Joe Biden watsopano adalengeza ntchito ya United for Ukraine, yomwe imalingalira kupereka mwayi wofulumira kwa anthu aku Ukraine amene adathawa dziko lawo ndipo akufuna chitetezo ku United States.</s>

en: The new program, which took effect Monday, will complement existing legal pathways available to those fleeing Russian aggression due to the ongoing Russia-Ukraine crisis, Biden administration officials said.
nya: Ndondomeko yatsopanoyi yomwe inayamba kugwira ntchito Lolemba, iwonjezela njira za malamulo zomwe zidalipo kale kwa anthu amene akuthawa ziwawa za dziko la Russia, akuluakulu a utsogoleri wa a BIden watero.
mt0: <pad> Mfundo yatsopano, yomwe inayamba Lolemba, idzawonjezera njira zamalamulo zilipo kale kwa anthu amene akuthawira ku Russia chifukwa cha nkhondo ya Russia-Ukraine, akuluakulu a Biden administration adatero.</s>

en: "The U.S. Department of Homeland Security (DHS) will continue to provide relief to the Ukrainian people, while supporting our European allies who have shouldered so much as the result of Russia's brutal invasion of Ukraine," Secretary of Homeland Security Alejandro Mayorkas said in a statement to reporters on April 21.

en: In 2003 Rwanda will hold its first national elections since the 1994 genocide. A new report says the government of Rwanda needs to relax its control over public life if the polls are to have any credibility.

en: In a new report, titled Consensual Democracy in Post Genocide Rwanda, the International Crisis Group urges the international community to pressure Rwanda's government to liberalize political activity.

mt0: <pad> Rwanda Welcomes the Arrest of Former Rebel Leader</s>

en: Rwandas Justice Minister said his government is pleased with the arrest Monday of a former rebel leader accused of masterminding genocide and violating human rights against Rwandans and Congolese villagers in 1994.
nya: Nduna ya za chitetezo ya dziko la Rwanda inati boma lawo ndi lokhutitsidwa ndi kumanga mkulu wa owukira boma lolemba woimbidwa  mlandu woyambitsa mchitidwe wopha anthu ochuluka komanso kupondeleza ufulu wa anthu mmidzi ya  ku Rwanda ndi Congo mu chaka cha 1994.
mt0: <pad> Mkulu wa boma la Rwanda anati boma lake linali lokondwa ndi kugwira kwa mtsogoleri wakale wa asilikali amene adali wotchuka kwambiri amene adanenedwa kuti adachita genocide ndi kuswa ufulu wa anthu okhala mu dziko la Rwanda ndi Congolese mu 1994.</s>

en: French authorities arrested Callixte Mbarushimana, a former leader of the infamous Democratic Forces for the Liberation of Rwanda (FDLR), an ethnic Hutu rebel group.
nya: Akuluakulu a Boma la France anamanga a Callixte Mbarushimana, mkulu wakale wa gulu la FDLR la mtundu wa Hutu amene anali oukila boma.
mt0: <pad> Akuluakulu a French adagwira Callixte Mbarushimana, mtsogoleri wakale wa FDLR, gulu la chisopo cha Hutu.</s>

en: Tharcisse Karugarama welcomed the decision of French authorities to enforce the international arrest warrant issued by his government and the International Criminal Court (ICC) against the former rebel leader.
nya: A Tharissen Karugarama analandira  chiganizo cha akuluakulu a boma la France pokakamiza kumanga munthuyu kudzera ku dziko lawo komanso khoti lalikulu dziko lonse lapansi
mt0: <pad> Tharcisse Karugarama adalandira chisankho cha akuluakulu a French apolisi kuti achite zinthu zofunikira pamenepo pokwaniritsa warrant yadziko lonse yotsatira imene boma lake ndi Khoti Lalikulu la Mphamvu (ICC) linapereka kwa mtsogoleri wakale wa asilikali.</s>

en: "It is good news that Callixte Mbarushimana has been (arrested) by the French judicial authority. Good news in the sense that, first, there was an international arrest warrant against him issued by the Rwandan government in respect of (the alleged) act of genocide committed in Rwanda in 1994."
nya: Iyi ndi nkhani yabwino kwambiri pakuti a Callixte Mbarushimana amangidwa ndi akuluakulu a khoti la dziko la France. Iyi ndi nkhani yabwino pakuti dziko la Rwanda linatulutsa chikalata chokuti iye amangidwe kudzera ku mchitidwe wokupha magulu a anthu mu chaka cha 1994 ku Rwanda
mt0: <pad> "Nkhani yabwino ndi yoti Callixte Mbarushimana wagwidwa (kugwira) ndi akuluakulu a chilungamo ku France. Nkhani yabwino chifukwa choyamba, boma la Rwanda linapereka warrant of arrest kwa iye chifukwa cha (mchitidwe wa genocide) womwe unachitika ku Rwanda mu 1994."</s>

en: Karugarama said the Hague-based court sought the arrest of the former rebel leader who was believed to be hiding in France.
nya: A Karugarama anati khoti la dera la Hague ndilomwe linafuna kumanga mkulu woukira wakaleyu amene amakhulupilira kuti amabisala mu dziko la France.
mt0: <pad> Karugarama anati bwalo la mlandu la ku Hague likufuna kuti afufuze uyo anali mtsogoleri wa asilikali amene amakhulupirira kuti ali ku France.</s>

en: Genocide memorial in Rwanda
nya: Chikumbutso cha kuphedwa kwa anthu ochuluka mu dziko la Rwanda.
mt0: <pad> Genocide memorial in Rwanda</s>

en: "The International Criminal Court (ICC) conducted its own investigation about his other activities and they found sufficient evidence to support the charge of war crimes and crimes against humanity perpetrated in the DRC and they issued an arrest warrant, which the French judicial authorities have executed."
nya: khoti lalikulu lozenga milandu pa dziko lonse, linachita kafukufuku wawo wokhudza zina zomwe amachita ndipo linapeza umboni wokwanira wothandizira kuzenga mlandu wa nkhondo komanso milandu yoletsedwa ndi anthu yomwe inachitika mu dziko la DRC, ndipo anaika chikalata chomumanga padziko lonse chomwe akuluakulu a boma la France  akugwiritsa ntchito.
mt0: <pad> "Bwalo la milandu la dziko lonse (ICC) linafufuza za makhalidwe ake ena ndipo adapeza umboni wochuluka wothandizira mlandu wa nkhondo ndi zoipa kwa anthu zomwe zinachitika ku DRC ndipo adapereka warrant ya kugwira ntchito, yomwe akuluakulu a chilungamo ku France adakwaniritsa."</s>

en: The Hague-based court accused Mbarushimana and other rebels in the FDLR of using violence against unarmed civilians as their main tool in a campaign to forcefully obtain political power for the rebel group.
nya: khoti la ku Hague linazenga a Mbarushimana ndi ena oukira mu FDRL pogwiritsa ntchito nkhanza kwa anthu amene analibe zida zilizonse zomenyera nkhondo ndi cholinga chokakamiza kuti iwo atenge ulamuliro wa ndale  ku gulu lawo lowukira.
mt0: <pad> Mlandu wa Mbarushimana ndi a FDLR omwe ali ku The Hague unanenedwa kuti adagwiritsa ntchito chiwawa kwa anthu wamba amene sanali na zida zankhondo ngati chida chogwirira ntchito mukampeni yao yofuna kupeza mphamvu zandale kwa gulu lawo la asilikali.</s>

en: According to the ICC, "as a result of this deadly blackmail (by the FDLR rebels), victims were killed, raped, and forcibly displaced, and entire villages were razed to the ground."
nya: Kuchokera ku khoti lapadziko lonse la  ICC, " zotsatira zakuopseza kwa gululi, anthu okhudzidwa anaphedwa, kugwiliridwa, kusamutsidwa mokakamiza  komanso midzi yonse inagwetsedwa ndi kuonongedwa.
mt0: <pad> Mwachidule, ICC "yati anthu amene adaphedwa, adagwiriridwa ndi kusamutsa mwankhanza, ndipo midzi yonse inawonongeka."</s>

en: Karugarama said Mbarushimana and his FDLR rebel forces played a pivotal role in the countrys 1994 genocide in which hundreds of thousands of people were killed.
nya: Karugarama anati Mbarushimana ndi gulu lake loukira la FDLR ndi amene anatenga mbali yaikulu pa kuphedwa kwa anthu  mazanamazana komwe kunachitika mu chaka cha 1994.
mt0: <pad> Karugarama said Mbarushimana and his FDLR rebel forces played a pivotal role in the 1994 genocide of the country where hundreds of thousands of people were killed.</s>

en: "We believe that, in the next couple of weeks after due process has taken place in France, he should be able to be transferred to The Hague in the Netherlands to face charges and be prosecuted for war crimes and crimes against humanity committed within the territory of the DRC."
nya: "Tikukhulupilira kuti masabata angapo akubwerawa pakatha njira zomwe zikutsatidwa ndi boma la France, iye akuyenera kusamutsidwa ku Hague mu dziko la Netherlands komwe akamuimbe  milandu komanso kuzengedwa  yokhudza nkhondo komanso anthu mu dziko la DRC.
mt0: <pad> "Tikukhulupirira kuti, mu masabata angapo otsatira pambuyo pamene mlandu wake wachitika ku France, iye ayenera kukhala wokonzeka kusamutsa ku The Hague ku Netherlands kuti akaimbidwe milandu ndi kuzengedwa chilungamo chifukwa cha zoipa za nkhondo ndi zoipa za anthu zomwe adachita m'dziko la DRC."</s>

en: The Justice Minister also said Kigali will be cooperating with the International Criminal Court in the imminent prosecution of Mbarushimana.
nya: Nduna ya za chilungamo inanenanso kuti boma la Kigali likhala likugwira ntchito limodzi ndi khoti lalikulu pa dziko lonse pamene akuzenga mlanu a Mbarushimana.
mt0: <pad> Mkulu wa boma la Kigali adanena kuti Kigali idzagwira ntchito limodzi ndi Khoti Lalikulu la Chilungamo la International Criminal Court (ICC) pamene Mbarushimana adzaimbidwa mulandu.</s>

en: British, French Foreign Ministers to Re-Invigorate DRC Peace Process - 2002-01-18
nya: Nduna za kunja za dziko la Britain ndi france zadzipereka ku ndondomeko yobweretsa mtendere ku dziko la DRC-2002-01-08.
mt0: <pad> British ndi French Foreign Ministers to Re-Invigorate DRC Peace Process - 2002-01-18</s>

en: The British and French foreign ministers travel to the Democratic Republic of Congo Monday to kickoff a three-day, four-nation tour of the troubled region of Central Africa.
nya: Nduna za kunja za dziko la Britain ndi France zapita ku dziko la Congo lolemba komwe zikukayendera dera lovutika mu chigawo cha pakati pa Africa.
mt0: <pad> British ndi French foreign ministers travel to the Democratic Republic of Congo Monday to kickoff a three-day, four-nation tour of the troubled region of Central Africa.</s>

en: The mission will be jointly led by British Foreign Secretary Jack Straw and his French counterpart Hubert Vedrine.
nya: Ntchitoyi ikatsogozedwa mogwirizana ndi  Jack Straw omwe ali mlembi wa maiko ena wa ku Britain komanso a Hubert Vedrine a ku France.
mt0: <pad> Msonkhano uwu udzayang'aniridwa limodzi ndi Nduna ya Zakunja ya ku UK Jack Straw ndi mkulu wa zakunja wa France Hubert Vedrine.</s>

en: They will be visiting the Democratic Republic of Congo, Rwanda, Burundi and Uganda.
nya: Iwowa akayendera maiko a Congo, Rwanda, Burundi ndi Uganda.
mt0: <pad> iwo adzayendera Republic of the Congo, Rwanda, Burundi ndi Uganda.</s>

en: Their primary objective is to breathe new life into the peace process in the war-torn Congo.
nya: Cholinga chawo ndikubweretsa moyo watsopano pamene ndondomeko yodzetsa mtendere ikuchitika mu dziko la Congo
mt0: <pad> Mfundo yawo yaikulu ndi kupereka moyo watsopano ku njira za chitukuko mu dziko la Congo lomwe linakakhala ndi nkhondo.</s>

en: Specifically, the British and French want to see the withdrawal of foreign troops who back the Congolese government (n Kinshasa, demobilization of rebels who occupy more than half the country, and peace talks to end the conflict.
nya: Makamaka, boma la Britain ndi France likufuna kuti asilikali ankhondo a maiko a kunja amene amathandiza boma la Congo asiye( ku Kinshasa kuwachotsa onse oukira amene anatenga malo  oposa theka la dzikolo, ndi kukambilana mwamtendere kuti mikangano ithe.
mt0: <pad> Mwachidule, a Britain ndi France amafuna kuti asilikali akunja amene amathandiza boma la Congo (n Kinshasa) adachotsedwe, kusiyanitsa gulu la anthu omwe akugwira ntchito za chiwawa amene akutenga hafu yadzikolo, ndi maphunziro a mtendere kuti nkhondo ithe.</s>

en: British Foreign Secretary Straw said the mission also has a broader goal of making sure the Congo does not become another Afghanistan.
nya: Mlembi  wakunja wa dziko la Britain a Straw anati ndondomekoyi ili ndi masomphenya aakulu oonetsetsa kuti dziko la Congo lisadzakhale ngatinso dziko la Afghanistan
mt0: <pad> Secretary of State for British Affairs Straw said the mission also has a broader goal of ensuring that the Congo does not become another Afghanistan.</s>

en: "The 11th of September has made it much more urgent that we take earlier action against failed, and failing states," he said.
nya: " Tsiku la 11 September linapangitsa kuti izi zikhale zachangu kwambiri moti timachitapo kanthu mwansanga motsutsana ndi kulephera , komanso kulephera madera, iwo anatero.
mt0: <pad> "Chivomerezi cha 11 Seputembala chidapangitsa kuti chikhale chofunikira kwambiri kuti titengere njira mwamsanga zolimbana ndi mayiko amene adalephera, komaso mayiko amene adalephera," adatero.</s>

en: In Kinshasa, the ministers will meet Congolese President Joseph Kabila. He took power one year ago, after his father, President Laurent Kabila, was assassinated by one of his bodyguards.
nya: Ku Kinshasa, mtsogoleri wa dzikolo a Kabila akakumana ndi nduna. Iwowa analowa mm'boma chaka chatha pamene abambo awo mtsogoleri Laurent kabila anaphedwa ndi mmodzi  ma anthu owalondera.
mt0: <pad> M'Kinshasa, akuluakulu aboma adzaonana ndi Purezidenti wadziko la Congo Joseph Kabila. Iye adatenga mphamvu mchaka chimodzi chitatha, pambuyo pamene bambo wake, Purezidenti Laurent Kabila, adaphedwa ndi mmodzi wa asilikali ake.</s>

en: Their next stop will be Kigali for talks with Rwandan President Paul Kagame, and the leader of the Rally for Congolese Democracy rebels, Adolphe Onusumba.
nya: Akaimanso ku Kigali komwe akakhale ndi zokambirana ndi mtsogoleri wa dziko la Rwanda a Paul Kagame ndi mtsogoleri woukila wa bungwe lotchedwa Congolese Democracy Rebels wa ku Congo a Adolphe Onusumba.
mt0: <pad> Ndipo iwo adzakhala ku Kigali kuti akakambire ndi Purezidenti wa Rwanda Paul Kagame, ndi mtsogoleri wa asilikaali a Rally for Congolese Democracy, Adolphe Onusumba.</s>

en: The ministers will make a brief visit to Burundi to discuss that country's civil war with President Pierre Buyoya.
nya: Ndunazo zikakumana mwachidule ndi mtsogoleri wa dziko la Burundi a Pierre Buyoya kukakambirana za nkhondo ya pachiweniweni mu dzikolo.
mt0: <pad> Mabungwe apanga ulendo wa nthawi yichoko ku Burundi kuti akakambire za nkhondo ya mtundu wa chisopo ndi Purezidenti Pierre Buyoya.</s>

en: The tour will end in Uganda, where meetings are scheduled with President Yoweri Museveni and Jean-Pierre Bemba, who leads the Movement for the Liberation of Congo guerrillas.
nya: Ulendowu ukathera ku Uganda komwe kukakhale zokambirana pakati pa atogoleri Yoweri Museveni ndi Jean Pierre Bemba, amene akutsogolera bungwe lodzetsa ufulu ku zigawenga zankhondo za mdziko la Congo.
mt0: <pad> Mndandanda udzamaliza ku Uganda, komwe adzakumana ndi Purezidenti Yoweri Museveni ndi Jean-Pierre Bemba, amene akutsogolera gulu la asilikali a Democratic Republic of Congo.</s>

en: UNICEF Pushes for Demobilizing Child Soliders Near Africa's Great Lakes - 2002-10-07
nya: Bungwe la UNICEF lalimbikitsa kwambiri kuletsa ana achisilikari oyandikila dera la  Great lakes ku Afilika- 2002-10-07
mt0: <pad> UNICEF Pushes for Demobilizing Child Soldiers Near Africa's Great Lakes - 2002-10-07</s>

en: The United Nations children's agency, UNICEF, is pushing for child soldiers to be demobilized in Africa's Great Lakes region, as several peace drives there build momentum. The agency says funding is in place to help the children leave the military and restart their lives.
nya: Nthambi yoona za ana ya United nations, UNICEF, likulimbikitsa kuti ana achichepere achisilikali achotsedwe ku dera la Great lakes ku Afilika, pamene mtendere ochuluka umabweretsa mphamvu. Nthambiyi inati pali chithandizo cha chuma chomwe chithandizire anawa kusiya usilikari ndi kukayambiranso moyo wawo.
mt0: <pad> UNICEF, akuluakulu wa United Nations a ana, akulimbikitsa kuti asilikali ana asiye kugwira ntchito mu dera la Great Lakes ku Africa, pamene makampeni okhazikitsa mtendere ayamba. Kampani ya UN akuti ndalama zambiri zilipo zothandiza ana amenewa kuchoka mu usilikali ndi kuyambiranso moyo wawo.</s>

en: UNICEF's top child protection official, Manuel Fontaine, says peace initiatives in Uganda, the Democratic Republic of Congo and Rwanda are making it possible to get more children under the age of 18 out of fighting units. "We insist that child soldiers could be demobilized, even in conflict situations. We should never wait for peace to get children out of any form of armed group. But, obviously, that's a better timing at the moment. It's more conducive to demobilization," Mr. Fontaine said.
nya: Mkulu woona za chitetezo cha ana ku bungwe la UNICEF, a Manuel Fontaine, anati njira zobweretsa mtendere ku Uganda, Congo ndi Rwanda zikupangitsa kuthekera kowachotsa ana ochepera zaka 18 mu malo omenyera nkhondo. "Tikukakamira  kuti asilikali achichepere achotsedwe ngakhale mu nyengo za kusamvetsetsana. Sitikuyenera kudikira nthawi yomwe pali mtendere kuti anawa achotsedwe mu magulu ankhondo. koma mwachidziwikire ino ndi nthawi yoyenera pakadali pano. yowasiyitsa , anatero a Fontane.
mt0: <pad> UNCEF's top child protection official, Manuel Fontaine, says peace initiatives in Uganda, the Democratic Republic of Congo and Rwanda are making it possible to get more children under the age of 18 out of fighting units. "Tikulimbikitsa kuti asilikali ana angathe kukhala omasuka, ngakhale m'mavuto. Komabe, nthawi yabwino kwambiri ndi imeneyi. Ikuthandiza kwambiri kusiyanitsa," Mr. Fontaine said.</s>

en: He says there are currently 1,200 child soldiers in Uganda, fighting mainly with the rebel Lord's Resistance Army. He says that over the past 14 years, the group has abducted some 10,000 children, boys to fight and girls to serve as sex slaves.
nya: Iwo anati pakadali pano ana 1200 achisilikali ali ku Uganda kumenyana ndi gulu loukila la Lords Resistance. Ndipo anati kupitilira zaka 14 zapitazo gululi linagwira ana 10,000, anyamata okamenya nkhondo, atsikana okagona nawo mwaukapolo ndi mokakamiza.
mt0: <pad> Anthu akuluakulu a Uganda ndi 1,200, makamaka ogwirizana ndi gulu la Lord's Resistance Army. Iye akuti kwa zaka 14, gulu la Lord's Resistance Army limene linatenga 10,000 ana, amuna kuti azithamanga ndipo amayi kuti atumikire ngati akapolo a kugonana.</s>

en: According to UNICEF, The Democratic Republic of Congo still has some 10,000 children recruited to fight, while Rwanda has up to 2,000 children involved in combat.
nya: Kuchokera ku UNICEF, dziko la Congo lidakali ndi ana okwanira 10,000 omwe anatengedwa kukamenya nkhondo, pamene dziko la Rwanda lili ndi ana 2000 omenya nawonso nkhondo
mt0: <pad> Mwachidziwikire, dziko la Democratic Republic of Congo ili ndi ana oposa 10,000 omwe adasankhidwa kuti azalimbane, pomwe Rwanda ili ndi ana oposa 2,000 omwe adali kugwira ntchito zankhondo.</s>

en: UNICEF says, even though some of the children do not directly engage in fighting, they are exposed to many dangers. They may be used as porters, carrying very heavy loads, or as messengers or spies passing information and scouting out enemy territory.
nya: Bungwe la UNICEF linati ngakhale ana ena sakhudzidwa ndi kumenya nkhondo, amaonetsedwa zinthu zoopsa zambiri. Ena amagwiritsidwa ntchito ngati alonda, onyamula katundu wolemera kwambiri, otumidwa kapena a kazitape okatenga nkhani ku malo a adani awo.
mt0: <pad> UNICEF akuti ngakhale ena mwa ana sachita nawo nkhondo, iwo amakumana ndi mavuto ambiri. Angagwiritsidwe ntchito ngati akazembe, kunyamula zinthu zovuta kwambiri, kapena ngati atumwi kapena asilikali amene akupereka uthenga ndi kuyang'ana malo a adani.</s>

en: Sometimes, boys, but mainly girls, are used as sex slaves. They are exposed to violence and HIV-AIDS and other sexually transmitted diseases. The girls may become pregnant, making it harder for them to reintegrate into their communities.
nya: Nthawi zambiri atsikana amagwiritsidwa ntchito ya ukapolo pogona nawo. Iwo amaonetsedwa nkhanza komanso kupatsidwa matenda a HIV ndi matenda ena opatsilana pogonana. Atsikanawa amatha kutenga pakati zomwe zimakhala zovuta kwaiwo kubwelera kwawo.
mt0: <pad> Nthawi zina, amuna, makamaka atsikana, amagwiritsidwa ntchito ngati akapolo a kugonana. Amakumana ndi chiwawa ndi HIV-AIDS ndi matenda ena otchedwa matenda omwe amatha kudzera mwa kugonana. Atsikana angathe kubadwa, zimenezi zimapangitsa kuti zikhale zovuta kwawo kubwerera m'mabanja awo.</s>

en: UNICEF's Manuel Fontaine says demobilization takes time and money. He says the children must first be found, and then removed from their government or rebel units. Then, resources are needed to help them rebuild their lives. That involves providing schools, vocational training and health care.
nya: A Manuel Fontaine a bungwe la UNICEF anati kusiyitsa anawa usilikali kumatenga nthawi ndi ndalama. Iwo anati poyambilira anawa amayenera apezeke kaye kenako ndikuwachotsa mu magulu kapena maboma oukira omwe ali. Ndalama ndi zinthu zina zofunika tsitsi ndi tisku ndizofunika kuti ziwathandize kuyambilanso moyo wawo. monga kuwapezera sukulu yophunzilapo,ntchito za manja, komanso chisamaliro cha thanzi lawo.
mt0: <pad> Manuel Fontaine wa UNICEF akuti kusiya ntchito za asilikali kumatenga nthawi ndi ndalama. Iye anati ana ayenera kuyamba kukhala ofufuzidwa, kenako kuchotsedwa ku ma unit awo aboma kapena a chiwawa. Ndiye, zinthu zimafunika kuti azithamanga kupanga moyo watsopano. Izi ziphatikiza kupereka sukulu, maphunziro aluso ndi thanzi labwino.</s>

en: "You do not want to stigmatize them and individualize them. They are basically going back to communities where there are a lot of other children, many of whom have suffered from consequences of war, even if they were not recruited. So, you are trying to build services in those communities that are broad services, that would be made available to all those children," Mr. Fontaine said.
nya: "Simukuyenera kuwasala komanso kuwasiya pawokha. Iwowa akubwelera ku madera omwe kuli ana ena ambiri, amene ambiri mwaiwo akuvutika ndi zotsatira za nkhondo ngakhale sanatengedwe nawo.Ndiye chitukuko chomwe mukuyenera kuchitika mmaderamu chikuyenera kukhala chofikira aliyense, anatero a Fontane.
mt0: <pad> "Munthu safuna kuwapatsa mbiri yabwino ndi kuwapatsa ufulu. Iwo akupita ku mabanja awo, komwe kuli ana ena ambiri, amene adali ndi vuto la nkhondo, ngakhale sanasankhidwe. Choncho, mukuyesa kumanga ntchito zambiri m'mabanja amenewa, zomwe zimapereka ufulu kwa ana onse," anati Ms. Fontaine.</s>

en: Mr. Fontaine says, as part of various peace packages in the Great Lakes region, the World Bank and other donors are providing $500 million to help demobilize children. He says, unfortunately, the needed government institutions are not yet in place in some countries to move the process ahead quickly enough. He says that's why UNICEF is pressing to see such structures develop, so that children can get back home and start to lead normal lives once again.
nya: A Fontaine anati ngati njira imodzi yobweretsera mtendere mu dera la Great lakes, banki yaikuklu dziko lonse lapansi ndi anthu ena othandiza apereka ndalama zokwana 500 million dollars zothandizira kuchotsa anawa.  Iwo anati mwatsoka mabungwe a maiko ena akuchedwa kuyendetsa ndondomekoyi mwachangu. iwo anati ndi chifukwa chake bungwe la UNICEF likufulumizitsa kumanga malowo ndi cholinga choti malo anawo abwelere kwawo ndikukayamba kukakhalanso moyo wabwinobwino.
mt0: <pad> Mkulu Fontaine akuti, ngati gawo la ma paketi a chitukuko ku Great Lakes, Banki ya Dziko ndi ena othandizira akupereka $500 miliyoni kuti athandize ana kuchoka mu utumiki. Iye akuti, mwachisoni, mabungwe aboma amene amafunika sanakhazikitsidwe m'madziko ena kuti ntchitoyi ipitirire mwachangu. Iye akuti chifukwa chake UNICEF ikulimbikitsa kuti mabungwe aboma akhazikitsidwe, kuti ana azitha kubwerera kwawo ndikuyamba kukhala ndi moyo wabwino.</s>

en: She fears the overall situation in eastern Congo is getting worse, not better - despite the international attention - with rebels, militias, and renegade soldiers still running rampant.
nya: Iwo akuopa kuti zomwe zikuchitika ku dziko la Congo zikunka niipira osati kukhalako bwino, ngakhale dziko lonse likuthandizapo, oukira, asilikali a mmadera ndi asilikali osagwira ntchito zawo adakapezekabe mmadera.
mt0: <pad> Iye amaopa kuti nkhani yonse ku mpoto kwa Congo ikupita patsogolo, osati kukhala yabwino - ngakhale chidwi cha mayiko akunja - ndipo anthu a mitundu yosiyanasiyana, ma militia ndi asilikali oipa akupitilira kuyenda.</s>

en: "A lot of these rebel groups are getting reorganized, and are even getting in a coalition so the movements that we see in the region, it is worrying us," said Rostagno.
nya: "Ambiri mwa anthu oukilawa ayamba akupanganso magulu ndi kukumananso, zomwe zikutidandaulitsa kwambiri mmadera," anatero a Rostagno.
mt0: <pad> "Magulu ambiri a asilikali amenewa akupanganso zinthu, ndipo ngakhale amagwirizana, choncho zomwe tikuwona m'deralo zimatipatsa nkhawa," adatero Rostagno.</s>

en: "I think we were more optimistic on this region six months ago than today.
nya: "Ife tinali ndi chiyembekezo ku dera lino miyezi isanu ndi umodzi yapitayo kusiyana ndi tsiku la lero.
mt0: <pad> Ndikuganiza kuti tinkali ndi chiyembekezo chochuluka kwambiri za dera lino masiku 6 yapitayo kusiyana ndi pano.</s>

en: "The United Nations has identified three armed groups that gang raped dozens of people about two months ago in a week-long attack in Luvungi, another part of North Kivu province.
nya: "Bungwe la UN lapeza ma gulu ankhondo  atatu amene anagwililira mwauchifwamba anthu ochuluka miyezi iwiri yapitayo kwa sabata imodzi ku dera la Luvungi, dera lina la kumpoto kwa Kivu Province.
mt0: <pad> UN yazindikira magulu atatu okhala ndi zida zamoto amene adagwirira ntchito mabanja ambiri kwa masiku awiri mu Luvungi, chigawo china cha North Kivu.</s>

en: Those implicated are the Mai Mai Cheka, the Democratic Liberation Forces of Rwanda, and followers of an army deserter, Colonel Emmanuel Nsengiyumva.
nya: Amene akukhudzidwa ndi Mai Mai Cheka, a Democratic Liberation Forces a ku Rwanda, ndi  otsatira yemwe anasiya usilikali , Colonel Emmanuel Nsengiyumva.
mt0: <pad> Anthu amene akuimbidwa mulandu ndi Mai Mai Cheka, Democratic Liberation Forces of Rwanda, ndi a gulu la asilikali oipa, Colonel Emmanuel Nsengiyumva.</s>

en: Proposals for improvementDuring their presentation, the two activists, Bihamba and Rostagno, also offered concrete proposals to make the situation better.
nya: Omenyera ufulu a Bihamba ndi a Rostagno anapempha  kuti zisinthe komanso anapereka njira zoti zingathandize kusintha nyengoyi.
mt0: <pad> Mfundo zowonjezeraM'mene ankafotokozera, awiri a activists, Bihamba ndi Rostagno, adaperekanso mfundo zothandiza kusintha zinthu kuti zinthu zikhale zabwino.</s>

en: Rostagno explained that foreign non-governmental organizations get funding to tackle the issue of sexual violence, but local organizations often get ignored.
nya: A Rostagno anafotokoza kuti mabungwe amene siaboma amapeza  thandizo la ndalama zogwilira ntchito pa  nkhani ya nkhanza zogonana, pamene mabungwe aboma amaiwalidwa.
mt0: <pad> Rostagno adafotokozera kuti mabungwe omwe siboma amapeza ndalama zolimbana ndi nkhani ya ubale, koma mabungwe amtunduwu amakhala akupewa.</s>

en: She said complex applications to get outside funding favor bigger organizations.
nya: Iwo anati  makalata opempha thandizo lovutika  amakonderedwa ndi mabungwe akuluakulu okha.
mt0: <pad> Iye anati mapemphero ovuta kuti apeze ndalama zakunja amapezeka ndi mabungwe amkulu.</s>

en: "They can just do it, they send it, they receive the money.
nya: "Atha kungopanga,  amatumiza, amalandira ndalama.
mt0: <pad> "Anthu angathe kuchita izi, iwo amaituma, iwo amakhala ndi ndalama.</s>

en: The problem is that the money in most cases is spent to pay for the fixed cost of the organization, for the salaries of expat people coming to the region and to the country, while the local non-governmental organizations, those working with the communities, with the women, with the children, in the villages, those who need need money to survive in order to do their work do not have access," said Rostagno.Bihamba said Congolese soldiers should be paid directly through bank withdrawals, rather than being paid through their superiors.
nya: Vuto lake ndilakuti nthawi zambiri ndalamayo imagwiritsidwa kulipira mitengo yazinthu  yokhazikika ya bungwelo, malipirp a akatswiri obwera ku delaro ndi ku dzikolo, pamene mabungwe oti siaboma, amene amagwira ntchito mmadera ndi azimayi, ndi ana mmidzi, amene amafuna ndalama kuti akhale ndi moyo mmalo mogwira ntchito saloledwa," anatero a Rostagno. A Bihamba anati asilikari a ku Congo akuyenera kulipiridwa kudzera ku banki osati kupatsidwa ndi mabwana awo.
mt0: <pad> Mvuto ndi lakuti ndalama zambiri zimagwiritsidwa ntchito kugula ndalama zokhazikika za bungwe, kugula malipiro a anthu amene akubwera kuderalo ndi mdzikomo, pomwe mabungwe aboma, amene amagwira ntchito ndi anthu wamba, akazi, ana, m'mudzi, amene amafuna ndalama kuti achite ntchito zawo sadziwa kufikila ndalama," adatero Rostagno.Bihamba adati asilikali a Congolese ayenera kulandira malipiro mwachindunji kudzera ku banki, kusiyana ndi kulandira malipiro kudzera kwa akuluakulu awo.</s>

en: Bihamba said with the current system they receive only about a third of their salary, which causes some soldiers to loot and rape.
nya: A Bihamba anati njira yomwe ilipoyi asilikali akumalandira malipiro osakwana zomwe zikupangitsa kuti aziba komanso kugwililira.
mt0: <pad> Bihamba anati ndi m'mene boma lalipilira, iwo amapeza magawo atatu mwa malipiro awo, zimenezi zimapangitsa kuti asilikali ena aziba ndikupha.</s>

en: She also called for an international tribunal for the Congo to help end general impunity, as well as more local tribunals for raped victims to seek justice. In North Kivu, where more than 5 million people are estimated to live, she said there are only three tribunals.
nya: Iwo anaitanitsa khoti ladziko lonse kuti lithandize njira yosalanga anthu olakwa, komanso makhoti okhudza anthu ogwililidwa omwe akufuna chilungamo chioneke. Ku dera la North Kivu kuli anthu oposera 5 million koma kuli malo ozengera milandu atatu okha.
mt0: <pad> Ndipo iye anapemphera kuti kukhale chilungamo kwa anthu amene adaphimbana ndi apolisi, komanso kuti anthu ambiri akhazikitse ma bwalo a milandu m'deralo. M'chigawo cha North Kivu, komwe kuli anthu oposa 5 miliyoni, iye adati pali bwalo la milandu limodzi lokha.</s>

en: Desmond Tutu Retires From Public Life
nya: A Desmond Tutu apuma kugwira ntchito zooneka kugulu la anthu.
mt0: <pad> Desmond Tutu Asiya Kugwira Ntchito Zothandiza M'dziko</s>

en: Desmond Tutu fought apartheid in South Africa, and was critical of the war in Iraq.
nya: A Desmond Tutu anamenyera ufulu  dziko la South Africa ndipo iwo analinso osagwilizana ndi nkhondo ya dziko la Iraq.
mt0: <pad> Desmond Tutu adalimbana ndi apartheid ku South Africa, ndipo anali wovuta kwambiri pa nkhondo ya Iraq.</s>

en: "We waged a war that shouldn't have happened," he said.He also spoke out against genocide in Rwanda.
nya: "Tinayambitsa nkhondo yomwe siimayenera kuchitika, iwo anatero. Anayankhulanso za kuphedwa kwa anthu ochuluka ku dziko la  Rwanda.
mt0: <pad> "Tinayamba nkhondo imene siyiyenera kuchitika," adatero. Iye anafotokozanso za Rwanda Genocide.</s>

en: "God have mercy on us," he said.The retired Anglican archbishop announced in July that he would retire from public life on his birthday."The time has come to slow down, and sip maybe rooibos tea with my beloved wife in the afternoons" he said.
nya: "Ambuye atichitire chifundo," iwo anatero.  Mkulu wa ansembe opumayu analengeza kuti apuma ku ntchito yawo pokumbukira tsiku lawo lobadwa mu mwezi wa July.". Nthawi yakwana yoti ndichepetse kagwiridwe ka ntchito kuti ndizimwako tea wa Roiboos ndi akazi anga okondedwa nthawi  ya masana," iwo anatero.
mt0: <pad> "Mulungu atichititse chifundo," adatero. Mkulu wa mpingo wa Anglican amene watha ntchito mu Julayi adalengeza kuti adzapuma pa ntchito za dziko lapansi pa tsiku lake la kubadwa."Nthawi yakwana yochepa, ndipo mwina kunywa tiyi wa rooibos ndi mkazi wanga wokondedwa m'ma afternoons," adatero.</s>

en: Tutu rose through the ranks of the Anglican church in South Africa to become the first black Anglican archbishop of Capetown.
nya: A Tutu anakhala mkulu wa nsembe wakuda woyambilira mu dziko la South Africa mu mpingo wa Anglican, mzinda wa Capetown.
mt0: <pad> Tutu akhali m'maudindo a chikatolika ku South Africa kuti akhale archbishop wa chikatolika wakuyamba wakuda ku Cape Town.</s>

en: He was a vocal critic of South Africa's white-ruled government and encouraged non-violence to end apartheid. Tutu was the recipient of many awards, and in 1984, he received a Nobel Peace Prize for advocating "a democratic and just society without racial divisions.
nya: iwo amadzudzula ulamuliro wa azungu wa mu dziko la South Africa ndipo amalimbikitsa kuthetsa kusalana mopanda kuchita nkhanza. A Tutu analandira nyota zambiri, mu chaka cha 1984 analandira nyota yolimbikitsa mtendere ndi ufulu posasankha mtundu wa anthu.
mt0: <pad> Iye anali m'modzi mwa anthu amene adali wovuta kwambiri ku South Africa ndipo adalimbikitsa kusagwiritsa ntchito zida zosiyanasiyana kuti athetse apartheid. Tutu walandire madalitso ambiri, ndipo mu 1984, adalandira Nobel Peace Prize chifukwa cholimbikitsa "mtundu womwe umakhala wolungama komanso wopanda kugawanika kwa mitundu."</s>

en: " He used the recognition to step up the anti-apartheid campaign, calling for an economic boycott against South Africa. After the end of apartheid, Tutu called it an incredible day when Nelson Mandela won South Africa's first all-race elections.
nya: Kudziwika kwawo ndikomwe iwo amagwiritsa ntchito polimbikitsa kuthetsa mchitidwe wosalana, kuletsa kuchita malonda osiyanasiyana  mu dziko la South Africa. Utatha ulamuliro wa tsankho, a Tutu anati linali tsiku lopambana pamene a Nelson Mandela anapambana zisankho zoyamba za mitundu yonse ya anthu mu dziko la South Africa.
mt0: <pad> Iye nthawi inayake adagwiritsa ntchito chizindikiritso chake kulimbikitsa kampeni yake yolimbana ndi apartheid, kulankhula za boycott yachuma kwa South Africa. Pambuyo pa kutha kwa apartheid, Tutu adati tsiku labwino kwambiri limene Nelson Mandela adapambana mu masankhidwe oyamba a mtundu wonse ku South Africa.</s>

en: "I would say the highest point for me was when I stood on the balcony in 1994 to introduce our new, brand new president to South Africa and the world," he said.
nya: "Nthawi imene inali yopambana kwambiri kwaine ndiimene ndinaima pa nsanja mu chaka cha 1994 podziwitsa mtsogoleri watsopano ku dziko la South Africa komanso ku  dziko lonse lapansi, " iwo anatero.
mt0: <pad> "Ndikuganiza kuti nthawi yabwino kwa ine ndi nthawi imene ndinayima pa balakoni mu 1994 kupereka mtsogoleri wathu watsopano, watsopano kwa South Africa ndi dziko lapansi," adatero.</s>

en: To help mend the nation, President Mandela appointed Tutu as head of the country's Truth and Reconciliation Commission. The group issued a report that included numerous confessions of guilt under apartheid in return for amnesty.
nya: Pothandizira kukonza dziko, mtsogoleri wa dzikolo a Mandela anasankha a Tutu kukhala mkulu wa oyendetsa chilungamo ndi mgwirizano. Gululi linatulutsa lipoti lomwe linakamba zinthu zambiri kuphatikizapo anthu omwe amalapo ndi zoipa zomwe anachita mu nthawi ya utsamunda.
mt0: <pad> Kuti apulumuke, Purezidenti Mandela adalemba Tutu kukhala mkulu wa Commission of Truth and Reconciliation. Komitiyi yatulutsa lipoti lawo limene linaphatikizapo zikhulupiliro zambiri zochitira machimo mu nthawi ya Apartheid kuti akhale ndi chikhululuko.</s>

en: "It makes specific proposals on how we can cultivate a culture of human rights and of structures to insure that the atrocities of the past will not reoccur," Tutu said.Tutu also campaigned to fight poverty and AIDS.
nya: "Ma pempho apaderadera  ndi amene angachititse kuti tikhazikitse ufulu komanso njira zoonetsetsa kuti mchitidwe wankhanza wakale sudzachitikanso," anatero a Tutu. A Tutu analimbikitsanso kulimbana ndi umphawi komanso matenda a Edzi.
mt0: <pad> "Ili ndi malangizo ofotokoza momwe tingakonzere chikhalidwe cha ufulu wa munthu ndi ma nsanja kuti tizionetsetsa kuti zoopsa za kale sizizachitikanso," Tutu adatero.Tutu adagwiranso ntchito zolimbana ndi umbanda komaso Aids.</s>

en: In recent years, he expressed his disappointment in post-apartheid South Africa, especially the level of violent crime.
nya: Zaka zapitazi iwo anafotokoza za kusasangalala kwawo pa kukwera kwa milandu ya  nkhanza yomwe ikuchitika patatha ulamuliro wa tsankho mu dziko la South Africa.
mt0: <pad> M'zaka zapitazo, iye adawonetsa chisoni chake ku South Africa ya post-apartheid, makamaka chifukwa cha mlingo wa upandu.</s>

en: Despite his withdrawal from public life, Tutu says he will continue to support his peace foundation and will remain part of a group of elder statesmen who campaign for peace and human rights.
nya: Ngakhale a Tutu anasiya kuonekera ku gulu, iwo anati apitilizabe kuima pambuyo pa bungwe lawo la mtendere komanso gulu la akuluakulu a dziko omwe amalimbikitsa ufulu ndi mtendere.
mt0: <pad> Ngakhale kuti Tutu waganiza zosiya ntchito zandale, iye akuti adzapitiliza kuthandiza bungwe lake la chitukuko ndipo adzakhala m'gulu la akuluakulu omwe amalimbana ndi chitukuko ndi ufulu wa anthu.</s>

en: But Tutu says he will no longer give interviews and, as he put it, will mostly "shut up."
nya: A Tutu anati iwo azingokhala chete chifukwa sadzaperekanso mwayi wofunsidwa mafunso.
mt0: <pad> Koma Tutu akuti saperekanso ma interview ndipo, monga momwe adanena, adzakhala "oyankhula."</s>

en: "I have been part of our struggle for freedom and democracy, and I am part of the celebration that we did succeed," he said. "I have been part of the post apartheid dispensation and long for us to do infinitely better."Many say his voice will be missed.
nya: "Ndakhala mbali yomenyera ufulu wa ulamuliro wa aliyense, komanso mbali ya kusangalala chipambano chathu, " iwo anatero. "Ndakhala mbali ya olamulira atsamunda atachoka komanso kulimbika kuti tichite bwino." Ambiri anati mawu awo awasowa.
mt0: <pad> "Ndakhala mbali ya kampeni yathu yolimbana ndi ufulu ndi ufulu wa mtundu wathu, ndipo ndili mbali ya chikondwerero chathu kuti tikwaniritse," adatero. "Ndakhala mbali ya boma la post-apartheid ndipo ndikukhumba kuti ticite zinthu zambiri zopambana." Anthu ambiri akuti mawu ake adzakhala okondedwa.</s>

en: Malawi's Jacaranda School for Orphans Celebrates Christmas
nya: Sukula ya ana amasiye ya Jacaranda ku dziko la malawi, yasangalala khilisimasi.
mt0: <pad> Malawi's Jacaranda School for Orphans Celebrates Christmas</s>

en: The management for the Jacaranda School for Orphans in Malawis commercial capital Blantyre recently hosted a party for its students as it closed for Christmas and New Years Day holidays.
nya: Oyendetsa sukulu ya ana amasiye ya Jacaranda mu mzinda wa Blantyre dziko la Malawi masiku apitawa anachititsa phwando kwa ana awo ophunzira pamene amatsekera kukapuma mu nyengo ya khilisimasi ndi nyuwere.
mt0: <pad> Mkulu wa sukulu ya Jacaranda ku Blantyre, mzinda wa Malawi wotchuka, mwachidule adapanga phwando kwa ophunzira ake popeza sukuluyo inali yosungidwa kwa Khirisimasi ndi Tsiku la New Year.</s>

en: Around 500 people including students, staff members and others from surrounding areas attended the event, which was held at the schools premises in Chigumula area.
nya: Anthu okwana 500 kuonjezelapo ana a sukulu, ogwira ntchito ndi ena ochokera mmadera ozungulira anabwera ku phwandoli lomwe linachitikila ku malo awo a ku Chigumula.
mt0: <pad> Mpaka anthu 500, kuphatikizapo maphunziro, aphunzitsi ndi ena ambiri, adapita ku chikondwerero chomwe chinachitikira pa malo a sukulu ku Chigumula.</s>

en: The party included gifts, Santa Claus, and a "dancing show case" by the students.
nya: Ku phwandoli kunali mphatso,  Santa claus komanso  gulu lovina la ana ophunzirawo.
mt0: <pad> Msonkhano umenewo unaphatikizapo mphatso, Santa Claus, ndi "kuvina kwa ophunzira."</s>

en: The school management told VOA that the yearly celebration has been a school tradition for the past 13years.
nya: Oyendetsa sukuluyo anauza wailesi ya VOA kuti chisangalalo cha pa chakachi ndi mwambo wawo omwe wakhala ukuchitika kwa zaka khumi ndi zitatu zapitazo.
mt0: <pad> Mkulu wa sukulu anati kwa zaka 13 zapitazo, chikondwerero cha chaka ndi mwambo wa sukulu.</s>

en: The school's director, Luc Deschamps, said: "[We feel] it is very important for us to celebrate Christmas because the children do not have parents.
nya: Mkulu woyang'anira sukuluyo a Luc Deschamps anati "ndikofunukira kusangalala khilisimasi chifukwa anawa alibe makolo awo."
mt0: <pad> Mkulu wa sukulu Luc Deschamps anati: "[Tikuona] kuti ndi chinthu chofunika kwa ife kukondwerera Khirisimasi chifukwa ana amenewa alibe makolo.</s>

en: They stay with either a grandmother or a distant aunt or uncle, and they are not able to cerebrate at home or have a party or a little bit of sweets and cake for the children. So, we provide a happy day for the children to celebrate the spirit of Christmas. And it is also a way of our children to learn to give."
nya: Iwowa amakhala ndi  agogo awo kapena amalume, azakhali achibale chapatali ndipo samakwanitsa kusangalala kwawo kapena kuchita phwando nadya ma suwiti ndi ma keke. Ndiye timakonza tsiku lachisangalalo kwa anawa kuti asangalale khilisimasi
mt0: <pad> Anthu amenewa amakhala ndi mayi awo kapena mlongo kapena m'bale, ndipo sakhoza kukhala ndi banja lawo kapena kupanga phwando kapena kupereka zokoma ndi mikate kwa ana. Choncho, timayambitsa tsiku labwino kwa ana kuti azisangalala ndi chikhalidwe cha Khirisimasi. Ndipo izi ndizophunzitsa ana athu kuphunzira kupatsa."</s>

en: No media source currently available
nya: Palibe umboni wochokera ku nyumba zofalitsa nkhani.
mt0: <pad> No media source currently available</s>

en: Deschamps, who is also an Honorary Consul of France in Malawi, said before the main event the patrons were treated to "a nice meal" from the students.
nya: A Deschamps amene ali  oimila dziko la France kuno ku Malawi amati mwambowo usanayambe   akuluakulu othandiza sukuluyo anapatsidwa chakudya chabwino kuchokera kwa anawo.
mt0: <pad> Deschamps, amene ndi Mkulu wa Consulate ya France ku Malawi, adati ophunzira adapereka chakudya "chabwino" kwa anthu omwe analipo.</s>

en: "We had a big, big lunch with good meat and rice,[the dish made from maize flour called] nsima, of course, and vegetables. And it was the students themselves who cooked the meal for everybody, for over 500 people," he said.
nya: "Tinali ndi nkhomaliro yopambana ya mpunga ndi nyama komanso nsima ndi masamba.anawa ndiamene anaphika chakudya cha aliyensechi chopitilira anthu 500,"  iwo anatero.
mt0: <pad> "Tinadya chakudya chabwino chotchedwa nsima ndi mkate wabwino, mpunga, mwachidziwikire, ndi masamba. Ndipo ophunzira okhaokha adaphika chakudya chimenecho kwa aliyense, kwa anthu oposa 500," iye anatero.</s>

en: One of the students, Eddah Zimba, said, "The celebrations are really cool, ... I have enjoyed myself. I have eaten, and now I am here dancing. What has interested me most is the gift that we have received the like the puffs, the biscuits, the squash and the dance."
nya: Mmodzi mwa ophunzirawo , Eddah zimba anati, " chisangalalochi ndi chabwino, ndakondwa kwambiri. Ndadya, pano ndikuvuna. Chomwe chandisangalatsa kwambiri ndi mphatso zomwe talandira ngati kamba, ma bisiketi, zakumwa ndi mavinidwe.
mt0: <pad> Mmodzi mwa ophunzira, Eddah Zimba, adati, "Zimene ndimakondwerera ndizosangalatsa kwambiri,... Ndinadya, ndipo pano ndikuvina. Chinthu chomwe chinandikonda kwambiri ndi mphatso zomwe tidalandira monga ma puffs, biscuits, squash ndi kuvina."</s>

en: She thanked the schools management for hosting the Christmas party for students who in most cases do not have such celebrations at home.
nya: Iye anathokoza akuluakulu a sukuluyo powakonzera ophunzirawo  phwando la khilisimasi chifukwa nthawi zambiri sakhala ndi chisangalalocho mmakwawo.
mt0: <pad> Iye anapereka moni kwa akuluakulu a sukulu chifukwa chokhala ndi chipulumutso cha Khirisimasi kwa ophunzira amene kawirikawiri sakondwerera zoterezi kunyumba kwawo.</s>

en: Another student Emmanuel Chisale said good meal aside, the event has taught him the spirit of sharing.
nya: Ophunzira wina Emmanuel Chisale anati pambali pa chakudya chabwino , phwandolo lamuphunzitsa mtima wogawana.
mt0: <pad> Msodzi wina Emmanuel Chisale adati kusiyanitsa chakudya chabwino, chinthuchi chikumuphunzitsa mtima wa kugawana.</s>

en: "This party has brought a change in my life. I have learned that we have to have a heart for sharing one another as the Father Christmas was doing," he said.
nya: "Phwando labweretsa kusintha m'moyo wanga. Ndaphunzira kuti tikuyenera kukhala ndi mtima wogailana zinthu wina ndi mnzake ngati mmene tate wa Khilisimasi amachitira," iye anatero.
mt0: <pad> "Chisangalalo ichi chandisintha moyo. Ndinaphunzira kuti tiyenera kukhala ndi mtima wogawana wina ndi mzake monga Mkulu wa Khirisimasi anali kuchita," adatero.</s>

en: Founded in 2002, the Jacaranda School for Orphans is the only one in Malawi which provides free primary, secondary and tertiary education to children without parents.
nya: Sukulu ya ana amasiye ya Jacaranda yomwe inayambidwa mu chaka cha 2002, ndisukulu yokhayo yomwe imapereka maphunziiro aulele a ku pulaimale, sekondale komanso sukulu yaukachenjede  kwa ana amasiye.
mt0: <pad> Mchaka cha 2002, sukulu ya Jacaranda ya Anthu Osiyanitsa ndi yomwe yokhayo ku Malawi imene imapereka maphunziro a chitukuko kwa ana osaberekeredwa ndi makolo.</s>

en: A Malawian woman, Marie Da Silva, started the school after she returned from the United States where she spent nineteen years working as a nanny.
nya: Marie Da silva, mzimayi wachimalawi ndi amene anatsekula sukuluyi atakhala zaka 19 ku America komwe amagwira ntchito yosamalira anthu.
mt0: <pad> Mkazi wa ku Malawi, Marie Da Silva, adayamba sukuluyi atabwerera kuchokera ku United States komwe adagwira ntchito kwa zaka khumi ndi zinayi ngati m'bale.</s>

en: Economists Predict Bumpy Road for Malawi's Economy in 2015
nya: Olondoloza  zachuma aneneratu kuti chuma cha dziko la Malawi chitha osayenda bwino mu chaka cha 2015.
mt0: <pad> Economists Predict Bumpy Road for Malawi's Economy in 2015</s>

en: Economists in Malawi say the country is likely to continue facing financial challenges in 2015 unless the government can regain the confidence of donors, who are still withholding 40 percent of budgetary support due to the corruption scandal known as Cashgate. More than $30 million were looted from government coffers in the scandal, and several people, including government officials, were arrested.
nya: Olondoloza chuma mu dziko la Malawi afotokoza kuti dziko lino litha kupitilira kukumana ndi mavuto a zachuma pokhapokha anthu othandiza ataloweleleraponso, anthu othandizawa sanapereke mbali ya chithandizo cha ndalama yogwiritsira ntchito ku boma chokwanira gawo la 40% kamba ka mchitidwe wa katangale wotchedwa cashgate. Ndalama zopitilira 30 million dollars ndi zomwe zinabedwa kuboma. Anthu ambiri  kuphatikizapo ogwira ntchito m'boma anamangidwa.
mt0: <pad> Malawi is likely to continue facing financial difficulties in 2015 unless the government can regain the trust of donors, who are still withholding 40 percent of budgetary support due to the scandal known as Cashgate. More than $30 million were looted from government coffers in the scandal, and several people, including government officials, were arrested.</s>

en: The withholding of donor aid has forced Malawi's government to pass what is known as the Zero Aid national budget for the 2014-2015 fiscal year. Analysts, such as Abel Mwanyungwe, an economics lecturer at the Polytechnic College of the University of Malawi, say the drop in spending has hurt the economy.
nya: Kuimitsidwa kwa chithandizo chochokera maiko ena kwakakamiza dziko la malawi kudutsitsa madongosolo a ndalama  a chaka cha 2014-2015 otchedwa Zero Aid national budget. A  Abel Mwanyungwe mmodzi ounguza komanso mphunzitsi wa ndondomeko za chuma ku sukulu ya ukachenjede ya Polytechnic College anati kutsika kwa kagwiritsidwe ntchito ka ndalama  kwasokoneza ndondomeko ya chuma.
mt0: <pad> Mfundo zochepetsa za ndalama za m'maiko ena zapangitsa kuti Malawi apeze zomwe zimatchedwa Zero Aid national budget for the 2014-2015 fiscal year. Ophunzira zachuma monga Abel Mwanyungwe, ophunzitsa zachuma ku Polytechnic College of the University of Malawi, akuti kuchepa kwa ndalama za m'maiko ena kwaononga chuma chadziko la Malawi.</s>

en: "This has been a bumpy year as we are coming from the Cashgate effects that have quite a major dent on the economys performance. We have seen that in most cases the very delicate and crucial departments and service providers have been affected, in the sense that we dont have enough drugs in the hospitals. In schools, in terms of teachers payments is not in time," said Mwanyungwe.
nya: "Chaka chino chakhala chovuta kwambiri pamene tikuchokera kuzotsatira za Cashgate zimene zaononga kayendetsedwe ka chuma. Malo antchito ambiri komanso anthu obweretsa katundu mdzikoli akhudzidwa monga tilibe mankhwala mzipatala, komanso malipiro a aphunzitsi sakumafika mu nthawi yake, anatero a mwanyungwe.
mt0: <pad> "Nthawi yathu ino ndi chaka chovuta chifukwa chakuti tikubwera kuchokera ku Cashgate yomwe ili ndi vuto lalikulu pa chuma. Tawonapo kuti maboma ambiri abwino komanso ofunika kwambiri ndi amene akukhudzana ndi ndalama zambiri ndi amene adakumana nazo, mwachitsanzo kuti tinthu zosowa mu machipatala. M'sukulu, ndalama za ophunzitsa zilibe m'mbuyomu," anena Mwanyungwe.</s>

en: Mwanyungwe also links Cashgate to the recent depreciation of Malawis currency, the kwacha, which has resulted in strikes by various government workers demanding higher pay.
nya: A Manyungwe analumikizanso kutsika kwa ndalama ya Malawi ndi kubedwa kwa ndalama mosakadza komwe kunachitika, zomwe zachititsa zionetsero kuchokera kwa  anthu osiyanasiyana ogwira ntchito m'boma pomwe akufuna kukwezedwa malipiro awo.
mt0: <pad> Mwanyungwe also links Cashgate to the recent depreciation of Malawis currency, the kwacha, which has resulted in strikes by various government workers demanding higher pay.</s>

en: For example, support staff for the judiciary have been on strike for six weeks, seeking a 45 percent pay increase which the government says it cannot afford because it has no money.
nya: Mwachitsanzo anthu othandizira ntchito ku khoti akhala akunyanyala ntchito kwa masabata asanu ndi imodzi pofuna kuti malipiro awo akwezedwe kufika pa 45% zomwe aboma akuti sangakwanitse kutero  chifukwa alibe ndalama.
mt0: <pad> Mwachitsanzo, akuluakulu a boma la judiciary akhala akugwira ntchito kwa masiku 6, kupemphera kuti ndalama zambiri zidzawonjezeredwe ndi 45 percent, zomwe boma limati silikwanitsa chifukwa lilibe ndalama.</s>

en: Workers at Malawi's Anti-Corruption Bureau went on strike demanding a 70 percent pay raise until the government threatened to forfeit their December salaries if they did not return.
nya: Ogwira ntchito a ku bungwe lothana ndi ziphuphu ananyanyala ntchito pofuna kuti malipiro awo akwezedwe kufika pa 70%  koma a boma anawaopseza kuti salandira malipiro awo a mwezi wa Disembala ngati sabwelera kunchito.
mt0: <pad> Ntchito za Malawi's Anti-Corruption Bureau zinayamba kugwira ntchito mwamwayi kuti ndalama zowonjezera mtengo wa malipiro ziwakweze ndi 70 percent mpaka boma linati ndalama zawo za December zidzawonongedwa ngati zikanabwezeredwa.</s>

en: Mwanyungwe said the government can only avoid further strikes in 2015 if it makes efforts to restore donor confidence in the management of its public finances.
nya: A Manyungwe anati boma litha kupewa kunyanyala ntchito kwinanso mu chaka cha 2015 ngati lingayesetse  kubwezeretsa chikhulupiliro cha anthu othandiza boma pa kagwiritsidwe ntchito ka ndalama za dziko.
mt0: <pad> Mwanyungwe anati boma litha kupewa mastrikes ena mu 2015 popeza lidayamba kuchita zinthu zosonyeza kuti ndalama zaboma zimayenda bwino.</s>

en: "My fear is that if we dont have this donor confidence and donor support coming back to the economy, we may force the government to go into serious local borrowing that would lead to serious repercussions in terms of inflation, in terms of interest rates and this may have a sort of catch-catch lose situation," said Mwanyungwe.
nya: Chomwe ndikuopa ndichakuti ngati athu otithandiza sangatikhulupilirenso, ndikukhalanso opanda chithandizo ku ndondomeko ya chuma chathu, boma litha kukakamizidwa kukabwerekanso ndalama mudziko mommuno zomwe zingadzetse mavuto monga kukwera kwa zinthu, kudzera mu ndalama yaapamwamba yoperekedwa pobweza ndalama. Iyi ndi nyengo yapakatikati, anatero a Manyungwe.
mt0: <pad> Ndikuopa kuti ngati titapeza chikhulupiliro cha anthu omwe amathandiza dziko lathu, boma lidzafunika kutenga ngongole zambiri zochokera kwa anthu amene amathandiza dziko lathu zimene zidzapangitsa kuti inflation, interest rates ndipo izi zidzakhala ndi vuto labwino," adatero Mwanyungwe.</s>

en: The donors are, among other things, demanding that the government prosecute all those involved in the scandal and strengthen its financial management system.
nya: Mwa zina zomwe anthu othandizawa akufuna dziko lichite ndi kumanga anthu onse amene anakhudzidwa ndi kuba ndalamazo ndicholinga cholimbitsa njira ya  kagwiritsidwe ntchito ka ndalama.
mt0: <pad> M'modzi mwa zinthu zomwe akuluakulu aboma akufuna, ndi zina zambiri, kuti apolisi apeze aliyense wotsatira mgwirizano ndi kulimbana ndi njira zoyang'anira ndalama.</s>

en: Newton Kambala, the president of the Malawi Confederation of Chambers of Commerce and Industry, said the scandal rendered 2014 as "a very bad year for the business sector, because of huge debts that the government owes the private sector."
nya: Mtsogoleri wa bungwe la Malawi Confederation of Chambers of commerce and Industry a Newton kambala, anati kuba ndalama komwe kunachitika mu chaka cha 2014 kunaipitsa nthambi ya anthu ochita malonda chifukwa cha ngongole zochuluka zomwe boma linali nazo kwa anthu a malondawa.
mt0: <pad> Newton Kambala, president of the Malawi Confederation of Chambers of Commerce and Industry, said the scandal rendered 2014 as "a year very bad for the business sector, because of huge debts that the government owes the private sector."</s>

en: He warned that if the situation persists, "2015 will be worse."
nya: Iwo anachenjeza kuti ngati zipitilire chonchi, chaka cha 2015 chidzaipa kuposera pano.
mt0: <pad> Iye adachenjeza kuti ngati zinthu zikupitilira, "2015 idzakhala yoipa."</s>

en: In his state of the nation address last Saturday, Malawi president Peter Mutharika said his government is doing everything possible to address the problems caused by the Cashgate scandal.
nya: Mtsogoleri wa dziko lino a Peter Mutharika pamene amalankhula ku  mtundu wa a  Malawi loweruka lapitali, anati boma lawo likuyesetsa kuchita mothekera kukonza mavuto amene anadza ndi kuba ndalama.
mt0: <pad> M'mawu ake a state of the nation, mtsogoleri wadziko la Malawi Peter Mutharika adati boma lake likuchita zonse zokwanira kuthetsa mavuto amene adapangidwa ndi Cashgate scandal.</s>

en: "My government has strengthened the financial system to make sure that Cashgate never occurs again in Malawi. We have resourced fairly well the law enforcement institutions, including the Anti-Corruption Bureau, so that they do a thorough independent job, prosecute all suspects, and recover the stolen resources where possible," said Mutharika.
nya: Boma langa lakhwimitsa malamulo ku nthambi ya zachuma oonetsetsa kuti kuba ndalama mosakadza kusadzachitikenso mu dziko la Malawi. Tayesetsa kupereka katundu wokwanira wogwilira ntchito mu mabungwe a malamulo,  othetsa katangale kuti agwire ntchito  moyenelera, amange onse akuganiziridwa, komanso kulanda katundu yense anabedwa ngati kuli kotheka," anatero a Mutharika.
mt0: <pad> "Goverment yanga yakhazikitsa njira zolimbana ndi Cashgate kuti tiwonetsetse kuti Cashgate siidzachitikeso m'Malawi. Tsopano ndalama zambiri za boma, kuphatikizapo Anti-Corruption Bureau, zilipo kuti zizigwira ntchito mwaufulu, fufuze anthu omwe adatenga ndalama zoyipa ndipo zibwezeredwe ndalama zotayika ngati zingathekeke," anena Mutharika.</s>

en: Mutharika also said his government is implementing newly-adopted fiscal reforms that seek to grow the countrys economy by 5.5 percent in 2014, up from an estimated 5.0 percent in 2013.
nya: A Mutharika anatinso boma lawo libweretsa njira yatsopano ya kagwiritsidwe ntchito ka ndalama zaboma kamene kakulitse chuma cha dziko kufika pa 5.5% mu chaka  cha 2014 kuchokera pa 5.0 percent mu chaka cha 2013.
mt0: <pad> Mutharika anati boma lake likuyesetsa kukweza chuma chadziko lapansi ndi 5% mu 2014 kuchokera pa 5% yomwe inali mu 2013, kuchoka pa 5% yomwe inali mu 2013.</s>

en: Malawi to Conduct Door-to-Door HIV Testing
nya: Dziko la Malawi liyamba kuyeza matenda a edzi khomo ndi khomo.
mt0: <pad> Malawi to Conduct Door-to-Door HIV Tests</s>

en: Malawians have mixed reactions to government plans to introduce door-to door HIV testing early next year.
