Supporters say the step is urgently needed because 100 Malawians get infected each day, and an average of 138 die from AIDS daily. Minister of Health Jean Kalirani announced the plans during the recent commemoration of World AIDS Day in the northern district of Karonga.
nya: Amalawi  ali ndi maganizo osiyanasiyana pamene boma likukonzekera kuyambitsa kuyeza matenda a edzi khomo ndi khomo kumayambiliro kwa chaka cha mawa. Omwe ali pa mbuyo pa maganizowa akuti njirayi ikufunika kwambiri chifukwa tsiku lilironse amalawi 100 amatenga matendawa ndipo anthu osachepera 138 amamwalira tsiku lilironse ndi matenda a Edzi. nduna ya zaumoyo a Jean Kalirani analengeza ndondomekoyi pa tsiku lokumbukira matenda a Edzi mu boma la Karonga.
mt0: <pad> Malawians have reacted mixedly to government plans to introduce door-to-door HIV testing early next year. Supporters say the step is urgently needed because 100 Malawians get infected each day, and an average of 138 die from AIDS daily. Minister of Health Jean Kalirani announced the plans during the recent commemoration of World AIDS Day in the northern district of Karonga.</s>

en: "We will go in the villages asking for blood samples to check whether that person is HIV positive or not. And those that will be found HIV positive will definitely be given the care they need. And those who are found negative will also be counseled so that they remain negative," said Kalirani.
nya: Tizipita mmidzi kukatenga magazi kwa anthu pofuna kudziwa ngati ali ndi kachiromboko kapena ayi. Amene azipezeka ndi matendawo azipatsidwa chisamaliro choyenera. Ndipo amene alibe azipatsidwa malangizo a mmene angakhalire osatengabe matendawo, anatero a kalirani.
mt0: <pad> "Tidzapita ku mizikiti kuti tifufuze ngati munthu ali ndi HIV. Ndipo amene adzapeze HIV, adzapatsidwa chithandizo chomwe akufunika. Ndipo amene adzapeze negative, adzaphunzitsidwanso kuti akhale negative," adatero Kalirani.</s>

en: Kalirani said the campaign will start in mid-March and will aim to reach everyone in the country, including people who are far from health facilities that provide HIV testing and counseling services. She said the campaign is in line with the goal of ending HIV infection by 2030. Malawi's HIV infection rate is currently at 10 percent, a slight drop from three years ago.
nya: A kalirani anati ntchitoyi iyamba mkatikati mwa mwezi wa Malichi ndipo afikira munthu aliyense amene ali ndi kachilombo kapena ayi, kuphatikizapo anthu amene anatalikilana ndi zipatala zazing'ono zomwe zimayeza magazi komanso kupereka uphungu. Iwo anati ntchitoyi ikulingana ndi cholinga chothetsa kutenga kachilombo ka HIV pofikira chaka cha 2030. 10% ndi mlingo wa katengedwe ka matendawa mu dziko lino komwe katsika kuchokera zaka zitatu zapitazo.
mt0: <pad> Kampani imeneyi idzayamba mkatikati mwa Marichi ndipo idzayang'ana kupeza aliyense mdzikomo, kuphatikizapo anthu amene ali patali ndi malo achipatala omwe amapereka maphunziro komanso malangizo.</s>

en: The announcement has raised fears in some Malawians, such as Steven Jailosi, a primary school teacher in rural Blantyre, who feel the campaign will likely infringe upon peoples privacy.
nya: Izi zitalengezedwa, zadzetsa mantha mwa amalawi ena ngati  a Steven Jailosi mphunzitsi wa sukulu ya pulaimale mu mzinda wa Blantyre amene akuona ngati  ntchitoyi idzaika zinsinsi za anthu poyera.
mt0: <pad> Mfundoyi yadzadza nkhawa mwa anthu ena ku Malawi, monga Steven Jailosi, mphunzitsi wa sukulu ya chitukuko ku Blantyre, amene amaona kuti kampeni idzaphulika ufulu wa anthu.</s>

en: "I think it is not okay because they will be invading our privacy. HIV testing is supposed to be private. No one is supposed to know that I went for an HIV testing unless I make a choice to tell them," said Jailosi.
nya: Ine ndikuona ngati njirayi siyabwino chifukwa ndizosemphana ndi moyo wathu wa Chinsinsi. Kuyezetsa magazi kumayenera kukhala kobisika. Palibe amene amayenera kudziwa zoti ndinapita kukayezetsa magazi pokhapokha nditapanga chisankho chomuuza, anatero a Jailosi.
mt0: <pad> "Ndikuganiza kuti izo sizilibwino chifukwa zidzaphimba ufulu wathu. Kuyesedwa kwa HIV kumayenera kukhala mwachindunji. Palibe munthu ayenera kudziwa kuti ndinatsala na HIV popanda ine kusankha kuwauza," adatero Jailosi.</s>

en: Ester Makonokaya, a secretary in Blantyre, said that although she has been tested already, she feels the door-to-door HIV testing will violate people's privacy.
nya: A Ester Makonokaya,  mlembi mu mzinda wa Blantyre anena kuti ngakhale iwo ayezedwa kale akuona kuti kuyeza magazi khomo ndi khomo ndi kuononga zinsinsi za anthu.
mt0: <pad> Ester Makonokaya, a mkulu ku Blantyre, adati ngakhale adayezedwa kale, amaona kuti kafukufuku wa HIV kunyumba kwake uononga chinsinsi cha anthu.</s>

en: "Government should instead take the mobile clinics to the villages where people will be able to access them on their own rather than taking testing in their homes, because that might mean that some of the people who are not supposed to know other peoples status will know because, you know, when someone has been tested you show some reactions," said Makonokaya.
nya: Boma likuyenera kutenga zipatala zoyendera mmidzi komwe anthu akakwanitse kuyezetsa pawokha kusiyana ndi kuyezedwa mmakomo mwawo, chifukwa anthu amene samayenera kudziwa zotsatira zawo atha kudziwa chifukwa munthu amene wayezedwa magazi khalidwe lake limasintha, anatero a Makonokaya.
mt0: <pad> "Aboma ayenera kutenga ma clinics a mobile ku midzi komwe anthu angapeze okha kusiyana ndi kutenga kuyesedwa m'manyumba, chifukwa izi zingathandize kuti ena mwa anthu amene safunika kudziwa mbiri ya anzawo azadziwa chifukwa, mukudziwa, mukayezedwa munthu umaonetsa maganizo," adatero Makonokaya.</s>

en: Macpherson Maulana, a journalist in Blantyre and a producer of radio programs on health, told VOA that government would do better to educate Malawians on the need for HIV testing so that people will go for tests on their own "without being pushed."
nya: A Macpherson Maulana, mtolankhani komanso wokonza ma pologalamu a zaumoyo  mu mzinda wa Blantyre anauza wailesi ya VOA kuti boma likuyenera kuphunzitsa anthu ubwino woyezetsa magatsi ndicholinga choti anthu akayezetse pawokha mosakakamizidwa.
mt0: <pad> Macpherson Maulana, a journalist in Blantyre and producer of radio programs on health, told VOA that government would do better to educate Malawians on the need for HIV testing so that people will go for tests on their own "without being pushed."</s>

en: "I fear it could end up into fights. You see it happened in Liberia recently where people who were coming to help people suspected to have contracted Ebola were even killed. So, civic education is the most important element for people to be encouraged to come out for testing voluntarily," said Maulana.
nya: Ndikuopa kuti izi zitha kuyambitsa kumenyana. Ku dziko la Liberia pompano anthu amene anapita kukathandiza anthu owaganizira kuti anali ndi matenda a Ebola anaphedwa. Choncho anthuwa akuyenera kuwaphunzitsa kuti alimbikitsidwe kukayezetsa mwakufuna kwawo,  anatero a Maulana.
mt0: <pad> Ndikuopa kuti zingachititse kusagwirizana. Inu mukuona zimene zachitika ku Liberia m'mbuyomu anthu amene anali kubwera kuthandiza anthu omwe amaganiza kuti ali ndi Ebola mpaka anaphedwa. Choncho, maphunziro a chitukuko cha anthu ndi chinthu chofunika kwambiri kuti anthu azikachita masewera a moyo wabwino popita kukayezetsa Ebola mwachikondi," adatero Maulana.</s>

en: However, HIV/AIDS counselor David Odali, whose NGO Umunthu Foundation runs HIV-related projects, insisted privacy will be protected.
nya: Mlangizi wa matenda a HIV a David Odali omwe ali ndi bungwe lawo logwira ntchito zokhudzana ndi matenda a Edzi lotchedwa Umunthu Foundation anatsimikiza kuti zinsinsi za anthu ndi zotetezedwa.
mt0: <pad> Komabe, wothandizira wa HIV/AIDS David Odali, amene NGO yake ya Umunthu Foundation imagwira ntchito zokhudzana ndi HIV, adanena kuti chidziwitso chidzakhala chotetezeka.</s>

en: "Confidentiality will be upheld. Lets consider the household setup. I think the first thing would be to provide group counseling to members of that family. [Of course] people can be tested while others are watching, but when it comes to disclosing the results, a counselor is supposed to disclose that results to each and every individual separately," said Odali.
nya: Zinsinsi za anthu zidzasungidwa, tikatengera mmene nyumba imakhalira, chinthu choyambilira ndi kulangiza anthu a nyumba yonse pamodzi. Kenako aliyense atha kuyezedwa pomwepo aliyense akuona koma popereka zotsatira za magazi mlangiziyo akuyenera kumuuza munthu aliyense payekha, anatero a Odali.
mt0: <pad> "Chidziwitso chidzakhala chobisika. Tiyeni tiwone nyumba yathu. Ndikuganiza kuti zinthu zoyamba zidzakhala kupereka chithandizo cha banja kwa anthu amene ali m'banjamo. [Zikutanthauza] anthu angayezedwe pamene ena akuwona, koma mukafika pakulengeza zotsatira, wothandizira ayenera kulengeza zotsatira za anthu aliyense mwapadera," adatero Odali.</s>

en: Odali said it will be up to the person who has been tested to disclose his or her status.
nya: A Odali anati zili kwa munthu yemwe wayezedwa kuulula zotsatira za magazi ake.
mt0: <pad> Odali anati ndi ntchito ya munthu amene wayezedwa kudziwa kuti ali ndi matenda kapena ayenera kunena za mbiri yake.</s>

en: In 2006, the charity Development Aid from People to People conducted door-to-door HIV testing in the district of Thyolo and Blantyre, reaching 400,000 people. The organization says it worked well.
nya: Mu chaka cha 2006 a Bungwe lothandiza anthu la Charity Development Aid from people to people anayeza magazi khomo ndi khomo anthu okwanira 400,000 mu maboma a Blantyre ndi Thyolo ndipo anati zinayenda bwino.
mt0: <pad> Mchaka cha 2006, bungwe la Development Aid from People to People linayamba kuyezetsa anthu 400,000 pa msewu kuti akapeze HIV mu dera la Thyolo ndi Blantyre. Bungwelo likuti ntchitoyi inali yabwino.</s>

en: Water Crisis Raises Fears of Waterborne Disease in Malawi
nya: Kusowa kwa  madzi kwabweretsa mantha kwa Malawi odzetsa matenda amene amayamba ndi madzi opanda ukhondo.
mt0: <pad> Nkhani ya madzi imapangitsa kuti anthu ambiri akhale ndi mantha otenga matenda amene amayambitsidwa ndi madzi.</s>

en: Malawians in the country's commercial capital, Blantyre, usually rely on tap water. But for the past five months, the taps have often run dry, forcing residents to draw water from unprotected sources like rivers and wells, while work is being done at the city main pumping station.The risk of contracting water-borne diseases is rising.
nya: A Malawi okhala mu mzinda wa malonda wa  Blantyre amadalira madzi a pa mpopi. Koma miyezi isanu yapitayi, mipopi yakhala youma zomwe zimakakamiza anthu kukatunga madzi ku zitsime ndi mitsinje komwe madzi ake siotetezedwa, izi zikuchitika pamene akukuakulu amu mzinda akupopa madzi kuchokera ku mgodi wawo. Njira yotengera matenda a madzi opanda ukhondo ikuchulukirabe.
mt0: <pad> Malawians ku Blantyre, likulu la malonda ladzikolo, amakhulupilira kwambiri pa madzi a m'mabotolo. Koma kwa masiku 5 apitawo, mabotolo akhala akusowa, zomwe zimapangitsa kuti anthu azithamanga kuchokera ku zochokera ku zinthu zopanda chitetezo monga mitsinje ndi makola, pomwe ntchito ikuchitika ku makina oyamwitsa a mzindawu. Chiopsezo chotenga matenda amene amakhudzana ndi madzi abwino ndikowonjezereka.</s>

en: In Blantyre and surrounding areas, residents have spent five days without tap water.
nya: Anthu a boma la Blantyre ndi malo ozungulira akhala masiku asanu opanda madzi ochokera pa mpopi.
mt0: <pad> M'mzinda wa Blantyre ndi malo ozungulira, anthu akhala masiku asanu ndi awiri popanda madzi a m'mabotolo.</s>

en: Women, who by Malawi tradition are responsible for household tasks, complain of the risks they face when fetching water from rivers far from residential areas.
nya: Azimayi amene pachikhalidwe amagwira ntchito za mnyumba adandaula pa zomwe akukumanazo pamene akumakatunga madzi ku mitsinje yakutali kuchokera kwawo.
mt0: <pad> Mkazi, amene mwachikhalidwe ndiwo amagwira ntchito zanyumba, akudandaula zangozi zimene amakhala nazo potenga madzi kuchokera ku mtsinje mbali ya malo okhala.</s>

en: Rhoda Milanzi, a housewife and mother of three, tells VOA the journeys through bushy footpaths are risky. "We wake up every day 2 a.m., sometimes 1 a.m., to go and collect water. There are so many risks. You see, sometimes we would meet witches, snakes on the way," she says, "even hyenas have been chasing us."
nya: A Rhoda Milanzi mzimayi wa ana atatu yemwe amakhala pakhomo, wauza wailesi ya VOA mmene maulendo odutsa mutchire amakhalira oopsa. "Timadzuka 2 koloko kapena 1 koloko mammawa kukatunga madzi. Pamakhala zoopsa zambiri.. Nthawi zina timakumana ndi afiti, njoka munjira, komanso afisi amatithamangitsa," iwo anatero.
mt0: <pad> Rhoda Milanzi, mkazi wa mwana wachitatu ndi mayi wa ana atatu, akuti ulendo wopita ku malo okhala ndi mitengo yambiri ndiwongozi. "Tikuuka m'mawa 2 koloko, kapena 1 koloko, kuti tiyende kukatenga madzi. Pali zovuta zambiri. Mwinanso nthawi zina tidzakumana ndi anthu ankhanza, njovu, pa njira," iye anati, "mpaka nyama zakutchire zayamba kutisaka."</s>

en: Milanzi says to ease the burden of carrying water home for bathing, women prefer to bathe in the river. But she says they have been disturbed by youths who hide in the nearby bush.
nya: A Milanzi anati pochepetsa ntchito yosenza madzi osamba kupita nawo kwawo, azimayi amasankha kusamba mu mtsinjewo. Koma anati amasokonezedwa ndi achinyamata omwe amabisala mu tchire lapafupi.
mt0: <pad> Milanzi akuti kuti athetse mtima wotenga madzi kunyumba kwawo, amayi amayamba kusambira mu nyanja. Koma akuti anawo adawaononga ndi anthu amene amabisalira mu nkhalango yapafupi.</s>

en: "These youths of today would come there and hide somewhere to see us naked. This has been a major embarrassment. In fact we complained to the chiefs about it.
nya: "Achinyamata amasiku anowa amabwera kubisala  ndikumatisuzumila tili amaliseche. Zimatichititsa manyazi kwambiri ndipo tinakadandaulako kwa amfumu.
mt0: <pad> "Anthu a masiku ano adzabwera ndipo adzabisika kuti atione atali n'kudya. Izi zakhala zochititsa manyazi kwambiri. Mpaka pano, tinadandaula kwa makolo athu za izi.</s>

en: They punished some of them, but you know they would sometimes climb trees just to look at older women like us taking a bath," she explains.
nya: Ena  mwa iwo analandira chilango , komabe nthawi zina amakwera mmitengo ndicholinga choonera azimayi akuluakulu ngati ife tikamasamba, iwo anafotokoza.
mt0: <pad> Anthu ena anawazunza, koma mukudziwa kuti nthawi zina ankakhala m'mapiri kuwona akazi achikulire ngati ife tikumwa masewera," iye anafotokoza.</s>

en: The water problem also has affected the delivery of health services.
nya: Vuto la madzili lakhudza kagwiridwe ntchito ka zaumoyo
mt0: <pad> Mvuto la madzi likukhuzanso kupereka chithandizo cha zaumoyo.</s>

en: Three weeks ago, authorities at Queen Elizabeth Central Hospital in Blantyre confirmed that they had suspended surgical operations due to water scarcity.
nya: Masabata atatu apitawo akuluakulu a chipatala  cha Queens mu mzinda wa Blantyre anatsimikiza kuti aimitsa kuchita ma opaleshoni kamba ka kusowa kwa madzi.
mt0: <pad> M'ma sabata atatu yapitayo, akuluakulu ku Queen Elizabeth Central Hospital ku Blantyre adanena kuti iwo adayimitsa ma opaleshoni othandizira opaleshoni chifukwa cha kusowa kwa madzi.</s>

en: Health rights campaigners warn of the possible outbreak of waterborne diseases, especially in densely populated areas, if the situation is left unresolved.
nya: Anthu omenyera ufulu wa zaumoyo achenjeza  anthu zokhudza matenda oyamba ndi madzi opanda ukhondo makamaka mmadera omwe muli anthu ochuluka ngati zinthu sizisintha.
mt0: <pad> Kampani ya ufulu wa zaumoyo yatichenjeza kuti matenda osiyanasiyana omwe amayenda ndi madzi, makamaka m'magawo amene ali ndi anthu ambiri, angathe kutulukira, ngati zinthu sizithandize.</s>

en: Officials at the Blantyre Water Board attribute the problem largely to an ongoing European Union-funded project that seeks to install new pumping machines at Walkers Ferry, the main pumping station.  Priscilla Mateyu, the spokesperson for the Blantyre Water Board, says the project is expected to increase water production capacity to 105,000 cubic meters per day from the current daily production of 78,000 cubic meters.
nya: Ogwira ntchito ku Bungwe loona za madzi la Blantyre waterboard ati vutoli likuchokera ku ntchito yoika makina atsopano opopera madzi ku Walkers Ferry  mothandizidwa ndi ndalama zochokera ku European Union. Mneneri wa Blantyre water board anati ntchitoyi ikuyenera kuchulutsa kapangidwe ka madzi kufika pa ma mita a madzi okwana 105,000 patsiku kuchokera pa 78,000 kwapano.
mt0: <pad> Akuluakulu a Blantyre Water Board akupereka vutoli kwambiri chifukwa cha ntchito ya European Union yomwe ikuyang'ana kukhazikitsa makina atsopano opumpira madzi ku Walkers Ferry, malo o pumpira madzi akuluakulu. Priscilla Mateyu, woyankhulana wa Blantyre Water Board, akuti ntchitoyi idzawonjezera mphamvu ya kupanga madzi ku 105,000 cubic meters pa tsiku kuchokera ku 78,000 cubic meters amene amapangidwa masiku ano.</s>

en: "January is when the project is finishing. But for the new machines and everything else to start working properly, we have to wait until March [2015]. That's when we expect the levels would increase and also production capacity improving to least what we expect it to be," Mateyu said.
nya: Ntchitoyi imalizika mwezi wa Januwale. Pakadali pano kuti makinawa ayambe kugwira ntchito bwinobwino tikuyenera kudikira mwezi wa Malichi (2015). Apa ndipamene tikuyembekeza kuti mlingo wa madzi uchuluka komanso madziwo azipezeka ambiri kusiyana ndi mmene ziliri pano,  iwo anafotokoza.
mt0: <pad> "Januware ndi nthawi imene ntchitoyi imamaliza. Koma kuti makina atsopano ndi zinthu zonse zayamba kugwira ntchito mwabwino, tiyenera kulinda mpaka Marichi [2015]. Nthawi imeneyo tidzayembekezera kuti mlingo wa njira zopanga idzawonjezereka komanso luso lathu lopanga lidzaphulika pafupifupi ngati momwe tikufuna," Mateyu adatero.</s>

en: The local consumer rights watchdog, the Consumers Association of Malawi, had been planning to hold vigils at the water board until the water supply was normalized, but the board asked protesters to hold off, promising to distribute water to residents through mobile water tanks.  The consumer rights group has given the water board two weeks to fulfill its commitment before proceeding with the protests.
nya: Bungwe la Consumers Association of Malawi lomwe limayang'anira anthu ogula zinthu mmisika, lakhala likukonzekera m'bindikiro ku Waterboard pofikila madzi atayambanso kutuluka bwinobwino, koma ogwira ntchito ku Waterboard anawauza anthuwa kuti aime kaye, powalonjeza kuti iwo akhala akupereka madzi mmakomo mwa anthu kudzera mu ma tanki awo. A Bungweli apereka masabata awiri kwa a Waterboard kuti akwanilitse lonjezo lawo asanapitilire ndi zionetsero zawo.
mt0: <pad> Mtundu wa anthu okonda kugula zinthu, Consumers Association of Malawi, unali kuganiza zochita ziwonetsero pa bwalo lamadzi mpaka mzere wamadzi ukhale wokhazikika, koma bwalo lamadzi linapempha anthu okonda kugula zinthu kuti asinthe maganizo awo, popeza boma limene linapereka ndalama zambiri zamadzi kupita kwa anthu okhala ndi mabotolo amadzi. Gulu la anthu okonda kugula zinthu lapatsa bwalo lamadzi masiku awiri kuti likwaniritse lonjezo lake asanapitirize kuchita ziwonetsero.</s>

en: Malawi President Under Fire for Giving Money to Journalists
nya: Mtsogoleri wa dziko la Malawi ali pa moto kamba kopereka ndalama kwa atolankhani.
mt0: <pad> Mkulu wa boma la Malawi akuimbidwa mlandu wopereka ndalama kwa olemba mauthenga</s>

en: Malawi President Peter Mutharika is under fire for giving envelopes containing $125 to more than 80 media people at a dinner he hosted last month in Blantyre. The editor of the privately owned Times Television said reporters were told the envelopes contained the presidents plans for the media - which has been critical of the governments economic performance.
nya: Mtsogoleri wa dziko la Malawi a Peter Mutharika ali pa moto popereka ndalama zokwa 125 dolazi kwa ogwira ntchito nyumba zofalitsa nkhani okwana makumi asanu ndi atatu pa mgoneri omwe anachititsa mu mzinda wa Blantyre mwezi watha. Wokonza nkhani wa wailesi ya  kanema ya TImes Television anati atolankhaniwo anauzidwa kuti muma envelopuwo  munali ma pulani a mtsogoleriyo okhudza nyumba zofalitsa nkhani zomwe zakhala zikuvutitsa kayendetsedwe cha chuma cha boma.
mt0: <pad> President Peter Mutharika wa Malawi akuimbidwa mlandu chifukwa chopatsa anthu ochuluka a media maenvelopes okwana $125 pa chisangalalo chomwe adachita mu Blantyre mwezi watha.</s>

en: In his column published in Malawis Sunday Times newspaper, editor Grecian Tukula said he was not sure why the money was given to journalists at the state dinner.
nya: Mu tsamba lawo lomwe analemba Lamulungu mu nyuzi ya Sunday Times a Gretian Tukula anati iwo sakudziwa chifukwa chenicheni chomwe atolankhani anawapatsira ndalamayo ku mgonero wa bomawo.
mt0: <pad> M'nkhani yake yomwe inatulutsidwa mu nyuzipepala ya Sunday Times, wolemba Grecian Tukula adati sanadziwe chifukwa chimene ndalama zimenezi zinaperekedwa kwa olemba mauthenga pa chisangalaro cha mzinda.</s>

en: Tukula said he initially decided to return the money but reversed the decision to avoid "creating a scene."
nya: A Tukula anati analingalira zokabweza ndalamayo koma anabweza chiganizo chawo posafuna kuchititsa mpungwepungwe.
mt0: <pad> Tukula adati iye adaganiza zobwezeranso ndalama koma adasintha chisankho chake pofuna kupewa "kupanga nkhani."</s>

en: But the editor for the Weekend Nation newspaper, George Kasakula, told VOA that he returned the money right away.
nya: Koma mlembi wa nyuzipepala ya Weekend Nation  a George Kasakula anauza wailesi ya VOA kuti iwo anabweza ndalamayo nthawi yomweyo.
mt0: <pad> Koma wolemba nkhani wa magazini ya Weekend Nation, George Kasakula, adauza VOA kuti adabwezeranso ndalama mwamsanga.</s>

en: "I just felt it was not right for me to receive the money, so I returned it. My understanding is that if someone invites me to a workshop, its their duty to ensure that they feed me, they accommodate me and they transport me. But in this case, I didnt see why I should get that allowance because I didnt spend anything to go to Sanjika [Palace]," said Kasakula.
nya: Ine ndinaona kuti sikunali koyenera kulandira ndalamayo, choncho ndinaibweza. Ine ndimadziwa kuti ndikaitanidwa kogwira ntchito kwina ndi udindo wawo kundidyetsa, kundipatsa malo ogona komanso mayendedwe. Koma ndi mmene zinaliri, sindinaone chifukwa chopatsilidwa ndalama poti sindinagwiritse  ntchito ndalama iliyonse kupita ku Sanjika, anatero a Kasakula.
mt0: <pad> "Ndinawona kuti ndalama iyi inali yosayenera kwa ine, ndipo ndinaibwezera. M'mene ndikudziwa, munthu akakundiitana ku workshop, ntchito yake ndiyo kuonetsetsa kuti ndili ndi chakudya, malo ogona ndiponso zonyamula. Koma m'nkhaniyi, sindinaone chifukwa chakuti ndili ndi ndalama zambiri zopita ku Sanjika [Palace]," adatero Kasakula.</s>

en: The issue has attracted more public attention after privately owned Capital Radio aired a story questioning the meaning of the cash handouts from the president.
nya: Nkhaniyi yachititsa chidwi chachikulu kwa anthu pamene  wailesi yoima payokha ya Capital Radio inaulutsa nkhani yofunsa tanthauzo la ndalama zinagawidwazi kuchokera kwa mtsogoleri wadzikoyu.
mt0: <pad> Nkhaniyi yatchuka kwambiri pamalo a chitukuko cha anthu ambiri atalengeza nkhani pa Capital Radio imene imayang'ana zomwe ndalama za msonkho zimapereka kwa anthu.</s>

en: "As Capital FM we serve the interest of the public. This issue has been all over the social media, and even we as a media are implicated [we believe] it is paramount that we follow up and get to the bottom of the matter," said Steven Dakalira, the head of news and current affairs at Capital Radio.
nya: Ife a wailesi ya Capital Radio timagwira ntchito  mokomera dziko. Nkhaniyi ili pa masamba onse ofalitsa nkhani, komanso ife ofalitsa nkhani takhudzidwa nawo, choncho ndikoyenera kutsatira nkhaniyi moyenera, anatero a Steve Dakalira, mkulu wa nkhani ku wailesi ya Capital radio.
mt0: <pad> "Ngati Capital FM, timatumikira zofuna za anthu. Nkhaniyi yakhala ikuzungulira ma media, ndipo ngakhale ife ngati nsanja tili kukhudzana [tikukhulupirira] kuti ndikofunikira kuti tifufuze ndikupeza choonadi," adatero Steven Dakalira, mkulu wa nkhani ndi nkhani za masiku ano ku Capital Radio.</s>

en: In his column in the Nyasa Times, Malawi professor of law Danwood Mzikenge Chirwa said what President Mutharika did by giving money handouts to journalists at a news event was tantamount to bribery. He has called on Mutharika to resign or face impeachment proceedings.
nya: A Danwood Mzikenge Chirwa mphunzitsi wa zamalamulo; mu tsamba lawo ya nyuzipepala ya Nyasa Times anati zomwe mtsogoleri wa dziko lino a Mutharika  popereka ndalama kwa atolankhani ku msonkhano womwe anachititsa kukufanana ndi mchitidwe wa katangale. Iwo auza a Mutharika kuti atule pansi udindo wawo kapena akonzekere kuchotsedwa pa mpando wawo.
mt0: <pad> Mwa nkhani yake mu Nyasa Times, mphunzitsi wa malamulo ku Malawi Danwood Mzikenge Chirwa adati zimene Purezidenti Mutharika adachita popatsa ndalama olemba nkhani pa chionetsero cha uthenga ndi zofanana ndi kupha. Iye anapemphera Mutharika kuti atule pansi udindo wake kapena ayenera kukhala ndi njira zochitira impeachment.</s>

en: Local civil society groups said that "by attempting to bribe the journalists" Mutharika subjected his leadership style to disrepute.
nya: Magulu a anthu omwe siaboma anati a Mutharika sanaonetse khalidwe labwino pamene amayesera kuchita katangale ndi atolankhaniwo.
mt0: <pad> Mabungwe a chitukuko cha m'deralo adanena kuti "pofuna kugula ma journalists" Mutharika waonetsa njira yake yoyang'anira dziko.</s>

en: Meanwhile, some journalists are donating the money to charity.
nya: Pakadali pano atolankhani ena akupereka ndalamayo ku chithandizo.
mt0: <pad> Mwamwayi, akuluakulu a nyuzipepala ena akupereka ndalama kwa anthu othandiza.</s>

en: Brian Ligomeka, the Managing Editor for the Times Group, told Times Television that all four employees there have donated the money to an orphanage.
nya: A Brian Ligomeka mkulu wa okonza nkhani ku Times Group, auza kanema ya Times television kuti ogwira ntchito anayi apereka ndalamayo kumalo osungila ana amasiye.
mt0: <pad> Brian Ligomeka, woyang'anira gulu la The Times Group, adauza Times TV kuti makampani anayi a kampaniyo adapereka ndalama ku malo othandizira ana.</s>

en: "At first we decided to return the money to the president but we later thought it wise to buy assorted items like sugar, salt, notebooks and donate it to needy children," said Ligomeka.
nya: "Poyambilira tinali ndi maganizo obwenza ndalamayo kwa mtsogoleri wathu koma tinaganiza mwanzeru kugula zinthu zosiyanasiyana ngati Shuga, mchere, makope ndi kukapereka kwa ana ovutika," anatero a Ligomeka.
mt0: <pad> "Poyamba tinaganiza zopereka ndalama kwa Purezidenti koma kenako tinaganiza zogula zinthu zosiyanasiyana monga mchere, saloza, mabuku ndipo tidalipira ndalama kwa ana amene alibe ndalama," adatero Ligomeka.</s>

en: In his latest Sunday Times column, Raphael Tenthani, who also writes for BBC, apologized on behalf of other journalists "for letting down the public that trust journalists unreservedly."
nya: Mu tsamba lomwe amalemba lamulungu lilironse a Ralph Tenthani amene amalemberanso nyumba yofalitsa nkhani yaikulu ya BBC, anapepesa mmalo mwa atolankhani ena pokhumudzwitsa anthu amene amakhulupilira atolankhani ndi mtima wonse.
mt0: <pad> Ndipo ngati simudziwa, mu magazini yake yachiwiri ya Sunday Times, Raphael Tenthani, amene amalembanso kwa BBC, adakhululukira anthu omwe amakhulupirira akuluakulu a nyuzipepala "poononga anthu omwe amakhulupirira akuluakulu a nyuzipepala popanda kukayika."</s>

en: Tenthani has since donated the money for charity work and said that although the journalists could have done better if they returned the money right away, doing so would have been perceived as disrespect to the head of state.
nya: A Tenthani adapereka ndalamayo ku chithandizo ndipo anati  ngakhale atolankhaniwo anakachita bwino kukabwenza ndalamayo nthawi yomweyo, kutero kunakoneka ngati kusalemekeza mtsogoleri wadziko.
mt0: <pad> Tenthani wapereka ndalama zambiri ku ntchito ya chitukuko ndipo adati ngakhale olemba mauthenga angadacite bwino kuti abwerere ndalama mwamsanga, zimenezi zingaoneke ngati kusalemekeza mkulu wa dziko.</s>

en: Maclan Kanyangwa, who heads the Department of Journalism and Media Studies at the Polytechnic College of the University of Malawi, said a media code of ethics bars journalists from accepting payment on a story.
nya: A Maclan kanyangwa mkulu wa chigawo cha atolankhani ndi maphunziro a zofalitsa nkhani ku sukulu ya ukachenjede ya Polytechnic anati malamulo  a utolankhani amawaletsa kulandira ndalama pa nkhani iliyonse.
mt0: <pad> Maclan Kanyangwa, amene amayang'ana za maphunziro a nyuzipepala ndi zofufuza za media ku Polytechnic College of the University of Malawi, adati mfundo ya chikhalidwe cha anthu ambiri imaletsa nsanja za nyuzipepala kulandira malipiro pa nkhani.</s>

en: "Obviously the meeting at the palace was the newsworthy event. There was a possibility that something was going to be published. And in the event that this payment would have influenced journalist decision [on news judgment], then that becomes a problem," said Kanyangwa.
nya: "Mwachidziwikire msonkhanowu unali nkhani yaikulu yoyenera kudziwika kwa anthu. Panali kuthekera koti nkhaniyi ilembedwa mu masamba. Inakakhala kuti ndalamayi yasintha maganizo a atolankhani mu kaweluzidwe kawo ka nkhani, linakakhala vuto .' anatero  a Kanyangwa.
mt0: <pad> "Zikuoneka kuti nkhani ya msonkhano ku bwalo la chifumu idali nkhani yodabwitsa. Kunali kuthekera kuti chinachake chidzatulutsidwa. Ndipo ngati malipiro amenewa akanakhala ndi mphamvu pa zomwe zikunenedwa, ndiye kuti vuto likhalapo," adatero Kanyangwa.</s>

en: Kanyangwa said he feels many journalists failed to return the money immediately because they might have been out of their ethical senses when they got the money.
nya: A Kanyangwa anati akuona ngati atolankhani ambiri sanabweze ndalamayo chifukwa sanaganizire bwinobwino pamene alalandira.
mt0: <pad> Kanyangwa anati iye amaona kuti akuluakulu a nyuzipepala ambiri adalephera kubweza ndalama mwamsanga chifukwa chakuti mwina adali ndi makhalidwe oipa pamene adapeza ndalama.</s>

en: Efforts to talk to Presidential Press Officer Fredrick Ndala were not successful. But some government authorities say the payment was not a bribe but meant for a fuel refund to those who attended the night event.
nya: Njira zonse zomwe tinayesa kulankhula ndi  mneneri wa mtsogoleri wa dziko a Fredrick Ndala sizinatheke. Koma akuluakulu ena a  boma anati ndalamayi siinali yakatangale koma inali yowabwezera ya mafuta a galimoto kwa anthu amene anabwera ku mwambowo.
mt0: <pad> Ntchito zoyankhulana ndi Mkulu wa Ofesi ya Purezidenti Fredrick Ndala sizinachitike. Koma akuluakulu aboma akuti malipirowa sanali ndalama za msonkho koma kuti ndalama zimenezi zikaperekedwe kwa anthu amene adapita ku chikondwerero cha usiku.</s>

en: Report: Manufacturing Could Free Poorest Nations From Poverty
nya: Lipoti: Maiko osaukitsitsa atha kuthetsa unphwawi pozipangila zipangizo pawokha mu mafakitale.
mt0: <pad> Report: Manufacturing Could Free Poorest Countries From Poverty</s>

en: A new United Nations report urges the poorest countries in the world to shift from low- to high-productivity activities to improve their economies.
nya: Lipoti latsopano la Bungwe la United Nations lalimbikitsa maiko osaukitsitsa kuti asunthe kapangidwe kawo ka zinthu kufika patali ndicholinga chosintha chuma cha maiko awo.
mt0: <pad> Nkhani yatsopano ya United Nations imalimbikitsa mayiko osauka kwambiri padziko lapansi kusintha kuchokera ku magwiridwe antchito ochepa kupita ku magwiridwe antchito opambana kuti awonjezere ndalama zawo.</s>

en: In its annual Least Developed Countries Report, UNCTAD — the U.N. Conference on Trade and Development — says these countries must structurally transform their economies to free themselves from the "poverty trap," which is stunting economic growth and development.
nya: Mu lipoti la pa chaka lokhudza maiko osatukuka, a UNCTAD, ku msonkhano wa za ndalama ndi chitukuko anati maiko osaukawa akuyenera kudzimasula okha mu ngodya ya umphawi , yomwe ikuchedwetsa chitukuko ndi kusintha kwa chuma chawo.
mt0: <pad> M'nkhani yake yachaka ndichaka ya mayiko omwe sanafike pachimake, UNCTAD - Conference on Trade and Development - akuti mayiko amenewa ayenera kusintha mwadongosolo mabizinesi awo kuti apulumuke "m'ndende ya umphawi," yomwe imapangitsa kuti chuma chawo chikhale chokhazikika komanso kukhala ndi chitukuko.</s>

en: Of the 48 nations the U.N. considers "Least Developed Countries" (LDCs), only one, Laos, is on track to achieve all seven of the Millennium Development Goals (MDG's) by 2015.
nya: Pa maiko 48 amene bungwe la UN limati ndi osatukuka, dziko limodzi lokha  la Laos ndilimene likupita kokwanitsa zinthu zisanu ndi ziwiri zomwe likufuna pa njira yotchedwa Millenium development goals mu pofika chaka cha 2015.
mt0: <pad> Mwa mayiko 48 omwe UN amaona kuti ndi "mayiko osapita patsogolo", limodzi, Laos, ili pa mzere kukwaniritsa zonse zisanu za Zolinga za Chitukuko cha Millenium (MDGs) mu 2015.</s>

en: Only four African countries — Ethiopia, Malawi, Rwanda and Uganda — are likely to meet a majority of these targets.
nya: Maiko anayi okha mu Afilika, Ethiopia, Malawi, Rwanda ndi Uganda  ndi amene atha kukwanitsa zolinga zawo.
mt0: <pad> M'mayiko inayake anayi ku Africa — Ethiopia, Malawi, Rwanda ndi Uganda — ndizotheka kuti zikwaniritse magawo ambiri a zolinga izi.</s>

en: This assessment is particularly grim in light of the even greater challenges awaiting these countries in the coming years. The MDGs set a goal for nations to halve their poverty levels by 2015. The so-called Sustainable Development Goals, which carry on from where the MDGs leave off, call for eradication of poverty by 2030.
nya: Ntchito yomwe maikowa anapatsidwa itha kukanika  chifukwa cha mavuto akuluakulu amene maikowa angakumane nawo zaka zikubwerazi. A MDGs anaika malire kwa maiko osaukawa kuti achepetse umphawi ndi theka pofika chaka cha 2015. zomwe maikowa akufuna atafikira kuchokera pomwe a MDGs anasiyira zitha kuthetsa umphawi pofika chaka cha 2030.
mt0: <pad> Nkhaniyi ndi yovuta kwambiri poganizira kuti mayiko amenewa adzakumana ndi mavuto akuluakulu m'zaka zapitazo. MDGs inali kukhazikitsa cholinga chakuti mayiko achepetse kuchuluka kwa umphawi wawo mpaka 2015. Ma Sustainable Development Goals, omwe amapitilira MDGs, akufuna kuletsa umphawi mpaka 2030.</s>

en: According to Taffere Tesfachew, an UNCTAD official who works with African nations, it would be nothing short of a miracle for the LDCs to pull this off.
nya: A Taffere Tesfachew a bungwe la UNCTAD lomwe limagwira ntchito ndi maiko a ku Afilika anati zidzatengera chozizwa kuti mabungwe a LDCs adzathe kuchita izi.
mt0: <pad> Mwachidziwikire Taffere Tesfachew, mkulu wa UNCTAD amene amagwira ntchito ndi mayiko a Africa, zidzakhala zovuta kwambiri kuti LDCs zikwaniritse izi.</s>

en: In order for the least developed countries to achieve this miraculous performance, he says they will need to structurally change their economies.
nya: Kuti maiko osatukukawa adzafikire pamenepa, akuyenera kusintha kagwiritsidwe ntchito ka chuma chawo.
mt0: <pad> Kuti mayiko omwe sanafike pachimake akwanitse kukwaniritsa izi, iye akuti ayenera kusintha kwambiri mabizinesi awo.</s>

en: He tells VOA this means shifting labor from activities with low productivity, such as small-scale agriculture and services to more dynamic activities with higher productivity, such as manufacturing and high-value services.
nya: Iwowa anauza wailesi ya VOA kuti izi zikutanthauza kuti kapangidwe ka zinthu komanso ulimi ukuyenera kusuntha kuchoka pa zokolora zochepa kufika ku zambiri, komanso anati akuyenera kupanga zinthu zobweretsa phindu lalikulu.
mt0: <pad> Iye anati kwa VOA izi zikutanthauza kusamutsa ntchito kuchokera ku makampani otsika m'magwiridwe antchito, monga nsanja zakumunda ndi utumiki, kupita ku makampani opatsa ndalama zochuluka, monga mafakitale ndi utumiki wabwino.</s>

en: "Countries that have moved up are the ones that are creating opportunities for those that are leaving agriculture to engage in things where they add value, where they get training and as it happens, manufacturing tends to have that sort of feature, that is why this call for manufacturing," he said. "Countries that are using policies to shift and influence capital and labor to move into this activity sector tend to do better."
nya: "Maiko amene zinthu zawo zasintha ndi amene akupereka mwayi kwa anthu amene anasiya ulimi kuti akachite zinthu zina zoonjezera phindu, komwenso angachite maphunziro ake,  iwo anatero," "Maiko amene amagwiritsa ntchito mfundo izi polimbikitsa ntchito yopanga zinthu okha amachita bwino."
mt0: <pad> "Mayiko amene adapita patsogolo ndi mayiko amene amapanga mwayi kwa anthu omwe akusiya nchito za ulimi kuti akagwire ntchito zowonjezera phindu, kuphunzira ndipo monga zimachitikira, luso la mafakitale limakhala ndi choncho, chifukwa chake pempho la luso la mafakitale," iye anatero. "Mayiko amene amagwiritsa ntchito ndondomeko zosintha ndikukhudza ndalama ndi antchito kuti apite mu gawo la ntchito zachuma amachita bwino."</s>

en: Tesfachew says these high-productivity sectors tend to pay higher wages and create a demand for goods. This, he says, encourages investment.
nya: A Tesfachew anati  zigawo zopanga katundu wochuluka malipiro ake amakhala ambiri komanso amabweretsa msika wa katunduyo. Iwo anati izi zimalimbikitsa  kuikako ndalama.
mt0: <pad> Tesfachew akuti magawo amenewa abwino kwambiri amapereka malipiro ambiri ndipo amapanga kufunika kwa zinthu. Izi, iye anati, zimalimbikitsa chitukuko.</s>

en: On the surface, it appears that the LDCs are not doing badly. UNCTAD economic data show growth in these poor countries between 2002 and 2008 exceeded the seven percent target set by the international community. And, even after the 2008 financial crisis, UNCTAD notes the LDCs grew faster than other developing countries, at an average of 5.7 percent per year.
nya: Zikuonetsa kuti a maiko a LDCs sakulephera kwambiri. Malipoti a ndalama a  bungwe la UNCTAD anaonetsa kusintha kwa maiko osaukawa pakati pa chaka cha 2002 ndi 2008 komwe anapitiliza mulingo wa 7 pelesenti omwe iwo amayenera kufikira. Ngahale papatatha vuto la ndalama la mu chaka cha 2008, bungwe la UNCTAD linaona kuti maiko osaukawa anachita bwino msanga kusiyana ndi maiko amene akutukuka ndi 5.7 pelesenti chaka chilichonse.
mt0: <pad> Mwachiwonekero, ma LDCs zikuoneka kuti akuchita bwino. Ma data achuma a UNCTAD amasonyeza kuti kuwonjezeka kwa mayiko amenewa pakati pa 2002 ndi 2008 kuposa chiyembekezo cha anthu wamba omwe adayika. Ndipo ngakhale pambuyo pa 2008 ndalama zachuma, UNCTAD inanena kuti ma LDCs adakula mwachangu kuposa mayiko ena oyamba kumene, pa mlingo wa 5.7 per cent pachaka.</s>

en: But U.N. economists say the outlook for the least developed countries in the short and medium term remains uncertain. They say increasing peoples productivity is the best way to break the patter of human and economic underdevelopment that continues to entrap them in poverty.
nya: Olondoloza ndalama a bungwe la U.N anati  maiko osatukukawa tsogolo lawo silikuoneka kwenikweni mu nthawi yochepa kapena yapakatikati. Iwo anati  kuchulutsa mlingo wa zinthu zopangidwa ndi anthu ndi njira imodzi yothetsera kusatukuka komwe kudakawaika mu umphwawi.
mt0: <pad> Koma akuluakulu a UN akuti tsogolo la mayiko osauka kwambiri likukhala losowa choonadi. Awo akuti kuwonjezera luso la anthu ndi njira yabwino yothetsa vuto la kusapeza zinthu zabwino komanso kulephera kwachuma komwe kumapitilira kuwapangitsa kuti akhale mu njala.</s>

en: UN: Most African Nations to Miss 2015 MDG Goals
nya: UN: Maiko ambiri a ku Afilika alephera kufikira zolinga za chitukuko zotchedwa MDG za chaka cha 2015.
mt0: <pad> UN: Mayiko ambiri ku Africa adzalephera kukwaniritsa zolinga za MDG za 2015</s>

en: Most African countries will not reach the Millennium Development Goals set for 2015 because of the gap between economic and human development. That is one of the conclusions in this years annual U.N. report on the Least Developed Countries, presented Thursday.
nya: Maiko ambiri amu Afilika safikira zolinga zawo za chitukuko kufikira chaka cha 2015 chifukwa chakusiyana komwe kulipo pakati pa ndalama ndi chitukuko cha anthu. Izi zinali chimodzi cha mathero a kukambilana mu lipoti lokhudza maiko osatukuka  la bungwe la U.N lomwe linapelekedwa Lachinayi.
mt0: <pad> Nchifukwa cha kusiyana kwa chuma ndi chitukuko cha anthu, mayiko ambiri a Africa sakwanitsa zolinga za Millennium Development Goals zomwe zinakhazikitsidwa mu 2015 chifukwa cha kusiyana kwa chuma ndi chitukuko cha anthu.</s>

en: Junior Davis, U.N. economic affairs officer for Africa, said African countries have not been able to translate their economic growth into structural transformation.
nya: A Junior Davis amene amayan'ganira nkhani zokhudza ndalama mu Afilika kuchokera ku bungwe lla U.N, anati maiko a ku Afilika sanakwanitse  kusintha makulidwe a chuma chawo kupita ku kachitidwe ka mphamvu kopindulitsa.
mt0: <pad> Junior Davis, woyang'anira zachuma ku UN ku Africa, adati mayiko aku Africa sanakwanitse kusintha kukwera kwawo kwachuma kukhala kusintha kovuta.</s>

en: "We think that is the case because these countries have not focused efficiently on building what we call their productive capacities," Davis said. "These are the basic human and economic development capacities that are needed to promote sustainable economic development. And the MDG, as they were constructed, largely ignored the need to develop the productive capacities."
nya: Tikuona  ngati izi zili choncho chifukwa maikowa salimbikira kumanga kapena kuchita malonda ndi zinthu zomwe zingawabweretsere  phindu lochuluka, anatero a Davis.  Izi ndi zinthu zomwe zingabweretse  chitukuko cha chuma chokhazikika. Mmene malamulo  a MDGs anakonzedwera, kwakukulu amanyalanyaza kufunika kosintha zinthu zowabweletsera phindu.
mt0: <pad> "Tikuganiza kuti izi ndi chifukwa chakuti mayiko awa sanayang'ane mwakhama kumanga zomwe timatcha maluso awo opanga zinthu," Davis adatero. "Zimenezi ndi maluso ofunika kwambiri a anthu komanso chuma amene amafunikira kuti dziko likhale labwino. Ndipo MDG, pamene zidapangidwa, zinakana kupanga maluso opanga zinthu."</s>

en: Slow progress
nya: Kupita patsogolo pang'onopang'ono.
mt0: <pad> Nthawi zambiri anthu amapita patsogolo mwamsanga.</s>

en: African countries also are not on course to halve poverty by 2015, and their overall progress on reducing hunger is relatively slow. Poverty limits human development and undermines productivity. And economic development is needed to make gains in human development.
nya: Maiko a mu Afilika Sali panjira yochepetsa umphawi ndi theka pofika chaka cha 2015, ndipo kupita pa tsogolo kwawo pochepetsa njala ndi kochedwa kwambiri. Umphawi umachepetsa chitukuko komanso uumapeputsa kachitidwe ka zinthu. Chitukuko cha zachuma chimayenera kupindula mu chitukuko cha anthu.
mt0: <pad> M'mayiko a Africa, mavuto a chilala nawo sanafike pachimake mu 2015, ndipo kusintha kwawo kochepetsa njala kuli mwachangu. Mavuto amachepetsa chitukuko cha anthu ndipo amaononga luso lathunthu. Ndipo kusintha kwachuma kumafunika kuti tikwaniritse chitukuko cha anthu.</s>

en: Ethiopia, Rwanda, Uganda and Malawi are the only African countries on track to reach the majority of the development goals. They are making progress because they heavily invested in areas that create sustainable development such as infrastructure, health and education.
nya: Maiko a Ethiopia, Malawi ndi Rwanda ndi amene ali mu njira yokwanitsa njira za chitukukozi. Iwowa akupita patsogolo chifukwa adayika ndalama mu zitukuko zokhazikika monga, zomangamanga, zaumoyo ndi maphunziro.
mt0: <pad> Ethiopia, Rwanda, Uganda ndi Malawi ndizo zilandi za Africa zokha zomwe zili pa mzere wokwaniritsa magawo ambiri a zolinga za chitukuko. Zimenezi zimachitika chifukwa chakuti ndalama zambiri zimagulidwa m'magawo amene amapanga chitukuko chokhazikika monga njira, zaumoyo ndi maphunziro.</s>

en: The post-2015 development agenda for fragile countries where governance remains an issue — such as South Sudan and the Democratic Republic of Congo — will still largely depend on support from the international community to achieve social and economic development, Davis said.
nya: Ndondomeko ya chitukuko ya chaka cha 2015 yokhudza maiko amene ulamuliro udakali nkhani yovuta, monga dziko la South Sudan ndi Democratic Republic of Congo, kwakukulu azidalirabe thandizo lochokera ku gulu la dziko lonse kuti  afikire chitukuko cha anthu ndi chuma, anatero a Davis. ndalama ndi chikhalidwe, anatero a Davis.
mt0: <pad> Mndandanda wa ntchito zopanga zinthu za m'madziko ovuta kumene utsogoleri ndi vuto — monga South Sudan ndi Republic of the Congo — udzatengera kwambiri pa chithandizo cha anthu wamba kuti akwaniritse chitukuko cha anthu ndi chuma, Davis adatero.</s>

en: Improvements in rural development, industrial productivity, agriculture and the services sectors in these countries will require "ways in which we can have a pattern of growth which is not just sustainable but jobs-rich," Davis said. "Because we see the growth in jobs and employment is central to any development strategy that aims to reduce poverty in a sustainable way."
nya: Kusintha chitukuko cha mmidzi, zokolola za makampani, ulimi ndi malo a ntchito mu maiko amenewa, payenera kukhala ndondomeko ya kukula kokhazikika komanso ntchito zolemera," anatero a Davis. "Chifukwa tikuona kuti pali kuchuluka kwa ntchito komanso kalembedwe ka ntchito komwe kwa khazikika pa njira yachitukuko iliyonse yochepetsera umphawi mokhazikika.
mt0: <pad> M'madziko amenewa, kusintha kwa chitukuko cha m'mudzi, kupanga zinthu za mafakitale, nchito za malonda ndi magawo a utumiki kudzafuna "njira zoti tikhale ndi chitsanzo cha kukula chomwe sichimangokhala chokhazikika koma chimakhala ndi ntchito zambiri," Davis said. "Pakuti timawona kuti kukula kwa ntchito ndi ntchito ndi chinthu chofunikira kwa ndondomeko iliyonse ya chitukuko yomwe imalingalira kuchepetsa umphawi mwa njira yosawonongeka."</s>

en: A country is placed on the Least Developed Countries list based on its per capita income, economic vulnerability, and human development indicators such as health and nutrition.
nya: Dziko  limaikidwa pa ndandanda wa maiko osatukuka limatengera ndalama zabomalo, kusatetezeka kwa chuma komanso chitukuko cha anthu kudzera mu zaumoyo ndi zakudya.
mt0: <pad> Mdziko limodzi limayikidwa pa mndandanda wa mayiko omwe ali ndi maphunziro ochepa potengera ndi ndalama za munthu, kulemera kwachuma, ndipo zizindikiro za chitukuko cha anthu monga zaumoyo ndi zakudya.</s>

en: Of the 48 least developed countries in the world, 34 are in Africa. Three countries have graduated from their least developed status: Botswana, Cape Verde and Samoa.
nya: Pa Maiko 43 osatukuka pa dziko lonse, 34 ali mu Afilika. Maiko amene asuntha pa mlingo wosatukuka ndi Botswana, Cape Verde ndi Samoa.
mt0: <pad> Mwa mayiko 48 omwe ali ndi maphunziro ochepa kwambiri padziko lapansi, 34 ali ku Africa. Mayiko atatu adamaliza maphunziro awo kuchokera ku maphunziro ochepa: Botswana, Cape Verde ndi Samoa.</s>

en: Strike Paralyzes Malawi's Judicial Services
nya: Kunyanyala ntchito ku ma ofesi oweruza milandu a ku Malawi kwaimitsa ntchito yawo.
mt0: <pad> Msonkhano wa Malawi uwononga maudindo a khothi</s>

en: A week-long strike by the support staff of Malawi's judiciary system has paralyzed the courts, causing overcrowding in police cells and the indefinite suspension of major cases - including government corruption trials. Court marshals, clerks and messengers are demanding the 30 percent salary increases promised by the government two years ago.
nya: Kunyanyala ntchito kwa sabata imodzi kwa anthu othandizira ntchito ku nthambi yoweruza milandu ya ku Malawi kwaimitsa ntchito za ma khoti, izi zachititsa kuchulukana mu malo amene amasungilamo anthu a kuba ku polisi komanso kuyimitsa milandu ikuluikulu monga ya katangale wa boma. Ma Marshal a khoti, ma kalaliki ndi ma mesinjala akufuna malipiro awo atakwezedwa kufika pa 30 pelesenti monga mmene boma linawalonjezera zaka ziwiri zapitazo.
mt0: <pad> A strike ya sabata imodzi ndi akuluakulu a Malawi's judiciary system idapangitsa kuti ma bwalo akhale osagwira ntchito, kuphatikizapo milandu yolimbana ndi corruption. Court marshals, clerks and messengers are demanding the 30 percent salary increases promised by the government two years ago.</s>

en: Chanting and singing around the court premises has become a pastime activity for the striking court workers since the onset of a sit-in last week.  Linley Hebert, a spokesperson for the striking workers, told VOA the strike is a result of the governments failure to honor a 2012 agreement.
nya: Kuimba mozungulira malo a khotilo kwakhala chizolowezi cha anthu onyanyala ntchitowo kuchokera sabata yatha. A Linley Herbert, woyankhulira anthu onyanyala ntchitowa wauza wailesi ya VOA kuti kunyanyala ntchitoku ndi kamba ka kulephera kukwaniritsa lonjezo lomwe boma linapereka mu mgwirizano wawo chaka cha 2012.
mt0: <pad> Ntchito za anthu ogwira ntchito za m'ma bwalo za bwalo zakhala zikuimba ndi kuyimba kuyambira pamene ayamba kugwira ntchito zao mulungu watha.</s>

en: "In October [this year], the government reviewed the salaries of the civil servants, but we were not included in that revision," Hebert said.
nya: Mu mwezi wa Okotobala chaka chino, boma linakonzaso malipiro a anthu ogwira ntchito mb'oma, koma ife sitinaikidwe nawo mgululi," anatero a Herbert.
mt0: <pad> "Mu Okutobala [chaka chino], boma linafufuza malipiro a anthu wamba, koma ife sitinaphatikizidwe mu kusinthaku," adatero Hebert.</s>

en: "Yet in 2012, we had an agreement that each time they are revising the salaries of the civil servants, [they will be increasing our salaries as well].
nya: "Pamene chaka cha 2012 tinagwirizana  nawo kuti pamene akukonza malipiro a ogwira ntchito, azionjezeranso malipiro athu.
mt0: <pad> "Ndipo mu 2012, tinagwirizana kuti nthawi iliyonse iwo akusintha malipiro a anthu wamba, [adzawonjezeranso malipiro athu].</s>

en: So, [after adhering to the agreement in 2013], we are surprised to see that this time we are left out."  Government authorities say the failure to increase judicial workers salaries this year is largely because of financial constraints, following a donor aid freeze against Malawi's government.
nya: Patatha mgwirizano wathu mu chaka cha 2013 tikudabwa kuti ulendo uno sanatiikepo." akuluakulu aboma anati kulephera kukweza malipiro kwa ogwira ntchito mu ofesi yoweruza milandu ndichifukwa cha mavuto a zachuma, kuchokera ku kusiya kulandira chithandizo kwa dziko la Malawi kuchokera kwa othandiza.
mt0: <pad> Ndiye, [m'mene tidakwaniritsa mgwirizano mu 2013], tikumva zodabwitsa kuti nthawi ino tikupitidwa kunja." Akuluakulu aboma akuti kulephera kwa kuwonjezera malipiro a anthu omwe amagwira ntchito za chilungamo ndi akuluakulu a bwalo la milandu ndikomwe kuli chifukwa chosowa ndalama, pambuyo pa zomwe donors adaletsa Malawi.</s>

en: The freeze is a result of a government financial scandal in which more than $30 million was looted from government coffers.  Ministry of Finance spokesperson Nations Msowoya told a local radio station it is hard for the government to meet the workers' demand.
nya: Kuimitsa kulandira thandizoku ndi chifukwa cha ndalama zoposa 30 miliyoni zomwe zinabedwa ndiogwira ntchito m'boma. Mneneri wa unduna wa za chuma a Nations Msowoya anauza wailesi ina kuti ndizovuta kuti dziko lifikire zofuna za ogwira ntchitowa.
mt0: <pad> Msonkho wa boma unayimirira chifukwa cha ndalama zambiri zomwe zinaba m'boma, ndipo ndalama zoposa $30 miliyoni zimalandidwa ku boma. Mkulu wa boma la Finance Nations Msowoya adauza malo owonera ma radio kuti boma linali ndi vuto lokwaniritsa zofuna za antchito.</s>

en: "It is difficult to promise what the treasury will do. But suffice to say that the prevailing economic circumstances and budgetary constraints will make a little bit difficult for the treasury to bow down to the demands," "Msowoya said.
nya: "Ndizovuta kulonjeza zomwe asungi chuma angachite. Koma titha kunena kuti ndimmene nyengo yachuma iliri ndi zopinga za bajeti, zikhala zovutirapo kuchita monga mmene iwo akufunira," anatero a Msowoya.
mt0: <pad> "N'zovuta kutsimikiziridwa zimene boma lidzachita. Koma ndicholinga chonena kuti zinthu zachuma ndi zochepa kwambiri pa ndalama zidzapangitsa kuti boma likhale ndi vuto lalikulu lokaniza mapemphero," Msowoya adatero.</s>

en: But according to Hebert, the strikers will not resume work until their demands are met.  "Since I was born [there has been] no time the government said it had some money.
nya: A Herbert anati athu onyanyala ntchitowo  sayambiranso  kugwira ntchito pokhapokha atalandira zofuna zawo. " Chibadwileni changa palibe nthawi yomwe a boma ananena kuti ali ndi ndalama.
mt0: <pad> Koma malinga ndi Hebert, anthu amene akugwira ntchito za boma sazayamba kugwira ntchito mpaka zofuna zawo zikwaniritsidwe. "Chifukwa chakuti ndinabadwa [there has been] no time the government said it had some money. Since I was born [there has been] no time the government said it had some money.</s>

en: It has its own means [of finding the money] and it will find the same means to give us the money," Hebert insisted.  The ongoing strike is hampering progress of trials, as court operations remain suspended.
nya: Boma liri ndi njira zake zopezera ndalama ndipo lipeza njira zomwezo kutipatsa ife ndalama," ananenetsa a Herbert. Kunyanyala ntchitoku kukusokoneza kuzenga milandu pamene ntchito za khoti zaimitsidwa.
mt0: <pad> Iye ali ndi njira zake zopeza ndalama, ndipo iye adzapeza njira zofananazo kuti atilembe ndalama," Hebert adawonjezera. Ntchito za bwalo zakhala zikuyimidwa, ndipo ntchito za khothi zikupitirira.</s>

en: Several trials, including that of former justice minister Ralph Kasambara, who is answering charges in connection with the financial scandal, were indefinitely suspended last week.
nya: Milandu yambiri kuphatikizapo wa nduna yakale za za chilungamo a Ralph Kasambara, amane akuyankha mlandu polumikizana ndi kuba ndalamaku inaimitsidwa sabata latha.
mt0: <pad> Ma trials ambiri, kuphatikizapo ya Ralph Kasambara, omwe akuimbidwa mlandu wogwirizana ndi nkhani zachuma, adayimirira kwa nthawi yayitali sabata yatha.</s>

en: Police are complaining of congestion in jail cells, as no suspects are being taken to court.
nya: Apolisi akudandaula kuchulukana kwa anthu mu ndende  pamene anthu owakaikira ndi milandu sakutengedwa ku khoti.
mt0: <pad> Poliisi akuti anthu ambiri ali m'ma cell a ndende, chifukwa anthu amene akuganizira kuti ndiwo akuimbidwa mulandu sakubwera ku bwalo la milandu.</s>

en: Malawi police spokesperson Rhoda Manjolo told VOA the only option they have is "giving police bail to those with minor offenses."   Human rights campaigners and legal experts say the strike is contributing to human rights violations.
nya: Mneneri wa polisi  a Rhoda Manjolo anauza wailesi ya VOA kuti kuti njira yokhayo yomwe alinayo ndi  kuwatulutsa kaye  anthu amene ali ndi zolakwa zazing'ono. Anthu omenyera ufulu ndi malamulo akuti kunyanyala ntchitoku kukuphwanya malamulo a ufulu wa anthu.
mt0: <pad> Mkulu wa apolisi ku Malawi Rhoda Manjolo adauza VOA kuti "njira yokha imene apolisi ali nayo ndi kuwapatsa bail kwa amene ali ndi zochita zazing'ono." Ogwira ntchito za ufulu wa anthu ndi akatswiri odziwa malamulo akuti kampeni ya apolisi ikuthandizira kuphwanya ufulu wa anthu.</s>

en: "There are those people who have to be taken to court within 48 hours," noted Lawyer George Kadzipatike who works in a private practice in the northern city of Mzuzu. "We cannot make application for them to be granted bail.
nya: "Pali anthu ena amene akuyenera kukaonekera ku khoti maola 48 asanathe," anatero oyimira milandu a George Kadzipatike amene amagwira ntchito pawokha ku mpoto kwa mzinda wa Mzuzu. "Sitingawalembele kuti iwo atulutsidwe kaye.
mt0: <pad> "Pali anthu amene ayenera kukhala m'bwalo la milandu mkati mwa masiku 48," adatero Mkulu wa Nthambi George Kadzipatike, amene amagwira ntchito mu mzinda wa Mzuzu kumpoto. "Sititha kupeleka pempho kuti akhale pa bail.</s>

en: There are those people who do not want to live with their partners, they would like the court to decree that they be divorced, we cannot file any petition through the courts."
nya: Pali anthu ena amene sakufuna kukhala limodzi ndi okondedwa awo, akufuna khoti litawasudzula, sitingakwanitse kupempha kudzera ku khoti."
mt0: <pad> Pali anthu amene safuna kukhala ndi mabanja awo, iwo amafuna kuti bwalo la milandu liwanene kuti athe kusiyanitsa, koma sitingathe kupeleka pemphero lililonse ku bwalo la milandu."</s>

en: Government authorities say closed door negotiations to resolve the matter continue in the capital, Lilongwe.  But the striking workers told VOA whatever the case, they will accept nothing short of a 30 percent increase in their salaries.
nya: Akuluakulu a boma anati akuchita zokambirana mu mzinda wa Lilongwe kuti alongosole nkhaniyi. Koma onyanyala ntchitoyi awuza wailesi ya VOA kuti iwo savomera kukwezedwa  malipiro ochepera 30%.
mt0: <pad> Akuluakulu aboma akuti maphunziro akupitirira ku Lilongwe, mzinda wa capital. Koma anthu amene akugwira ntchito za boma adauza VOA kuti zonse zimene zikuchitika, iwo sadzavomereza zochepa kwambiri kuposa kuchuluka kwa 30% kwa malipiro awo.</s>

en: A similar strike lasted three months in 2012 after the magistrates and judges joined the labor action.
nya: Kunyanyala ntchito ngati komweku kunatenga  miyezi itatu  mu chaka cha 2012 pamene oweruza milandu anachita nawo.
mt0: <pad> Msonkhano wofanana umenewo unatenga masiku atatu mu 2012, pambuyo pamene ma magistrate ndi ma judges adalowa m'chisankho cha ntchito.</s>

en: Famine in Southern Africa Worse Than Predicted - 2002-07-24
nya: Chilala ku mmwera kwa Afilika chiipiraipira kusiyana ndi mmene zinanenedwela- 2002-07-24
mt0: <pad> Njala ku South Africa - 2002-07-24</s>

en: The United Nations World Food Program says the famine in southern Africa is even worse than predicted. WFP officials are warning that 13 million people in six countries: Malawi, Zambia, Lesotho, Zimbabwe, Swaziland and Mozambique are in danger of starvation if they do not get food aid.
nya: Mgwirizano wa dziko lonse wokhudza chakudya ( United Nations World Food Program) wati chilala ku mmwera  kwa Afilika chaipiraipira kusiyana ndi mmene amaganizira. Akuluakulu a bungwe la WFP achenjeza  kuti anthu okwana 13 million mmaiko a Malawi, Zambia, Lesotho, Swazilandi ndi Mozambique  ali pa chiopsezo ngati salandira thandizo la chakudya.
mt0: <pad> UN World Food Program says the famine in southern Africa is even worse than predicted. WFP officials are warning that 13 million people in six countries: Malawi, Zambia, Lesotho, Zimbabwe, Swaziland and Mozambique are in danger of starvation if they do not get food aid.</s>

en: World Food Program officials say they need one million tons of food to alleviate hunger in southern Africa, but they are not confident they will get it. In an appeal to the international community at the beginning of July, WFP officials asked for more than $0.5 billion to buy food. So far they have received only 20 percent of that. WFP's director for the southern Africa region, Judith Lewis, says the situation is getting desperate. "The window of opportunity to avert what could be a major humanitarian crisis is closing," she said. "We need more assistance now. We need food on the high seas now, or we need cash to buy commodities that are still available in southern Africa, so we can avert this major, major crisis."
nya: Akuluakulu a World Food program ati akufunika  ma tani 1 million a chakudya kuti achepetse njala ku mmwera kwa Afilika, koma iwo alibe chikhulupiliro kwenikweni kuti atha kuchipeza. Pempho lomwe anapempha ku gulu lapadziko lonse lapansi kumayambiliro kwa mwezi wa Julayi, akuluakulu a  WFP anapempha ndalama zopitilira 0.5 biliyoni zogulira chakudya. Koma pakadali pano iwo alandira gawo la 20 pelesenti la ndalamayo. Wotsogolera gulu la WFP ku mmwera kwa Afilika a Judith Lewis, anati vutoli likupita kuwasowetsa chiyembekezo. "Mwayi omwe unapezeka  othetsera  vuto lalikululi ukutsekedwa," iwo anatero. "Tikufuna chithandizo chochuluka tsopano. Tikufuna chakudya chochuluka kapena ndalama zoti tigulire katundu yemwe adakapezeka kummwera kwa Afilika kuti tichepetse vuto lalikululi.
mt0: <pad> Akuluakulu a World Food Program (WFP) akuti iwo akufunika ma tonnes 1,000,000 a chakudya kuti athetse njala ku mwera kwa Africa, koma iwo sakukhulupirira kuti adzapeza ndalama zokwanira.</s>

en: Currently, the WFP is assisting six million of the most vulnerable people in the six most severely affected countries. About half of these people are in Zimbabwe. The agency says it is sure the number of people needing its help will rise.
nya: Pakadali pano bungwe la WFP likuthandiza anthu amene ali pa chiopsezo okwana 6 miliyoni ku maiko omwe akhudzidwa kwambiri. Theka la anthuwa ndi ochokera ku dziko la Zimbabwe. Nthambiyi inati ali ndi chikhulupiliro kuti chiwerengero cha anthuwa chikula.
mt0: <pad> Mpaka pano, WFP ikuthandiza anthu 6 miliyoni omwe ali ndi mavuto ambiri m'mayiko 6 amene adali ndi mavuto akulu. Pafupifupi hafu ya anthu amenewa ili ku Zimbabwe. Kampani imeneyi yati anthu ofunika thandizo lake adzawonjezereka.</s>

en: The World Health Organization notes southern Africa, in addition to having the highest prevalence of HIV/AIDS in the world, also has the world's highest chronic malnutrition rates. It predicts about 300,000 people could die over the next six months from diseases related to malnutrition.
nya: Bungwe loona zaumoyo dziko lonse lapansi la World Health Organisation lati maiko a  kummwera kwa Afilika  poonjezerapo kukhala ndi anthu ochuluka a matenda a Edzi padziko lonse, lilinso ndi chiwelengelo chochuluka cha anthu osoya zakudya  mthupi. iwo anati anthu 300,000 atha kufa ndi matenda osowa chakudyawa pa miyezi isanu ndi umodzi ikubwerayi.
mt0: <pad> M'bale wanga, ndisadziwa</s>

en: Ms. Lewis says the dying has already begun. "We are seeing people moving from their villages," she said. "If they know there is going to be a food distribution, they immediately go there. The problem is we do not even have enough food to feed the people who are on the rolls, let alone add food for other people in the areas. Is there a potential to become chaotic? Yes. "
nya: Mai Lewis anati anthu ayamba kale kufa. "anthu akumasamuka mmidzi mwawo, kupita ku malo omwe amvetsedwa kuti kuli chakudya. Vuto ndilakuti tilibe chakudya chokwanira choti tingawadyetse anthu omwe ali pa ndandandawa komanso omwe ali mmadera ena. Kodi pali kuthekera koti zitha kubweretsa chipwirikiti ? eya."
mt0: <pad> Ms. Lewis akuti kufa kwayamba kale. "Tikuwona anthu akusamukira ku midzi yawo," adatero. "Ngati adziwa kuti kuli kugawa chakudya, iwo amapita mwamsanga. Nkhani ndi yakuti tilibe zakudya zokwanira kudyetsa anthu amene ali pa ma roll, kusiyanitsa ndi kuwonjezera zakudya za anthu ena m'mabomawo. Kodi zingathe kukhala chaotic? Inde. "</s>

en: WFP'S Judith Lewis says at this time of year the agency is usually planning how to get food supplies into the region before the rainy season hits in October. But she says since the WFP is already having difficulty meeting its present targets, it can't even begin to plan for future food deliveries.
nya: A Judith Lewiis a bungwe la WFP anati nthawi ngati ino mu chaka chilichonse nthambiyi imakhala ikukonzekera mmene ingapezere chakudya cha maderawa nyengo yamvula isanayambe mu  mwezi wa Okotobala. Koma iwo anati poti bungwe la WFP likupeza kale mavuto kukwaniritsa  mmene amafunira, sangayambe kukonzekera ndondomeko ina yopereka zakudya mttsogolomu.
mt0: <pad> Judith Lewis wa WFP akuti m'chaka chino bungwe lawo limapanga njira zopeza chakudya mu dera lino musanafike nyengo ya mvula kuyamba mu Okutobala. Koma adati popeza bungwe la WFP likuyenera kukwaniritsa malengo ake, ndiye kuti likhoza kuyamba kuganiza za tsogolo.</s>

en: Canadian PM Impressed With African Development Plan - 2002-04-05
nya: Nduna yaikulu ya dziko la Canada yasangalatsidwa ndi ndondomeko ya chitukuko cha mu Afilika-2002-04-05
mt0: <pad> Canadian PM Impressed With African Development Plan - 2002-04-05</s>

en: Canadian Prime Minister Jean Chretien says he is impressed with the progress being made towards implementing an African development plan.
nya: Nduna yaikulu ya ku Canada a Jean Chretien anati iwo ndi okhutitsidwa ndi kupita patsogolo komwe kukuchitika pokafikila ndondomeko ya chitukukoyi mu  Afilika.
mt0: <pad> Canadian Prime Minister Jean Chretien says he is impressed with the progress made towards implementing an African development plan.</s>

en: Mr. Chretien made the remarks Sunday after meeting with South African President Thabo Mbeki and other regional leaders in Pretoria.
nya: A Mr. Chretien anaperenga ndemangayi Lamulungu atatha kukumana ndi mtsogoleri Wa dziko la South Africa, a Thabo Mbeki ndi atsogoleri ena a mmadera ku Pretoria.
mt0: <pad> Mwamuna Chretien adanena izi pamene adamaliza kucheza ndi Purezidenti wa South Africa Thabo Mbeki ndi atsogoleri ena a dera la Pretoria.</s>

en: Mr. Chretien, the current chairman of the group of the seven most industrialized nations plus Russia, is visiting Africa to discuss the New Partnership for Africa's Development, known as NEPAD.
nya: Mkulu wa gulu la maiko asanu ndi awiri omwe ali ndi mafakitale ochuluka kuonjezelapo dziko la Russia , a Mr. Chiretien akuyendera ku Afilika kuti akambilane mgwirizano wotukula dera la Afilika wotchedwa NEPAD.
mt0: <pad> Mr. Chretien, amene ndi mkulu wa gulu la mayiko asanu ndi limodzi omwe ali ndi makampani ambiri kuposa Russia, akuyendera Africa kuti akambirane za New Partnership for Africa's Development, imene imadziwika kuti NEPAD.</s>

en: He said NEPAD will be one of the top agendas at the June G-8 summit in Kananaskis, Canada.
nya: Iwo anati NEPAD idzakhala imodzi mwa zokambirana za msonkhano wa atsogoleri a maiko mwezi wa juni wotchedwa G-8 summit ku Kananaskis mu  dziko la Canada.
mt0: <pad> Iye anati NEPAD idzakhala chinthu chimodzi mwa zinthu zofunika kwambiri pa msonkhano wa G-8 ku Kananaskis, Canada mu Meyi.</s>

en: The G-8 nations are Britain, Canada, France, Germany, Italy, Japan, the United States and Russia.
nya: Maiko omwe ali mu gulu la G-8 ndi Britain, Canada, France, Germany, Italy, Japan, United States ndi Russia.
mt0: <pad> Mtundu wa G-8 ndi Britain, Canada, France, Germany, Italy, Japan, United States ndi Russia.</s>

en: Mr. Chretien says topics such as human rights, democracy the rule of law, transparency and good governance will be discussed at the G8 summit.
nya: a Mr. Chretien anati mitu yokambilana ngati ufulu wa anthu, ufulu olamulila wa demokalase, chilungamo ndi ulamuliro wabwino zikakambidwa ku msonkhano wa atsogoleri a G-8 wo.
mt0: <pad> Ms. Chretien anati zinthu monga ufulu wa anthu, ufulu wa chilungamo, ulamuliro wa lamulo, kuwonekera ndi kulamulira bwino zidzakambidwa pa msonkhano wa G8 summit.</s>

en: NEPAD outlines objectives of promoting democracy and good governance in Africa in return for Western economic assistance. It seeks to achieve an annual growth rate of seven-percent on the African continent by 2015.
nya: NEPAD inapereka zolinga zopititsa patsogolo demokalase ndi ulamuliro wabwino mu Afilika kuti iwo apeze chithandizo cha ndalama chochokera ku maiko a azungu. Iwo akuyembekeza kufikira kukula kwa pa chaka kokwana 7 pelesenti mu dera la Afilika pofika chaka cha 2015.
mt0: <pad> NEPAD imafotokoza zolinga zakulimbikitsa ufulu wa anthu ndi kulamulira bwino ku Africa m'malo mwa thandizo lachuma lakumpoto. Iye amafufuza kuti atenge gawo lachiwiri la chitukuko chadziko la Africa mu 2015.</s>

en: South African President Mbeki said he is convinced that Africa is ready for NEPAD saying there has been definite progress toward democracy in the continent.
nya: Mtsogoleri wa dziko la South Africa a Thabo Mbeki anati ndiwokhutitsidwa kuti Afilika yakonzekera bungwe la NEPAD ndipo anati pali kupita patsogolo ndi demokalase mu derali.
mt0: <pad> Mbeki, mtsogoleri wadziko la South Africa, adati iye ndi wokhulupirira kuti Africa ili wokonzeka ku NEPAD popeza ku continent kuli kusintha kwakukulu kwa chitukuko.</s>

en: Later, Mr. Chretien and Mr. Mbeki were joined by presidents Festus Mogae of Botswana, Bakili Muluzu of Malawi, Joaquim Chissano of Mozambique, Sam Nujoma of Namibia, Benjamin Makapa of Tanzania and Vice President Enoch Kavindele of Zambia.
nya: A mr. Chretien ndi a Mbeki anakumana ndi atsogoleri a maiko  monga a Festus Mogae a ku Botswana, Bakili Muluzi a ku Malawi, Joaquim Chissano a ku Mozambique, Sam Nujoma a ku Nambibia, Benjamin Makapa a ku Tanzania ndi wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri a Enoch Kavindele a ku Zambia.
mt0: <pad> M'bale Chretien ndi a Mbeki adali limodzi ndi atsogoleri adziko la Botswana, Bakili Muluzu wa Malawi, Joaquim Chissano wa Mozambique, Sam Nujoma wa Namibia, Benjamin Makapa wa Tanzania ndi Purezidenti Enoch Kavindele wa Zambia.</s>

en: Zimbabwe's President Robert Mugabe, who won re-election in disputed voting last month, was not invited.
nya: Mtsogoleri wa dziko la Zimbabwe a Robert Mugabe amene anawinanso masankho otsutsana mu dziko lawo, sanaitanidwe ku msonkhanowu.
mt0: <pad> Mtsogoleri wadziko la Zimbabwe Robert Mugabe, amene adapambana mu chisankho chovuta mwezi watha, sanapemphedwe.</s>

en: Reuters news agency reports the Canadian prime minister who has already visited Morocco, Algeria and Nigeria on his six-nation tour will visit Ethiopia and Senegal after South Africa.
nya: Bungwe lolemba nkhani lotchedwa Reuters News Agency lati nduna yaikulu ya dziko la Canada yayendera kale dziko la Morocco, Algeria ndi Nigeria pa ulendo wawo woyendera maiko asanu ndi limodzi. Iwo ayenderanso dziko la Ethiopia ndi Senegal akachoka ku South Africa.
mt0: <pad> Nsanja ya nkhani ya Reuters inanena kuti Purezidenti wa Canada amene adayendera Morocco, Algeria ndi Nigeria pa maulendo ake asanu adzayendera Ethiopia ndi Senegal pambuyo pa South Africa.</s>

en: Some information for this report provided by Reuters and AFP.
nya: Nkhani zina mu lipotili anapereka ndi  Reuters ndi a AFP.
mt0: <pad> Mfundo zina za nkhani iyi zidzaperekeddwa ndi Reuters ndi AFP.</s>

en: Child Labor in Malawi - 2002-02-28
nya: Kugwiritsa ntchito ana ku Malawi-2002-02-28
mt0: <pad> Child Labor in Malawi - 2002-02-28</s>

en: The organization, Eye of the Child, is expressing concern about what is says is a large number of children who are being forced to work due to poverty.
nya: Bungwe lotchedwa Eye of the Child, laonetsa kukhudziwa ndi chiwelengero chochuluka cha ana amene akukakamizidwa kugwira ntchito chifukwa cha umphawi.
mt0: <pad> Mtundu wa Eye of the Child, ukufotokoza kukhumudwa kwake ndi zomwe akuti ana ambiri akugwira ntchito chifukwa cha kuvutika.</s>

en: It says these children risk being abused.
nya: iwo anati ana amenewa amakhala pa chiopsezo chozunzidwa.
mt0: <pad> Iye akuti ana amenewa akuthamanga kukhala ndi matenda.</s>

en: Some under aged children work as mini – bus call boys in the busy business district of Limbe in the commercial capital, Blantyre. They are some of the many children who have been forced into employment because of poverty.
nya: Ana ena achichepere amagwira ntchito yoitanila ma minibasi ku boma la malonda la Limbe mu mzinda wa Blantyre.  Pali ana ena ambiri omwe amakakamizidwa kukagwira ntcito chifukwa cha umphawi.
mt0: <pad> M'bale ndi mlongo amene amagwira ntchito za mini bus ku Limbe, mzinda wa Blantyre. Iwo ndi ena mwa ana ambiri amene adaphedwa kuti apeze ntchito chifukwa cha njala.</s>

en: Maxwell Matewere is the executive director of Eye of the Child. He says many of the children come from rural areas. He says, "Currently we havent done a data analysis but the Ministry of Labor intends to do that as soon as possible with financial resources from the International Labor Organization.
nya: A maxwell Matewere ndi mkulu woyang'anira bungwe la Eye of the Child. Iwo anati  ana ambiri amachokera kumamidzi. Iwo anati , "pakadali pano sitinapange kaundula koma a  unduna wa zantchito akukonzekera kutero ndi ndalama zochokera  ku bungwe lapadziko lonse ,loona za ntchito.
mt0: <pad> Maxwell Matewere ndi mkulu woyang'anira Eye of the Child. Iye akuti mabanja ambiri a ana amenewa amabwera ku malo okhalamo. Iye akuti, "Panopa sitilikuchita kafukufuku wa data koma Ministry of Labor intended to do that as soon as possible with financial resources from the International Labor Organization.</s>

en: But basing on our own assessment and through our works, we feel child labor is a serious problem particularly in the rural areas and you can tell that from trafficking of children from rural areas to urban areas where most of the young people are working in peoples houses.
nya: Kuchokera ku ntchito ndi kafukufuku wathu, tikuona kuti kugwiritsa ntchito ana ndi vuto lalikulu makamaka madera a mmidzi, ndipo mutha kuona kuti kutenga ana opanda chilolezo kuchokera ku mmidzi kupita ku tawuni komwe achinyamata ambiri akugwira ntchito mu nyumba za anthu.
mt0: <pad> Koma malinga ndi zomwe tinawona ndipo mwakuchita zinthu, timaona kuti kugwira ntchito kwa ana ndi vuto lalikulu makamaka m'madera ozungulira ndipo mungathe kunena kuti kuchokera ku kugonana kwa ana kuchokera m'madera ozungulira kupita ku malo akuluakulu anthu amagwira ntchito m'manyumba a anthu.</s>

en: " Mr. Matewere says poor children often find work on large farm estates.
nya: A Matewere anati ana osauka kawirikawiri amapeza ntchito ku minda ikuluikulu yochitira ulimi.
mt0: <pad> Mkulu Matewere akuti ana osauka amakhala ndi ntchito zambiri pa malo akuluakulu a mafakitale.</s>

en: He said, "We have noticed that there are some indications that there are children who are working in tea estates and tobacco estates.
nya: Iwo anati, "Tazindikira kuti pali ana ena omwe akugwira ntchito ku minda ikuluikulu yolima Tiyi ndi Fodya.
mt0: <pad> Iye anati, "Tikudziwa kuti pali zizindikiro zakuti pali ana amene akugwira ntchito m'maboma a tea ndi tobacco.</s>

en: There also are children who are working in brick making mostly their parents will facilitate for them to work in those kinds of employment. "
nya: Palinso ana ena  amene akumagwira ncthito youmba njerwa makamaka kuchokera kwa makolo awo amene akumawalimbikitsa kugwira ntchito zotero.
mt0: <pad> Ndipo palinso ana amene amagwira ntchito zopanga maziko, ndipo makolo awo amakhala akuthandizana kuti acite ntchito zimenezi. "</s>

en: Mr. Matewere says the Eye of the Child has established that there are gross violations of children rights in the country. These include, rape, defilement and being overworked.
nya: A Mr. Matewere anati bungwe la Eye of the Child lazindikira kuti pali kuphwanya ufulu wa ana kwakukulu mdziko muno. Monga kugwililira, kuipitsa koma kugwiritsa ntchito mopyola muyeso.
mt0: <pad> Mkulu Matewere akuti Eye of the Child yakhazikitsa kuti kuli kuononga kwambiri ufulu wa ana mudziko lapansi. Izi ziphatikiza kugonana, kuswa chilungamo ndi kugwira ntchito zochuluka.</s>

en: He says this violates the United Nations Convention on the Rights of the Child.
nya: Iwo anati uku ndi kuphwanya malamulo okhudza ana a bungwe ladziko lonse la United Nations.
mt0: <pad> Iye akuti izi zimaphwanya mgwirizano wa UN wa ufulu wa mwana.</s>

en: "If you look at the Convention of the Rights of a Child," he said, "you will see that it provides for the protection for children from any kind of exploitation from any kind of harmful activities or act which threatens their health, their development which is a threat to education.
nya: "Mukaona malamulo okhudza ana," iwo anati, " muona kuti limapereka malamulo oteteza ana ku zoipa zilizonse zoika pa chiopsezo moyo wao,kakulidwe kawo kamene kangasokoneze maphunziro awo.
mt0: <pad> "Ngati muwona Convention on the Rights of Child, iye adatero, mudzaona kuti imapereka chitetezo kwa ana ku makhalidwe oipa kapena njira iliyonse yomwe imathamanga umoyo wa ana, kupanga kwawo ndi kuphunzira.</s>

en: So children who are found working in tea estates, who are found in brick making, obvious, their rights as it is provided for in the Convention for the Rights of the Children as well as in the constitution are violated. "
nya: Choncho ana amene amapezeka akugwira ntchito mminda yaikulu yolima Tiyi, oumba njerwa, mwachidziwikire kuchokera mu malamulo a ufulu wa ana ufulu wawo ukuphwanyidwa.
mt0: <pad> Ndiye ana amene amapeza kuti akugwira ntchito m'maboma a tea, amene amapeza kuti akupanga matumba, mwachidziwikire, ufulu wawo monga umabwereranso mu Mgwirizano wa Ufulu wa Ana ndi m'Chilamulo chikuphwanya."</s>

en: The Eye of the Child executive director says his organization is looking at ways of protecting the rights of a child.
nya: Mkulu woyang'anira bungwe la The Eye of the Child ati bungwe lawo likufufuza njira zotetezera ufula wa ana.
mt0: <pad> Mkulu wa kampani ya The Eye of the Child akuti kampani yake ikufufuza njira zoteteza ufulu wa mwana.</s>

en: He says to achieve this, the group has started a number of programs. "We have recently started a new program and what we are trying to do is to inform the general public on the best interests of the child and to inform them on the rights of a child.
nya: Iwo anati kuti akwanitse zimenezi, gululo layambitsa ma pologalamu angapo. "Tayambitsa pologalamu yatsopano ndipo chomwe tikufuna kuchita ndi kudziwitsa dziko zinthu zomwe zingathandize moyo wa mwana komanso ufulu wa mwana.
mt0: <pad> Mwachidule, gulu lathu linayamba maphunziro ambiri. "Tsopano tayamba maphunziro atsopano ndipo zomwe tikufuna kuchita ndikudziwitsa anthu wamba zabwino kwambiri za mwanayo komanso kuwadziwitsa za ufulu wa mwanayo."</s>

en: At the same we want also to build up the capacity of the children themselves so that may be they can be use their authentic voice out their concerns. "
nya: Komanso tikufuna tibweretse kuthekera  mwa anawa kuti azitha kufotokoza nkhawa zawo.
mt0: <pad> Mwamsanga tikufuna kulimbikitsa luso la ana kuti mwina azitha kugwiritsa ntchito mawu awo ofotokozera nkhawa zawo. "</s>

en: According to the Ministry of Labor authorities, many children are forced to leave school and find work because parents cannot afford school fees.
nya: Kuchokera kwa akuluakulu a ku unduna wa za ntchito, ana ambiri amakakamizidwa kusiya sukulu ndi kukapeza ntchito chifukwa makolo awo sangakwanitse kuwalipilira ndalama yokaphunziliira.
mt0: <pad> Mwachidziwikire, akuluakulu a Ministry of Labor akuti ana ambiri akuyenera kusiya sukulu ndi kupeza ntchito chifukwa makolo awo sakwanitsa kulipira malipiro a sukulu.</s>

en: Although primary school is free in Malawi, most children do not attend due to lack of necessities like clothes.
nya: Ngakhale sukulu za pulaimale zili zaulele ku Malawi, ana ambiri samapita chifukwa chosowa zinthu ngati zovala.
mt0: <pad> Ngakhale sukulu ya primary ndi yosavuta ku Malawi, ana ambiri sapita ku sukulu chifukwa chosowa zofunika monga zovala.</s>

en: Over 60 per cent of Malawis nearly 11 million people live below the poverty line.
nya: A Malawi okwana 11 million opitilira mlingo wa 60 pelesenti amakhala moyo osauka.
mt0: <pad> 60 per cent of Malawi's nearly 11 million people live below the poverty line.</s>
