en: Malawi Court Convicts 12 People in Albino Attack
nya: Khoti la boma la Malawi lazenga athu khumi ndi awiri okhudzidwa ndi imfa ya munthu wakhungu lachi alubino.
mt0: <pad> Malawi Court Convicts 12 People in Albino Attack</s>

en: A high court in Malawi has convicted five people of murder for the 2018 killing of a 22-year-old albino man, including the victims brother.
nya: Khoti lalikulu mu dziko la Malawi lamnga athu asanu kamba kokupha mnyamata wa zaka 22 mu chaka cha 2018 kuphatikizapo mchimwene wake.
mt0: <pad> A bwalo lalikulu ku Malawi adakana anthu asanu ndi mmodzi kuti aphedze munthu wazaka 22 otchedwa albino, kuphatikizapo mlongo wa amene anampha.</s>

en: The court convicted seven other people of selling the victim's body parts.
nya: Khotilo linamangaso anthu asanu ndi anayi pogulitsa ziwalo za thupi la malemuyi.
mt0: <pad> M'bwalo la milandu adapeza anthu asanu ndi mmodzi omwe adali kugwira ntchito zogulitsa magawo a thupi la munthu amene adaphedwa.</s>

en: Malawi officials say more than 170 albinos have been attacked in the country since 2014 by people who believe their body parts bring luck and wealth.
nya: Akuluakulu a boma la Malawi ati anthu a chi alubino opitilira 170 anagwidwa kuyambira chaka cha 2014, pokhulupilira kuti ziwalo zawo zimabweretsa mwayi ndi chuma.
mt0: <pad> Mkulu wa Malawi akuti anthu oposa 170 a albino adaphedwa mudziko la Malawi kuyambira 2014 ndi anthu amene amakhulupirira kuti matupi awo amabweretsera mwayi ndi ndalama.</s>

en: Family members of the deceased, MacDonald Masambuka, left the courtroom Thursday with hopes of justice being served after the court convicted all 12 people accused in his death.  F
nya: Abale awo a malemuyi a MacDonald Masambuka, anachoka mu khoti lachinayi ndi chiyembekezo choti chilungamo chipelekedwa, khoti litamanga anthu onse khumi ndi awiri omwe akuimbidwa mlandu wokhudza imfayi.
mt0: <pad> Mabanja a Mcdonald Masambuka, amene anamwalira, adali ku khoti la mlandu lachiwiri ndipo adayembekezera kuti chilungamo chidzakwaniritsidwa pamapeto pamene bwalo la milandu lidanaze anthu 12 omwe adaimbidwa mulandu wa murder.</s>

en: amily members, including Masambukas mother, appeared calm and composed as Judge Dorothy NyaKaunda Kamanga read the judgments.
nya: Achibalewo, kuphatikizapo mayi ake a Masambuka, anali odekha pamene oweluza milandu a Dorothy Nyakaunda amawerenga zigamulo.
mt0: <pad> M'bale ndi mlongo wa Masambuka, a Dorothy NyaKaunda Kamanga, adawoneka wothokoza ndi wokhazikika pamene woweruza ankandilimbikitsa.</s>

en: Those convicted included a Catholic priest, Father Thomas Muhosa, police officer Chikondi Chileka, clinician Lumbani Kamanga, and the deceaseds brother, Cassim Masambuka. Charges included murder, extracting human tissues, causing harm to a person with disability, and trafficking in persons.
nya: Anthu amene aweruzidwa ndi wansembe wachikatolika a Thomas Muhosa, wapolisi a Chikondi Chileka,  a dokotala a Lumbani Kamanga ndi mchimwene wa malemuyo a Cassim Masambuka. Iwo anagamulidwa ku milandu ya kupha, kuchotsa ziwalo za anthu, kuvulaza thupi la munthu olumala ndi kugulitsa anthu.
mt0: <pad> Anthu amene adaimbidwa mlandu anali Mkulu wachipembezo cha Katolika, Father Thomas Muhosa, apolisi Chikondi Chileka, a dotolo Lumbani Kamanga, ndi m'bale wa munthu amene anamwalira, Cassim Masambuka. Zimene anthu omwe adaimbidwa mlandu zinali kupha, kuchotsa matupi a anthu, kuononga munthu wovuta, ndikugulitsa anthu.</s>

en: Kamanga convicted the victims brother and four others of murder.
nya: A Kamanga anaweluza mlandu wakupha mchimwene wa malemuwo ndi anthu ena anayi.
mt0: <pad> Kamanga adakana m'bale wa amene anamwalira ndi ena ankhonde kuti aphedze.</s>

en: The court convicted seven other people, including the priest and police officer, of selling the victim's body parts.
nya: Khotili linaweruzanso anthu ena asanu ndi awiri, kuphatikizapo ansembe ndi wapolisiyo pogulitsa ziwalo za munthuyo.
mt0: <pad> M'bwalo la milandu adakwanitsa anthu asanu ndi mmodzi, kuphatikizapo mkulu wa mpingo ndi munthu woyang'anira polisi, kuti adagulire magawo a thupi la amene adaphedwa.</s>

en: Business with tissue  According to the court, Muhosha, Chileka and others offered to conduct business using human tissue extracted from a human corpse.
nya: Malonda a minofu ya anthu kuchokera ku khoti, a Muhosha, a Chileka ndi ena anadzipeleka kuchita malonda a mnofu wa thupi la munthu wakufa.
mt0: <pad> Mwachidziwikire, Muhosha, Chileka ndi ena ankafuna kupanga bizinesi pogwiritsa ntchito magazi omwe adatenga kuchokera ku thupi la munthu.</s>

en: The judge said the state proved beyond reasonable doubt the 12 people conspired to kill Masambuka to extract his bones based on a perception they would benefit financially.
nya: Oweruza mlanduwu anati boma linatsimikiza mosakaikira kuti anthu khumi ndi awiri  anapha a Masambuka kuti achotse mafupa awo poona ngati zithandizira chuma chawo.
mt0: <pad> Mkulu wa ndende adanena kuti boma lakwanitsa kuonetsa kwambiri kuti anthu khumi ndi awiri adakonza zopha Masambuka kuti apeze magazi ake chifukwa choganiza kuti ndalama zidzapindula.</s>

en: She said Masambuka is the latest victim of violent attacks on persons with albinism who have not been protected by the community.
nya: Iwo anati a Masambuka ndi mmodzi mwa anthu a chi Alubino  omwe achitidwa chiwembu posachedwapa koma sanatetezedwe ndi dera lawo.
mt0: <pad> Mwachidule, iye adanena kuti Masambuka ndi mtundu watsopano wa anthu omwe ali ndi albinism amene sanapezedwe ndi gulu lawo.</s>

en: Director of Public Prosecutions Steve Kayuni represented the state in the case. He said he was pleased the court agreed on all the seven charges he presented.
nya: Mkulu wozenga milandu a Steve kayuni ndi omwe anayimila boma pa  mlanduwu. Iwo anati anali okondwa kuti a khoti anavomeleza chigamulo chomwe anapereka chokwana zisanu ndi ziwiri.
mt0: <pad> Director of Public Prosecutions Steve Kayuni akhali mu bwalo la milandu. Iye adakondwerera kuti bwalo la milandu linavomereza zonse zisanu ndi ziwiri zimene iye anapereka.</s>

en: "Its really something overwhelming on the part of the state considering that this matter, if you notice, there is a police officer involved, a priest involved and there is a brother involved.
nya: "Ndi nkhani yokhudza kwambiri ku mbali ya dziko poona kuti pali wapolisi, wansembe komanso mchimwene wa malemuyu amene akukhudzidwa pa nkhaniyi.
mt0: <pad> "Ndi nkhani yaikulu kwambiri kumbali yaboma popeza, ngati mwawona, pali mkulu wa polisi, m'busa ndiponso mlongo.</s>

en: If you notice, it all revolves around the position of trust — that somebody like the late Macdonald Masambuka trusted so much, they are the ones who ended up betraying him," Kayuni said.
nya: Mukhoza kuona kuti nkhaniyi ikuthera pa nkhani yokhuupilirana. Kuti annthu amene a MacDonald amawakhulupilira kwambiri ndi amene anawapereka ndi kuwachita chipongwe," anaetero a Kayuni.
mt0: <pad> Ngati mwawona, zonse zimayendera pa nkhani ya chikhulupiliro — kuti munthu monga Macdonald Masambuka amene adali wokhulupirika kwambiri, ndiwo amene pamapeto pake adamupwetsera," Kayuni anatero.</s>

en: Masambuka went missing from his village on March 9, 2018, and his limbless body was found buried in a garden on April 2, 2018, in his home district of Machinga south of Malawi.
nya: A masambuka anasowa mmudzi mwawo pa 9 Malichi mwezi wa 2018, ndipo thupi lawo lopanda manja ndi miyendo linapezeka atalikwilira mu dimba pa 2 epulo mwezi wa 2018 kumudzi kwawo ku Machinga, ku mmwera kwa dziko la malawi.
mt0: <pad> Masambuka adaphedwa ku mudzi wake pa 9 Marichi 2018, ndipo thupi lake lambura ziwawa linapezedwa mu munda pa 2 April 2018, m'boma la Machinga kumpoto kwa Malawi.</s>

en: Enticement  Court documents show that Masambuka was enticed by his brother to meet his friends, who he claimed had found a girl for him to marry.
nya: Mapepala a ku khoti anaonetsa kuti a Masambuka anayengeleredwa ndi mchimwene wawo kuti akakumana ndi anzake amene amati amupezera mkazi woti iye akwatire.
mt0: <pad> Malango a bwalo la milandu akuti Masambuka adalimbikitsidwa ndi m'bale wake kuti amumane ndi mabwenzi ake, amene adanena kuti adapeza mwanakazi kwa iye kuti amukwatire.</s>

en: But when they reached the scene, the alleged friends grabbed Masambuka by the neck and dragged him to a garden where they killed him. Here, his assailants cut off his limbs, burned his body using petrol and buried it there.
nya: Koma atafika pa malopo, anzake amanenawo anawagwira pakhosi a masambuka ndikuwakokera ku dimba komwe anakawapha.  Pamenepo achiwembuwo anadula manja ndi miyendo yawo, kuwotcha thupi lawo ndi petulo ndikulikwilira pomwepo.
mt0: <pad> Koma pamene iwo anafika pamalo, anthu amene amatchulidwa kuti ndi mabwenzi ake adagwira Masambuka ku mutu ndikumtenga kupita kumunda komwe adapha. Pakuti anthu amene adapha adamudula mapewa, adaphulitsa thupi lake ndi petrol ndipo adaliikirira m'manda.</s>

en: This was the first such case involving high-profile community members involved in attacks on persons with albinism.
nya: Uwu unali mlandu woyamba okhudza anthu apamwamba a mu dera omwe anachita nawo chiwembu munthu wa chi Alubino
mt0: <pad> Iyi idali nkhani yoyamba kuphatikiza anthu olemekezeka m'dera lawo kutenga nawo mbali pa nkhanza za anthu omwe ali ndi albinism.</s>

en: Masauko Chamkakala, the lawyer for the 12 defendants in the case, said he would comment once he had gone through the judgment.
nya: A Masauko Chamkakala, woimila mlandu anthu ozengedwa mlanduwu anati iwo aikilapo ndemanga akawerenga bwinobwino chigamulocho.
mt0: <pad> Masauko Chamkakala, loya wa anthu 12 omwe adaimbidwa mulandu, adati iye adzayankhulapo pambuyo pamene adawerenga chilungamo.</s>

en: "We are still waiting to see the perfected judgment so that we can read it and study it and talk to our clients," Chamkakala said.
nya: "Tidakadikilabe chigamulo choyenera cha mlanduwu kuti  tiwerenge bwinobwino kenako tiyankhule ndi makasitomala athu," anatero a Chamkaka.
mt0: <pad> "Tikuyembekezera kuwona chisankho chomaliza kuti tiwerenge ndi kuphunzira ndi kulankhula ndi makasitomala athu," adatero Chamkakala.</s>

en: Rights activists said they expected the court to give stiffer punishment to those convicted.
nya: Anthu omenyela ufulu anati iwo amayembekezera khoti kuti lipereke chilango cholimba kwa anthu anamangidwawa.
mt0: <pad> Anthu okonda ufulu adanena kuti ankayembekezera kuti bwalo la milandu lidzapereke chiweruzo cholimba kwa amene adaimbidwa mlandu.</s>

en: 'Serious sentencing'
nya: Chilango chachikulu.'
mt0: <pad> 'Kutsatira kwambiri'</s>

en: Ian Simbota represented the Association of Persons with Albinism at the court.
nya: A Ian Simbota ndi omwe anayimila mgwirizano wa anthu a chi Alubino ku khotilo.
mt0: <pad> Ian Simbota ankaimilira bungwe la Albinism ku bwalo.</s>

en: "When the judge was reading, what concerned me was that part of a [Priest] Father Muhosha [and others] who have been convicted of transacting body parts.
nya: "Pamene oweruza mlandu amawerenga, pomwe panandikhudza ndi pamene ansembe a Muhosha ndi ena amaweruzidwa chifukwa chogulitsa ziwalo za anthu.
mt0: <pad> "Pamene a bwana anali kuwerenga, chimene chinandikhumudwitsa ndichakuti gawo la [Mkulu] Father Muhosha [ndi ena] omwe adali akaidi otenga matupi a anthu.</s>

en: If you go to the Anatomy Act, it is not so hard on such offenses.
nya: Mukapita ku malamulo a zochotsa ziwalo za matupi a anthu,  sizovuta kwambiri pa nkhani zolakwa ngati zimenezi.
mt0: <pad> Ngati mupita ku Anatomy Act, sizovuta kwambiri pa zoipa zimenezi.</s>

en: So, we are really looking forward to the judge, if at all its possible, to put a human face to the case so that at least we really need to see serious sentencing on this case," Simbota said.
nya: Tikuyang'anira oweruza mlandu kuti ngati kuli kotheka nkhaniyi aione kufunikira kwake kuti pakhale chilango chachikulu," anatero a Simbota.
mt0: <pad> Ndiye ife tikuyembekezera kwambiri kuti mkulu wa khoti, ngati n'zotheka, aike mawonekedwe a munthu pa nkhani iyi kuti tingawone kuti anthu amene adachita izi amapeza chilango chovuta," Simbota adati.</s>

en: The high court is expected to sentence the perpetrators on May 30.
nya: Khoti lalikulu likuyembekezeka kupereka chilango kwa anthu ochita zoipawa pa 30 mwezi wa Meyi.
mt0: <pad> M'bwalo la milandu akuluakulu akuti adzaweruze anthu amene adachita zimenezi pa Meyi 30.</s>

en: In another case, a high court on Thursday sentenced a 37-year-old man to life in prison for the 2020 murder of a 14-year-old-boy with albinism in Phalombe district.
nya: A Khoti lalikulu agamulanso mlandu wina lachinayi pamene mzibambo wina wa zaka 37 anapha mnyamata wa chi Alubino wa zaka 14 ku Phalombe. Mzibamboyi akakhala ku ndende moyo wake onse.
mt0: <pad> M'nkhani ina, bwalo la milandu la mzinda wa Phalombe latsekedwa munthu wazaka 37 ku ndende kwa moyo wonse chifukwa cha kupha mwana wazaka 14 wokhala ndi matenda a albinism mu 2020 ku Phalombe district.</s>

en: Zimbabwe Official Defends Crackdown on Protests, Urges Patience with Economy
nya: Akuluakulu a boma la zimbabwe aziikila kumbuyo polanga anthu ophwanya malamulo  pa zionetsero, alimbikitsa kudekha ndi ndondomeko ya chuma.
mt0: <pad> Mkulu wa Zimbabwe Apanga Zolimbana ndi Zimene Zinachitika, Alimbikitsa Chiyembekezo pa Nkhani ya Makampani</s>

en: Zimbabwe's minister of foreign affairs and international trade on Monday defended crackdowns on anti-government demonstrations and urged patience in turning around the country's foundering economy.
nya: Nduna yoona nkhani zakunja ndi malonda a padziko lonse lolemba laziikila  kumbuyo polanga anthu ophwanya malamulo ku zionetsero zotsutsana  ndi boma ndipo linauza anthuwo kuti adekhe pamene akusintha kayendetsedwe katsopano ka chuma.
mt0: <pad> Mkulu wa Zimbabwe wa zakunja ndi malonda a mdziko la Zimbabwe anati pa Lolemba, anthu amene adachita zionetselo zosakhala bwino aboma afunika kukhala ndi chiyembekezo chothandiza kusintha chuma chadziko la Zimbabwe.</s>

en: Though "everybody's got the right to demonstrate," there have "been a lot of insinuations and campaigns of violence," Sibusiso B. Moyo told VOA in an interview. Citing public safety, he endorsed a Zimbabwe court's ruling hours earlier to uphold a police ban on a protest organized by the opposition Movement for Democratic Change (MDC) alliance.
nya: Ngakhale aliyense ali ndi ufulu wochita zionetsero, " pakhala malingaliro oipa ochuluka  komanso kulimbikitsa mchitidwe wa nkhanza," a Sibusiso B. Moyo anauza waielsi ya VOA pamene amafunsidwa mafunso. Poitanitsa chitetezo cha dziko, iwo anavomera nthawi yogamula milandi ku khoti la ku ZImbabwe msanga kuti akalimbikitse kuletsa komwe apolisi akuchita pa zionetsero zomwe a chipani chotsutsa boma cha MDC akonza.
mt0: <pad> Ngakhale " aliyense ali ndi ufulu wa kukhala maso," Sibusiso B. Moyo adanena poyera kuti " pali anthu ambiri amene amapanga zinthu zoipa ndi makampeni a chiwawa."</s>

en: Alliance leaders are pressing President Emmerson Mnangagwa and the ruling ZANU-PF party for a role in a transitional government. They had organized a demonstration Monday in Bulawayo, the country's second-largest city, but police authorities banned it hours before its intended start. Two other opposition demonstrations still are planned this week: for the central city of Gweru on Tuesday and the southeastern city of Masvingo on Wednesday.
nya: Akuluakulu a mgwirizano wa zipani akukakamiza mtsogoleri Emmerson Mnangagwa ndi chipani cholamula cha ZANU-PF kuti achitepo kanthu posinntha boma. Anakonsa zionetsero lolemba ku mzinda wachiwiri wa dzikolo ku Bulawayo, koma apolisi analetsa patatsala maola ochepa kuti zionetselozi ziyambe. Zionetsero zina zakonzedwa sabata yamawa, ku mzinda wa pakati wa Gweru lLachiwiri komanso kummwera chakummawa kwa mzinda wa Masvingo Lachitatu.
mt0: <pad> Mtsogoleri wa alliance akulimbikitsa Purezidenti Emmerson Mnangagwa ndi chipani cholamulira ZANU-PF kuti akhale m'boma la transitional. Anthu osiyanasiyana a chisankho adapanga zionetselo ku Bulawayo, mzinda wachiwiri waukulu kwambiri mudzikomo, koma apolisi adaletsa maola angapo asanafike. Maonetsero awiri a chisankho omwe adzachitike m'mawa ndi m'mawa ku Gweru ndi ku Masvingo akhazikitsidwa m'sabati ino:</s>

en: Police also had pre-emptively banned a demonstration in Harare last Friday, a decision upheld by a Zimbabwe court. Hundreds of MDC supporters ignored the ban, leading to clashes between civilians and police. Video and photographs showed police hitting and kicking some demonstrators among actions that drew complaints of excessive force from civil and human rights groups, including the United Nations human rights office.
nya: Apolisi anali ataletselatu zionetsero zina zomwe zimayenera kuchitika Lachisanu lapitali ku Harare, chiganizo chomwe analetsa ndi a khoti la Zimbabwe. Otsatira chipani cha MDC ochuluka sanalabadile za kuletsedwako zomwe zinachititsa chisokonezo pakati pa anthu ndi Apolisi. Makanema ndi zithunzi zinaonetsa Apolisiwo akumenya anthu ochita zionetselo zomwe zinabweretsa madandaulo kuchoka ku mabungwe oona za ufulu wa anthu, kuphatikizapo ofesi ya dziko lonse lapansi ya United Nations.
mt0: <pad> M'bale wanga, ndipo ndinadziwa kuti apolisi adaletsa chionetsero ku Harare lachiwiri lapitalo.</s>

en: Police, not demonstrators, showed up in force on Bulawayo streets Monday, with foot patrols wielding shields, batons and, in some cases, pistols. The Associated Press reported police trucks and water cannons positioned in the downtown area.
nya: Apolisi ambiri osati anthu ochita zionetsero adawonekera mwamphamvu mmisewu ya ku Bulawayo Lolemba, iwo anali kuyendayenda mmisewumo atavala zishango za kumaso, atanyamula zikwapu, ndi mfuti. Atolankhani anati Apolisiwo anabwera ndi magalimoto awo ndi mizinga ya madzi yomwe anaisiya mtawunimo.
mt0: <pad> Poliisi, osati anthu oyenda, adawonekera m'misewu ya Bulawayo Lolemba, ndi mapatroli a nsanja atatenga zida zolimbana ndi anthu okhala mu mzinda wa Bulawayo. The Associated Press reported kuti magalimoto apolisi ndi makina amadzimadzi anali kukhazikitsidwa m'mudzi wa Bulawayo.</s>

en: A young man in Bulawayo, identifying himself only as James, told VOA that negotiations between the government and opposition leaders were even more important than demonstrations.
nya: Wachinyamata wina yemwe anadzitchula dzina lake kuti ndi James mu dera la Bulawayo, anauza wailesi ya VOA kuti zokambirana pakati pa boma ndi atsogoleri otsutsa ndizofunika kwambiri kuposa zionetsero.
mt0: <pad> Amuna wachichepere ku Bulawayo, amene adadzipereka kuti ndi James, adati kulankhulana pakati pa atsogoleri aboma ndi a okondedwa kunali kofunikira kwambiri kuposa ma demo.</s>

en: "Honestly, to demonstrate, we can end up being hurt by being beaten, being chased around. There's really nothing that we see coming out of it," James said. "But these men should sit down and see what they can do for us, especially us, the youth. … We have been affected a lot, and we are getting old just running."
nya: "Kunena chilungamo, kuchita zionetsero titha kuvulala pomenyedwa ndi kuthamangitsidwa. Palibe chomwe ife tikuona kuti chitha kutulukapo," anatero James. "Koma anthuwa akuyenera kukhala pansi ndikuona chomwe angatichitire, makama ifeyo achinyamata. Takhudzidwa kwambiri ndipo tikukula ndikumangothamanga.
mt0: <pad> "Chifukwa cha ufulu, kuti tiwonetse, tingathe kukhala ndi matenda pomenya, kusakasidwa. Palibe chimene tikuwona chikuchitika," James adatero. "Koma anthu awa ayenera kukhala pansi ndi kuona zomwe angachite kwa ife, makamaka ife achinyamata.... Tidali ndi matenda ambiri, ndipo tikukulira kuthamangila."</s>

en: Moyo, the foreign minister, told VOA the administration is "undertaking economic reforms [that] are fundamental and they are key to ensuring that even the youth would finally have jobs created for them, so that we can create an environment where investors and the capital will find it easy to come into this country, where jobs will be created, and the youth will be part and parcel of economic activity."
nya: Nduna yoona zakunja a Moyo anauza wailesi ya VOA kuti iwo akupanga njira zofunika zosinthira chuma zomwe akutsimikiza kuti ngakhale achinyamata adzawapezera ntchito kuti ndalama ndi anthu obweretsa ndalamazo asamavutike kubwera mu dziko lino lomwe ntchito zizipangidwa ndipo achinyamata adzakhala mbali ya chuma chi.
mt0: <pad> Moyo, mkulu wa boma la Zambia, adauza VOA kuti atsogoleri adziko lino "akupanga masintha achuma omwe ndi ofunika kwambiri kuonetsetsa kuti ngakhale achinyamata adzakhala ndi ntchito zokhazikitsidwa kwawo, kuti tikwaniritse chikhalidwe chakuti anthu ogulitsa ndalama ndi ndalama zambiri zidzapeza zosavuta kubwera mudziko lino, kumene ntchito zizikonzedwa, ndipo achinyamata adzakhala gawo la nchito zachuma."</s>

en: Moyo said Zimbabwe is midway into a two-year "transition stabilization program" to revive the country's devastated economy: "We have got one year to go and we are saying we should by then be out of the doldrums."
nya: A Moyo anati dziko la Zimbabwe liri pakati pa pologalamu ya zaka ziwiri yokhazikitsa dzikolo kuti abwezeretse chuma chawo chomwe chinawonongeka. "Tili ndi chaka chimodzi, ndipo tikuti tidzakala titatuluka mu nyengo yowawitsayi."
mt0: <pad> Moyo anati Zimbabwe ili pakati pa "njira yokhazikitsa ndalama" ya zaka ziwiri kuti ipulumuke chuma chadziko lapansi: "Tili ndi chaka chimodzi chotsala ndipo tikukhulupilira kuti tidzakwanitse kutulutsa ndalama zathu."</s>

en: The southern African country of nearly 16 million is experiencing its worst financial crisis since 2008, beset by hyperinflation and the fallout of decades of corruption. Many struggle to buy basics such as food and medicine. With the poor economy and crops devastated by drought and a spring cyclone, the UN World Food Program anticipates that 5.5 million people will need emergency food aid by next April.
nya: Kum'mwera kwa Afilika anthu pafupifupi 16 miliyoni akukumana ndi mavuto a zachuma ochuluka kuyambira chaka cha 2008, kuvutika ndi kukwera kwambiri kwa mitengo ya zinthu komanso katangale wa zakazaka. Ambiri amavutika kugula  zinthu zofunikira ngati chakudya ndi mankhwala. Ndi kusoweratu chuma komanso mbewu zoonongeka ndi chilala ndi mphempo yamphamvu, a UN World Food Program akuyembekeza kuti anthu okwana 5.5 million adzafunika chithandizo chadzidzidzi cha chakudya mwezi wa Epulo.
mt0: <pad> Nchilumba cha ku mwera kwa Africa chawo ndi chimodzi mwa zinthu zovuta kwambiri kuyambira 2008, chokhala ndi hyperinflation ndi matenda a corruption. Anthu ambiri amavutika kugula zakudya zofunikira monga chakudya ndi mankhwala. Ndi chuma chosowa ndi njala ndi cyclone yachilimwe, UN World Food Program predicts that 5.5 million people will need emergency food aid by April.</s>

en: Finance Minister Mthuli Ncube, who had predicted 3.1% growth for 2019, offered a sobering update to Zimbabwe's parliament in early August. "The revised 2019 GDP growth is expected to be negative," Reuters news service reported him as saying.
nya: Nduna yoona za chuma a Mthuli Ncube amene ananeneratu za kukula kokwana 3.1 pelesenti pamene amapereka lipoti ku nyumba ya aphungu ya ku Zimbabwe mwezi wa Ogasiti. "Kaundula wa 2019 wa kakulidwe ka chuma akuyenera kufika mlingo wochepera," atolankhani a Reuters ndi amene anapeleka lipotili.
mt0: <pad> Mkulu wa chuma Mthuli Ncube, yemwe adali kuyembekezera kuwonjezeka kwa 3.1% mu 2019, adapereka update yosowa chiyembekezo kunyumba yamalamulo ku Zimbabwe kumayambiriro kwa Ogasiti. "Kuwonjezeka kwa GDP 2019 kuyembekezera kukhala koipa," Reuters news service reported him as saying.</s>

en: Ncube did not provide any updated figure.
nya: A Ncube sanapeleke nambala iliyonse yatsopano.
mt0: <pad> Ncube sanapereke chiwerengero chatsopano.</s>

en: Civil Society Workers Run Afoul of Tanzania Security Officials in Sign of Increasing Clampdown
nya: Anthu osagwira ntchito m'boma, atsutsana ndi akuluakulu a chitetezo m'boma la Tanzania poletsa machitidwe a zinthu.
mt0: <pad> Ntchito za anthu wamba zakhala zikuchitika ku Tanzania ndi akuluakulu a ufulu wa anthu wamba.</s>

en: African civil society campaigners attending a conference in Tanzania were questioned and warned over the weekend, in what human rights activists say is part of a continuing clampdown on free speech in the East African nation.
nya: Anthu a mu Afilika osagwira ntchito m'boma omwe akukumana nawo pa msonkhano ku Tanzania anafunsidwa komanso kuchenjezedwa mathero a sabatayi,mu zimene omenyera ufulu wa anthu amati ndi njira imodzi yoletsera ufulu wa malankhulidwe mu dera la East Africa.
mt0: <pad> M'bale ndi mlongo wa anthu a chikhalidwe chachizungu ku Africa amene anali ku Tanzania pamenepo anawabvunza ndi kuwachenjeza, zomwe activists akuti ndizofanana ndi kuwongolera kwa ufulu wa kulankhula mu dziko la East African.</s>

en: Details are still emerging over what exactly happened to at least 40 civil society workers who ran afoul of security officials at this year's summit of the Southern African Development Community in Dar es Salaam.

en: Catherine Eden, a lawyer for the Tanzania Human Rights Defenders Coalition, says the incident stemmed from a misunderstanding. South African delegates to the 15-nation conference, she said, wanted to hold a short commemoration of the seventh anniversary of South Africa's deadly Marikana mine massacre on Aug. 16. Thirty-four striking miners were killed by police in the deadliest security incident since the end of apartheid in 1994.

Okumba migodi makumi atatu ndi anayi omwe ankachita zionetsero anaphedwa ndi apolisi, mu kuphedwa kochuluka chitheleni ulamuliro wa tsankho mu chaka cha 1994.

en: "They wrote some messages on the flip charts, of which the little content that was captured in the flip charts read, 'Stop killing our people,'" she said. "... en: Information Minister Monica Mutsvangwa called the protests counterproductive, saying January's demonstrations against fuel price increases resulted in $20 million to $30 million in losses for businesses from looting and non-productive days.
nya: Nduna ya zofalitsa nkhani a Monica Mutsvangwa anafotokoza kuti zionetserozo  ndizosapindulitsa, anati zionetsero za mwezi wa Januwale zotsutsana ndi kukwera kwa mafuta, kunachititsa kuti ndalama za ma dola  zapakatikati pa 20 ndi 30 miliyoni  zitayike chifukwa cha  kuba komanso kusagwira ntchito kwa masiku.
mt0: <pad> Mkulu wa boma la Information Monica Mutsvangwa adanena kuti ziwonetselo zakhala zopanda phindu, popeza ziwonetselo za mwezi wa Januwale zotsutsana ndi kuwonjezereka kwa mitengo ya mafuta zinapangitsa kuti makampani ataye $20 million to $30 million in losses from looting and non-productive days.</s>

en: "Government calls on all progressive Zimbabweans to desist from being used by negative forces to destabilize their own country, as this will only prolong the hardships which the government is tirelessly trying to address in a more sustainable manner," she said. "I wish to reiterate the call by His Excellency Comrade ED Mnangagwa for all patriotic Zimbabweans to resort to dialogue as a means to solve the challenges we face as a nation."
nya: Boma lauza anthu onse opita patsogolo a boma la Zimbabwe kuti asalore kugwiritsidwa ntchito ndi mphamvu zosakhala bwino kuti dziko lawo lisakhazikike, ati izi zingopitiliza mavuto omwe dzikolo lukukumana nawo pamene dzikolo likuyesetsa kukonza kuti likhazikike, iwo anatero, nkanakonda anthu anakamvera mtsogoleri wathu powaitana kuti tikonze mavuto omwe tikukumana nawowa mwa umodzi ngati dziko.
mt0: <pad> "Goverment calls on all progressive Zimbabweans to desist from being used by negative forces to destabilize their own country, as this will only prolong the hardships which the government is tirelessly trying to address in a more sustainable manner," she said. "I wish to reiterate the call by His Excellency Comrade ED Mnangagwa for all patriotic Zimbabweans to resort to dialogue as a way to solve the challenges we face as a nation."</s>

en: Daniel Molokhele, the spokesman for the opposition, said his party was against Mnangagwa leading talks and accused him of stealing Zimbabwe's last election in 2018. He said the protests would continue until Zimbabwe's economy gets back on track.
nya: A Daniel Molokhele, mneneri wa otsutsa boma, anati chipani chawo sichikugwirizana ndi zomwe a Mnangagwa akuyankhula ndipo anawaimba mlandu obera zisankho za chaka cha 2018. Iwo anati zionetsero zipitilira pokhapokha chuma cha dziko la Zimbabwe chibwelere mmalo mwake.
mt0: <pad> Daniel Molokhele, omwe ndi mkulu wa gulu la anthu osiyanasiyana, adati a chipani chake anali kudana ndi Mnangagwa kutsogolera maphunziro ndipo adanena kuti iye adaba chisankho chachiwiri cha Zimbabwe mu 2018. Iye adati ziwonetselo zikupitirira mpaka chuma cha Zimbabwe chikhale chokhazikika.</s>

en: UN Condemns Government Crackdown on Peaceful Protests in Zimbabwe
nya: A bungwe la UN adzudzula boma la Zimbabwe pa mchitidwe wolanga anthu pa zionetsero zamtendere zomwe zinachitika.
mt0: <pad> UN ikutukuka za kuthetsa kwa boma pa zochitika zachitetezo za mtendere mu Zimbabwe</s>

en: The U.N. human rights office is condemning a crackdown Friday in Zimbabwe by riot police on peaceful protesters in the capital, Harare. The agency is calling for an investigation into excessive use of force by security forces.
nya: Ofesi ya ufulu wa anthu ya U.N yadzudzula mchitidwe wolanga anthu Lachisanu ku Zimbabwe pa chipolowe chomwe apolisi anachititsa pa zionetsero za mtendere mu mzinda wa Harare. Nthambiyi yayambitsa kufufuza nkhaniyi pogwiritsa ntchito mphamvu za asilikali a chitetezo.
mt0: <pad> UN Human Rights Office inonya apolisi a Zimbabwe kugwira anthu amene anali kupanga ma demo m'mzinda wa Harare.</s>

en: U.N. Human Rights spokesman Rupert Colville says there are better ways to deal with the populations legitimate grievances on the economic situation in the country than by cracking down on peaceful protestors.
nya: Mneneri wa ufulu wa anthu ku bungwe la U.N a Rupert Colville anati pali njira zabwino zothana ndi mavuto omwe anthu akulira nawo pa nkhani ya chuma cha dziko kusiyana ndi kuzunza anthuwa pochita zionetsero za mtendere.
mt0: <pad> Rupert Colville, akulu wa UN Human Rights, adati pali njira zabwino zolimbana ndi zomwe anthu akudandaula za boma lawo pa nkhani yachuma kusiyana ndi kugwira ntchito anthu amene akuchita zinthu mwachilungamo.</s>

en: "We are deeply concerned by the socio-economic crisis that continues to unfold in Zimbabwe. While acknowledging efforts made by the government, the international community and the U.N. in Zimbabwe to mitigate the effects of the crisis and reform process, the dire economic situation is now impacting negatively on the realization of economic and social rights of millions of Zimbabweans," Colville said.
nya: Ndife okhudzidwa kwambiri ndi mavuto a zachuma ndi chikhalidwe omwe akuchitikabe ku Zimbabwe. Povomeleza khama la boma, bungwe la dziko lonse ndi la U.N ku Zimbabwe pochepetsa mavutowa komanso kusintha ndondomeko, vuto la chuali likukhudza mosakhala bwino ufulu wa khalidwe ndi chuma wa anthu a ku Zimbabwe, A Colville anatero.
mt0: <pad> "Tili ndi nkhawa kwambiri ndi vuto lachuma la m'dziko la Zimbabwe. Ngakhale tikumvetsetsa zomwe boma, anthu a mtundu wa dziko la Zimbabwe ndi UN yapadziko lonse lapansi achita polimbana ndi vutoli komanso kusintha, vuto lachuma lam'dziko la Zimbabwe tsopano likupangitsa kuti anthu ambiri a Zimbabwe asinthe ufulu wao wachuma ndi umoyo," Colville said.</s>

en: Zimbabwes citizens are struggling with hyperinflation, which has sent prices soaring for essential commodities such as fuel, food, transportation and health care. Compounding the problems is the ongoing impact of cyclone Idai that hit Zimbabwe in March and a severe drought.
nya: Mzika za dziko la Zimbabwe zikuvutika ndi kukwera  mitengo kwambiri kwa zinthu, monga zinthu ngati mafuta agalimoto, chakudya, mayendedwe komanso chisamaliro cha moyo zakwera mitengo. Poonjezela mavutowo mphepo yaikulu yotchedwa Cyclone Idai yomwe inaomba dziko la  Zimbabwe mwezi wa Malichi ndi chilala chachikulu.
mt0: <pad> Zimbabwe citizens are battling hyperinflation, which has sent prices soaring for essential commodities such as fuel, food, transport and health care. Compounding the problems is the ongoing impact of Cyclone Idai that hit Zimbabwe in March and a severe drought.</s>

en: The United Nations says one third of Zimbabwes population of 16 million people is in need of humanitarian aid.
nya: A bungwe la United nations anati gawo limodzi mwa magawo atatu a anthu 16 miliyoni a dziko la zimbabwe akufunika chithandizo.
mt0: <pad> UN akuti chigawo chimodzi cha anthu 16 miliyoni ku Zimbabwe akufunika thandizo la umoyo.</s>

en: The fallout in terms of casualties and possible arrests from Fridays protests is not yet clear. But Colville tells VOA his office has received disturbing reports of human rights violations over the past few months.
nya: Chomwe chinachititsa kuvulazidwa ndi kumangidwa kwa anthu kuchokera Lachisanu sichikudziwika. Koma a Colville anauza wailesi ya VOA kuti ofesi yawo yalandira malipoti osakhala bwino ophwanya malamulo a ufulu wa anthu pa miyezi yapitayo.
mt0: <pad> Nkhani za ngozi ndi kugwira ntchito kwa anthu zimene zinachitika pa Chitatu sizikudziwikabe. Koma Colville anauza VOA kuti ofesi yake yalandira mauthenga oipa akuti anthu ambiri adaphwanyidwa ufulu wa anthu m'miyezi yapitayo.</s>

en: "There are, as I said, reports coming through right now of very recent abductions, beatings and so on of activists or human rights defenders. We have not had a chance to verify those and look in detail apart from the two that occurred a few days ago," Colville said. "So, it is clearly a very tense situation."
nya: "Monga mmene ndinafotokozera pali malipoti  amene akubwera okhudza kutenga anthu mokakamiza, kumenyedwa  ndi zina zambiri kwa anthu omenyera ufulu. Sitinapeze mwayi wotsimikizira ndikuona bwinobwino kupatula zomwe zinachitika masiku apitawa," a Colville anatero. "Iyi ndi nyengo yovuta kwambiri."
mt0: <pad> "Pano pali nkhani zambiri zochokera kwa anthu amene amagwira ntchito za ufulu wa anthu, monga mwachitsanzo kugwiriridwa ntchito, kumenya anthu ndi zina zotero. Tsopano n'zoonekeratu kuti zinthu zili ndi vuto lalikulu," Colville adatero.</s>

en: Colville says state authorities have a duty to ensure peoples rights to freedom of expression and to protect the right to peaceful assembly.
nya: A Colville anati akuluakulu aboma ali ndi udindo woonetsetsa kuti ufulu wa kayankhulidwe wa anthu ndi kusonkhana mwa mtendere ukutetezedwa.
mt0: <pad> Colville akuti maboma ali ndi udindo woonetsetsa kuti anthu ali ndi ufulu wa kulankhula komanso kukhala ndi ufulu wa chisoni.</s>

en: The U.N. human rights office is urging the government to engage in a national dialogue to ensure that civil society in all its guises can carry out its activities without fear of intimidation or reprisals for its work.
nya: Bungwe la ufulu wa anthu la U.N lapempha boma kuti lionetsetse kuti anthu osagwira ntchito m'boma mu njira iliyonse azichita zinthu opanda mantha a ntchito yawo.
mt0: <pad> Office ya UN Human Rights ikulimbikitsa boma kuyamba mgwirizano wadziko lonse kuti anthu a ntundu wa chitukuko athe kuchita masewera awo popanda mantha kapena kubwezeretsedwa chifukwa cha ntchito zawo.</s>

en: Despite Oil and Gas Reserves, Africa Feels Pressure of Rising Energy Costs
nya: Ngakhale pali mafuta osungidwa, Africa wakhudzidwa ndi kukwera mtengo kwa mphamvu zochokera ku mafuta.
mt0: <pad> Ngakhale kuti Africa ili ndi mafuta ndi gasi, dziko la Africa limamva kuthamanga kwa mitengo ya magetsi yomwe ikukula.</s>

en: Africans are feeling the pinch caused by soaring global energy prices, say analysts, even in countries like Nigeria and Angola that are major exporters of crude oil.
nya: Anthu a ku Afilika akupeza mavuto ndi kukwera kwa mafuta ndi mphamvu ya magetsi, anatero ounguza, ngakhalenso maiko a Nigeria ndi Angola amene amagulitsa  mafuta ku maiko ena.
mt0: <pad> Ndipo ngati mukudziwa kuti ndalama zambiri zimathamanga, ndiye kuti mwadziwa.</s>

en: While that handful of oil producers is seeing an increase in revenue – especially since the Russian invasion of Ukraine on February 24 – much of the continent lacks refining capability, forcing countries to pay high prices to import gasoline and other petroleum products from Asia and Europe.
nya: Pamene opanga mafuta ochepa ena akupeza ndalama yochuluka, chiyambileni kuukila kwa dziko la Russia ku Ukraine pa 24 Febuluwale,  dzikoli likukanika kukonza mafutawa zomwe zikukakamiza maiko kulipira mitengo yokwera kuti abweretse  mafuta ndi zina kuchokera kmaiko a ku  Asia ndi ku Ulaya.
mt0: <pad> Ngakhale anthu ochepa amene amapanga mafuta akuwona kuwonjezeka kwa msonkho – makamaka kuyambira upandu wa Russia ku Ukraine pa Febuluwale 24 – chigawo chambiri cha continent sichili ndi luso la kupanga mafuta, zimenezi zimapangitsa kuti mayiko azitha kubweretsa mafuta ndi zinthu zina za mafuta kuchokera ku Asia ndi Europe.</s>

en: The continent is further affected by increasing costs for natural gas, a key component of nitrogen-based fertilizers used in food production.
nya: Dziko likupitilira kukhudzidwa ndi kukwera mtengo  kwa mafuta a chilengedwe amene amaagwiritsidwa ntchito mu feteleza wokulitsa mbewu za chakudya.
mt0: <pad> Ndipo dziko lapansi lidzakhudzana ndi mtengo wa mafuta abwino, chinthu chofunikira kwambiri cha fertilizer zochokera ku nitrogen zomwe zimagwiritsidwa ntchito popanga chakudya.</s>

en: With salaries largely stagnant, more than two-thirds of Africans feel pressured by the rising prices, said Franklin Cudjoe, founding president of the Ghana-based Imani Center for Policy and Education.
nya: Ndi malipiro kukhala chimodzimodzi, kupitilira magawo awiri pa atatu a anthu a ku Afilika akumva kukakamizidwa ndi kukwera mitengo anatero a Franklin Cudjoe mtsogoleri wa malo otchedwa Imani Cennter for Policy and Education dziko la Ghana.
mt0: <pad> Ndi malipiro ambiri okhazikika, oposa magawo awiri mwa atatu a Afurika amaona kuti akuvutika ndi mtengo wa zinthu womwe ukupita patsogolo, adatero Franklin Cudjoe, president of the Imani Center for Policy and Education in Ghana.</s>

en: "The continent is affected simply because we depend largely on global oil suppliers, since not many African countries have [their own] oil products," Cudjoe told VOA.
nya: Gawo la dzikoli lakhudzidwa kwambiri chifukwa timadalira kwambiri  kugula mafuta ochokera ku maiko ena, monga maiko ambiri aku Afilika alibe mafuta opanga okha," a Cudjoe anauza wailesi ya VOA.
mt0: <pad> "Chigawo chikukhudzana chifukwa chakuti timatengera kwambiri pa opanga mafuta ozungulira, popeza mayiko ambiri ku Africa alibe [mafuta awo]," Cudjoe adauza VOA.</s>

en: Prices spiked on the global oil market after the invasion of Ukraine triggered a wave of international sanctions against Russia, one of the worlds leading exporters of crude. The price briefly climbed to over $120 per barrel this month before settling down to $103 per barrel on Friday.
nya: Mitengo inakwera pa msika wa dziko lonse pambuyo pa kuukilidwa kwa dziko la Ukraine komwe kunayambitsa kusintha kwa malamulo a dziko lonse motsutsana ndi dziko la Russia, limodzi mwa maiko otumiza mafuta ku maiko ena. Mwachidule mtengo unakwera kuposela pa 120 dolazi pa galoni iliyonse lachisanu asanagwirizane zotsitsa kufika pa 103 dolazi.
mt0: <pad> Ntengo za mafuta zidakwera pa msika wadziko lonse lapansi pamapeto a kuukira kwa Ukraine komwe kudapangitsa kuti Russia, imodzi mwamayendedwe otsogolera a mafuta, idzetsere nsonga zoletsa mayiko ena ku Russia. Mtengo wa mafuta unakwera kwambiri kuposa $120 per barrel mwezi watha ndipo unakhazikika ku $103 per barrel pa Friday.</s>

en: The surge in energy prices is helping to fuel inflation across Africa. In Ghana, for example, overall consumer price inflation was pegged at 15.7% year-on-year in February compared with 13.9% in January, the countrys Statistical Service said last week.
nya: Kukwera mitengo kwamphamvu  ya magetsi, ndikomwe kukuchititsa kukwera mitengo ya zinthu ku Afilika. Mwachitsanzo ku Ghana kukwera mitengo ya zinthu kunali pa 15.7 pelesenti chaka ndi chaka kusiyana ndi 13.9 pelesenti mu Januwale, kuchokera ku  chiwelengero cha dzikolo.
mt0: <pad> Mtengo wa mphamvu ukuthandiza kulimbikitsa inflation ku Africa. Mwachitsanzo, ku Ghana, mtengo wa katundu wogula ndi wogula ndalama unali pa 15.7% kwachaka-kwachaka mu Febuluwale poyerekeza ndi 13.9% mu Januwale, a National Statistical Service of the country said last week.</s>

en: In Zimbabwe, prices are climbing sharply – even overnight. At a TM supermarket in the capital of Harare, a crate of 30 eggs cost the $6.70 on Tuesday and about $7.81 on Wednesday. The price of a loaf of bread went from $1.49 to $1.84; for a kilo of beef, the price jumped from $3.35 to $5.22.
nya: Ku dziko la Zimbabwe mitengo ikukwera kwambiri. Sitolo ina yotchedwa TM ku Harare, kileti ya mazira 30 ndi ma dolazi okwana 6.70 lachiwiri, lachitatu anali ma dolazi okwana 7.81. Mtengo wa mkate unachoka pa ma dolazi okwana 1.49 kufika pa 1.84,  Nyama ya n''gombe inachoka pa ma dolazi okwana 3.35 kufika pa 5.22
mt0: <pad> Mtengo wa zinthu zambiri ku Zimbabwe ukupita patsogolo kwambiri – ngakhale usiku. Ku malo akuluakulu a TM ku mzinda wa Harare, crate ya mazira 30 inali ndi mtengo wa $6.70 pa Tuesday ndipo inali ndi mtengo wa $7.81 pa Wednesday. Mtengo wa loaf ya mbatata unakwera kuchokera ku $1.49 kufikira $1.84; mtengo wa kilogalamu ya nyama ukwera kuchokera ku $3.35 kufikira $5.22.</s>

en: Gasoline costs climbed, too. In Harare, the per-liter price climbed from $1.41 to $1.69 from Tuesday to Wednesday.
nya: Mitengo ya mafuta inakweranso.  Ku Harare mtengo pa lita mtengo unakwera kuchoka pa ma dolazi okwana 1.41 kufika 1.69 kuchoka Lachiwiri kufika Lachitatu.
mt0: <pad> Mtengo wa mafuta nawo unakwera. Ku Harare, mtengo wa lita imodzi wa mafuta unakwera kuchokera ku $1.41 kufikira $1.69 kuyambira Lolemba mpaka Lachitatu.</s>

en: The surge in food prices was the biggest driver behind consumer inflation in Egypt, it rose by 8.8% in February – the sharpest increase in nearly three years, according to the state statistics agency, CAPMAS.
nya: Kukwera kwa mitengo ya zakudya ndi komwe kunachititsa kukwera mitengo kwa ogula zinthu mu dziko la  Aigupto (Egypt), inakwera kufika pa  8.8 % mwezi wa Febuluwale. Kukwera kwachangu mu zaka zitatu, malinga ndi ziwerengero za nthambi ya CAPMAS.
mt0: <pad> Mtengo wa zakudya unali woyendetsa kwambiri kukwezedwa kwa ndalama za msika ku Egypt, umene unakwera ndi 8.8% mu Febuluwale – kukwezedwa kwakukulu kwa zaka zitatu, malingana ndi bungwe la boma la CAPMAS.</s>

en: Cudjoe said it was crucial for governments and regional bodies such as the African Union to build defenses to cushion consumers in times of economic uncertainty.
nya: A Cudjoe anati zinali zovuta kwa maboma  ndi madera ngati a African Union kuti apange njira zodzitetezera podzathandizira anthu ogula zinthu mu nyengo ya kusatsimikizika kwa chuma.
mt0: <pad> Cudjoe anati nkofunikira kuti maboma ndi mabungwe a chigawo monga AU akhazikitse njira zothandiza anthu kulimbana ndi ngozi zachuma.</s>

en: "Even if it means building defenses in terms of the provision of food," said Cudjoe, adding, "I could imagine Nigeria, if it had had its way, it could be selling foodstuff to most countries at reduced rates by now."
nya: Ngakhale kutamangidwa chitetezo  mu njira yopeleka chakudya," anatero a Cudjoe poonjezera, "Ndikulingalira dziko la Nigeria, linakakhala ndi njira yake bwezi likugulitsa chakudya  ku maiko ambiri motsika mtengo panopa."
mt0: <pad> "Ngakhale ngati kumanga chitetezo pa nkhani ya chakudya," adatero Cudjoe, ndikuwonjezera kuti, "Ndingathe kuganiza kuti Nigeria, ngati idali ndi mphamvu, ikanakhala ikugulitsa zakudya kwa mayiko ambiri m'mtengo wotsika kwambiri."</s>

en: "There must be that urgency of building for themselves defenses, funds that would make us sustain ourselves -- at least to prevent us from being completely annihilated by these uncertainties in the world."
nya: "Pakuyenera kukhala changu chodzimangira chitetezo, ndalama zoti zitha kutisunga-zotipewetsa kuwonongeka ku kusatsimikizidwa kwa  zinthu zochitika pa dzilo lonse.
mt0: <pad> "Pakuti anthu ayenera kukhala ndi nthawi yokhazikitsa zida za chitetezo, ndalama zomwe zimatithandiza kuti tikhale ndi moyo -- kupewa kuti tidzawonongedwe kwathunthu ndi izi zosakhala ndi choonadi mu dziko."</s>

en: Chibamba Kanyama, an economist in the Zambian capital of Lusaka, said suspending fuel taxes would be "the most ideal thing to do now under the circumstances" to cushion consumers and industries.
nya: A Chibamba kanyama, oona zachuma mu mzinda wa Lusaka ku Zambia, anati kuchotsa misonkho ya mafuta chitha kukhala chinthu choyenera kuchita panopa ndi nyengoyi poteteza anthu ogula ndi mafakitale.
mt0: <pad> Chibamba Kanyama, a katswiri wachuma ku mzinda wa Lusaka ku Zambia, adati kulephereka kwa msonkho wa mafuta "ndi chinthu chabwino chochita tsopano pansi pa zinthu" kuti anthu ndi mafakitale akhale ndi ndalama zokwanira.</s>

en: "African governments must find a way of responding," he said. 'It is a choice of whether to reduce taxes to lower the prices or to maintain the price levels and use the revenues to subsidize the most vulnerable in society."
nya: "Maiko a dera la Afilika akuyenera kupeza  njira yolowelerapo," iwo anatero.  Ali ndi chisankho chotsitsa misonkho kuti atsitse mitengo yazinthu kapena kusiya mitengo yomweyo ndi kugwiritsa ntchito ndalama za boma kuti atsitse mitengo kwa anthu ofuna chithandizo.
mt0: <pad> "Maboma a Africa ayenera kupeza njira yoyankha," adatero. 'Kodi ndi kuchepetsa msonkho kuti achepetse mitengo kapena kukhalabe ndi mitengo yabwino ndipo kugwiritsa ntchito ndalama zothandizira anthu omwe ali ndi mavuto mu dziko lapansi."</s>

en: But Kanyama also suggested that the geopolitical crisis involving Russia and Ukraine – both big grain exporters to Africa – may create opportunities for African producers.
nya: Koma a Kanyama anapereka maganizo oti zovuta za maiko zomwe zikuchitika pakati pa Russia ndi Ukraine amene ali maiko ogulitsa katundu ku Afilika, zitha kupereka mwayi ochuluka  kwa opanga zinthu zosiyanasiyana ku Afilika.
mt0: <pad> Koma Kanyama ananena kuti vuto landale la Russia ndi Ukraine – zonse ziwiri ndima exporters akuluakulu a mbewu ku Africa – lingapereke mwaŵi kwa opanga mbewu aku Africa.</s>

en: "Supply countries like South Africa, with robust and highly mechanized systems, may find a window of exporting [commodities] like wheat and other products to fill the gaps left by Russia and Ukraine," Kanyama said.
nya: Maiko ogulitsa zinthu ngati South Africa, amene ali ndi machitidwe amakina amphamvu, atha kupeza mwayi wotumiza kunja zithu ngati  tirigu, ndi zina zomwe asiya mpata a maiko a Russia ndi Ukraine," anatero a Kanyama.
mt0: <pad> "Makampani abwino ndi makina olimba, monga South Africa, akhoza kupeza mwayi wogulitsa [zinthu] monga mafuta ndi zinthu zina kuti zidzazengerere malo omwe adasiya Russia ndi Ukraine," Kanyama said.</s>

en: Kanyama also said support by the international community – for instance, in the form of debt relief for some African nations – is welcome.
nya: A kanyama anatinso thandizo lochokera ku gulu lonse la dziko lapansi mwachitsanzo ngongole kwa maiko ena aku Afilika ndilolandiridwa.
mt0: <pad> Kanyama anati kuthandiza kwa mtundu wa anthu wochokera kunja – mwachitsanzo, mwa kuchotsera msonkho kwa mayiko ena a Africa – kuli kulandira.</s>

en: He noted that the Group of 20 – which encompasses seven industrialized nations, some countries with strong or fast-growing economies, and the European Union – "is trying to offer some debt relief."
nya: Iwo anazindikira magulu makumi awiri a maiko a mafakitale ochuluka, maiko ena a chuma chochuluka msanga, ndi  Mgwirizano wa maiko a ku Ulaya, "ukuyesa kupereka thandizo la ngongole."
mt0: <pad> Iye adanena kuti Gulu la 20 - lomwe limaphatikizapo mayiko asanu ndi limodzi opanga zinthu zaluso, mayiko ena okhala ndi mabizinesi amphamvu kapena okula mwachangu, komanso European Union - "likuyesa kupereka chikhululuko cha msonkho."</s>

en: "Some other countries, such as Zambia, [are] undergoing debt restructuring processes and an IMF program, and to me, this is the only way out of the crisis," Kanyama added.
nya: Maiko ena ngati Zambia a kukonzanzo ndondomeko yawo ya ngongole ndi pologalamu ya IMF imene kwa ineyo ndi njira yokhayo yotulukira mavutowa," anatero a Kanyama.
mt0: <pad> "Madziko ena, monga Zambia, [are] undergoing debt restructuring and an IMF program, ndipo kwa ine, izi ndizo njira yokha yochokera ku vutoli," Kanyama adawonjezera.</s>

en: This story originated in VOA's English-to-Africa service, with contributions from the Zimbabwe service.
nya: Nkhani iyi idachokera ku VOA  English-to-Africa service, ndi thandizo lochokera kwa otumikira a ku  Zimbabwe.
mt0: <pad> Nkhaniyi idayamba ku VOA's English-to-Africa service, ndipo inathandizidwa ndi Zimbabwe service.</s>

en: WHO Says Africa's COVID Vaccinations Rose by 15% in February
nya: Bungwe la WHO lati Katemera wa COVID ku africa anakwera ndi anthu 15 pa anthu 100 ena alionse(15%) mu mwezi wa February
mt0: <pad> WHO Says Africa's COVID Vaccine Rates Rose by 15% in February</s>

en: The World Health Organization says Africas COVID-19 vaccinations rose by 15% between January and February, as several countries embarked on mass inoculation drives to expand coverage and protect populations from the pandemic.
nya: Bungwe la World Health Organisation lati katemera wa COVID 19 ku Africa anakwera ndi anthu 15 pa anthu 100 alionse (15%) pakati pa mwezi wa January ndi February
mt0: <pad> Msonkhano wa dziko lapansi wa zaumoyo akuti katemera wa COVID-19 ku Africa unakwera ndi 15% pakati pa Januwale ndi Febuluwale, pomwe mayiko ambiri adayamba makampeni a katemera kwa anthu ambiri kuti awonjezere chitetezo ndi kuteteza anthu ku matenda.</s>

en: Zimbabwes government says it is launching a "national vaccination blitz" targeting those who have not yet been vaccinated in a country where resistance to the shots has been an issue since the program started last year. The drive come amid government concern over rising COVID-19 cases.  Dr. Matshidiso Moeti, WHO regional director for Africa, said in a statement that the increase in COVID-19 vaccinations on the continent was driven mainly by campaigns in populous countries, including the Democratic Republic of Congo, Ethiopia, Kenya, and Nigeria.
nya: Boma la Zimbabwe likukhazikitsa ntchito yolimbikitsa katemera m'dziko lawo lonse "National vaccination blitz" yomwe cholinga chake n'cholimbikitsa omwe sanabayitse katemera m'dzikoli lomwe vuto lokana kubayitsa linali lalikulu chiyambireni ntchitoyi chaka chatha. Ntchitoyi ikulimbikitsidwa malingana ndi kukwera kwa chiwerengero cha anthu opezeka ndi kachilombo ka COVID 19. Dr. Matshidiso Moeti omwe ndi  regional director wa WHO ku Africa mu mawu ake anati kukwera kwa kubayitsa kwa katemera wa COVID-19 kunalimbikitsidwa makamaka chifukwa cha ntchito zofalitsa uthengawu mu mayiko omwe ali ndi chiwerengero cha anthu ambili kumbaphatikizirapo mayiko a Congo, Ethiopia, Kenya ndi Nigeria
mt0: <pad> M'boma la Zimbabwe, akuti likuyamba "kampeni ya dziko lonse yopewa katemera" yomwe ikuyang'ana anthu amene sanakhalepo katemera mu dziko limene kulimbana ndi katemera kwakhala kovuta kuyambira chaka chatha.</s>

en: Dr. Thierno Balde, the WHO Africa regional COVID-19 incident manager, he says the continent must remain vigilant.
nya: Dr. Thierno Balde, omwe ndi regional COVID-19 incident manager wa WHO ku Africa wati anthu a mu kontinentiyi akhalebe atcheru
mt0: <pad> Dr. Thierno Balde, woyang'anira ngozi za COVID-19 ku Africa, adati chigwachi chiyenera kukhala choyera.</s>

en: "We have seen what is happening around, in China, and the risk of also having new imitations, new variants still possible. We really need to continue to safeguard our population by taking the vaccine by not relaxing totally. The situation might change. So we really need to continue adapting some of these social measures and also to get vaccination," Balde said.
nya: "Taona zomwe zikuchitika ku China, komanso kuopsa kokhala ndi machitidwe ena ofananizidwa ndi kachilomboka, mitundu ina ya kachilomboka yomwe ili ndi kuthekera kwakupezeka
mt0: <pad> "Tikuwona zimene zikuchitika ku China, ndipo ngozi ya kukhala ndi matenda atsopano, mitundu yatsopano ikupezekabe. Tiyenera kuthandiza anthu athu kuti apitirize kulandira katemera popanda kusiyanitsa zinthu zathunthu. Ndipo tiyenera kusintha zina mwa njira zathunthu komanso kulandira katemera," adatero Balde.</s>

en: The WHO said to boost African COVID-19 vaccine acceptance, it and other organizations were supporting mass vaccination drives in at least 10 priority countries to reach 100 million people by the end of next month.
nya: WHO inati pofuna kuthandizira kuvomerezedwa kwa kamtemera wa COVID 19, ilo komanso ma bungwe ena amathandizira kubayitsa kwa namtindi wa anthu mu mayiko osankhidwa osachepera 10 ndi cholinga chofikira anthu 100 miliyoni pakutha pa mwezi wa mawa
mt0: <pad> WHO yati kuti kuwonjezera chivomerezi cha COVID-19 ku Africa, iye ndi mabungwe ena akuthandiza makampeni othandizira anthu ambiri ku 10 mayiko omwe amayamba kupereka katemera kwa anthu 100 miliyoni pofika kumapeto kwa mwezi watha.</s>

en: Nqobizitha Mangaliso Ndlovu, Zimbabwes acting information minister, said his country would not be left behind.
nya: Nqobizitha Mangaliso Ndlovu amene akugwilizira mpando wa nduna ya zofalitsa nkhani anatidziko lake silitsalira pa mbuyo
mt0: <pad> Nqobizitha Mangaliso Ndlovu, Zimbabwe's acting information minister, said his country would not be left behind.</s>

en: "Regarding the vaccination program, as of 15 March, 2022, a total of 159,628 third doses have been administered to date. The national vaccination blitz campaign will kick off on Monday, 21 March, 2022, and [the] government is urging those that have not yet been vaccinated to take advantage of this exercise to do so," Ndlovu said.
nya: "pokhadzana ndi ndondomeko ya kubaya katemera, pochokera pa 15 March 2022 kufikira tsiku la lero, anthu okwana 159, 628 analandira kubayitsa kwa chitatu kwa katemerayu. Ntchito yakubayitsa katemera mu dziko lonse wotchedwa 'National vaccination blitz' uyamba pa 21 March 2022 ndipo boma likulimbikitsa omwe sanabayitse kuti atengerepo mwayi pa ntchitoyi" anatero Ndlovu
mt0: <pad> "Pa kampeni ya katemera, pakadali pano 159,628 magawo atatu adaperekedwa mpaka pano. Kampani ya katemera yadziko lonse idzayamba pa 21 Marichi, 2022 ndipo [boma] likukulimbikitsa anthu amene sanakaperekedwe katemera kuti apeze mwai wa kutenga nawo mbali mu kampeni iyi," Ndlovu anena.</s>

en: A number of Zimbabweans have refused vaccination, saying they do not trust the mainly donated Chinese-made Sinopharm and Sinovac vaccines. The country has lately recorded a rise in new infections – now cumulatively at 244,012 with 5,418 deaths, according to the Johns Hopkins University, which is tracking the global outbreak.
nya: Mzika zambili za Zimbabwe zakana kulandira katemerayu pachifukwa chakuti iwo sakumuona bwino katemera yemwe anapatsidwa kwa iwo yemwe anapangidwa ku China, sinopharm ndi Sinova. Kutengera zotsatila zomwe zinapezedwa ndiJohns Hopkins University pakatipa, omwe akupanga namlondora wa matenda obuka pa dziko lonse, chiwelengero cha odwala mtundu wa tsopano wa COVID 19 mu dzikoli chakwera kufikira 244,012 kuphatikizira imfa za anthu 5,418.
mt0: <pad> Anthu ambiri ku Zimbabwe adakana kulandira katemera, adati sakhulupirira katemera wopangidwa ndi Sinopharm ndi Sinovac. Dziko la Zimbabwe lakhala likuwonetsera kuchuluka kwa matenda atsopano – tsopano anthu 244,012 ndipo 5,418 anamwalira, malingana ndi Johns Hopkins University, yomwe ikuyang'ana chitukuko cha dziko lonse.</s>

en: Dr. Cleophas Chimbetete, president of Zimbabwe College of Public Health Physicians, attributes that to the recent lifting of restrictive measures, such as lockdowns. He says, however, it is not time to panic, just to enforce WHO protocols, such masking and social distancing.
nya: Dr. Cleophas Chimbetete omwe ndi wamkulu wa Zimbabwe College of Public Health Physicians wati izi zili choncho kamba ka kuchotsa kwa njira zocheptsera kafalikira kwa matendawa monga kutseka kwa zipata zolowera m'dzikolo. Iye wati, komabe,sikoyenera kuti anthu akhale ndi mantha koma kulimbikitsa kutsatira njira za WHO monga kuvala zotchinga kukwama ndi kukhala motalikilana.
mt0: <pad> Dr. Cleophas Chimbetete, president of Zimbabwe College of Public Health Physicians, attributed this to the recent lifting of restrictive measures, such as lockdowns. He said, however, it is not time to panic, just to enforce WHO protocols, such masking and social distancing.</s>

en: "After relaxing measures, it is expected that cases will slightly go up. But I also think that it is too early to make any meaningful conclusions, I think it is just an opportunity for us to strengthen our preventative measures and continue highlighting to the rest of the population that COVID is still with us. The good news, though, is that severe cases have not gone up. What we need to do is to continue to get vaccinated and what is important is that the government should – as it is doing – is monitor these numbers. There is no cause for alarm or cause for us to introduce new measures," Chimbetete said.
nya: "chifukwa chakukhwefura njira zopwera, kukuyembekezedwa kuti chiwelengero cha odwala chikwera pang'ono. Koma ndikuganiza kuti sitingaphere mkota mwamsanga ngati pakali pano. Ndikuona kuti ndi mwayi wathu kuti tilimbitse njira zopewera komanso kutsindika kwa mzika zathu kuti COVID 19 tikanali naye. Komabe nkhani yabwino ndi yakuti matenda odwala kwambili sakukwera chiwerengero. Chomwe tikufunika kuchita ndi kupitiliza kulandira katemera komanso boma lipitilize kuyang'anira chiwerengero monga mowe likuchitira. Palibepo chobweretsa mantha komanso chotipangitsa kuoeza njira zina," anatero Chimbetete.
mt0: <pad> "Pakuti njira zochepetsera zinthu, zidzayembekezera kuti matenda awonjezere pang'ono. Koma ndikuganiza kuti ndizovuta kupanga chiganizo chothandiza, ndikuganiza kuti ndi mwayi kwa ife kulimbikitsa njira zathu zopewa matenda ndi kufotokozera anthu ena kuti COVID ili nafe. Zimene tiyenera kuchita ndi kukhalabe maso ndipo chimene chikufunika kwambiri ndi kukhalabe maso ndi ndalama zathu. Palibe chifukwa cha nkhawa kapena chifukwa cha kukhazikitsa njira zatsopano," Chimbetete adatero.</s>

en: Zimbabwe had a target of vaccinating at least 10 million people by the end of last year, a figure that some say was difficult to reach given the scarcity of resources and hesitance. It has yet to announce when it plans to achieve herd immunity.
nya: Boma la Zimbabwe limafuna kupeleka katemera jwa anthu osachepera 10 million pakutha kwa chaka chatha, chiwerengero chomwe ena mati n'chovuta kuchikwanilitsa potengera kusowa kwa zipangizo zofunikira komanso kuzengereza. Likuyembekezedwa kuti lilengeze chikonzero chake kuti ikwanilitse kupima kapena kusakhudzika ndi matendawa.
mt0: <pad> Zimbabawe idali ndi cholinga chochiritsa anthu oposa 10 miliyoni pofika kumapeto kwa chaka chatha, chiwerengero chomwe ena akuti chinali chovuta kukwaniritsa chifukwa cha kuchepa kwa zinthu komaso kulephera. Iye sanalengeze kuti dziko lake lidzakwaniritse katemera wa nsomba.</s>

en: Finland Crowned World's Happiest Nation for Fifth Year
nya: Finland ivekedwa kukhala dziko lokondwetsetsa kwa chaka cha chisanu pa dziko lonse la pansi
mt0: <pad> Finland Crowned World's Happiest Nation for Fifth Year</s>

en: Finland has been named the world's happiest country for the fifth year running, in an annual U.N.-sponsored index that again ranked Afghanistan as the unhappiest, followed closely by Lebanon.
nya: Finland yatchulidwa kukhara dziko lokondwetsetsa paziko lonse lapansi kwa zaka zisanu zotsogozana, Mu nsonkhano wa pachaka othandizidwa ndi UN waonetsanso kuti Afghanistan ndi dziko losakondwetsetsa pa dziko lonse lapansi motsatirana  pafupifupi ndi dziko la Lebanon.
mt0: <pad> Finland yasankhidwa kuti ndi dziko labwino kwambiri padziko lapansi kwa zaka zinayi zapitazo, mu chiwerengero cha UN-sponsored annual index yomwe idayika Afghanistan kukhala dziko labwino choposa, limodzi ndi Lebanon.</s>

en: Serbia, Bulgaria and Romania recorded the biggest boosts in wellbeing. The largest falls in the World Happiness table, released on Friday, came in Lebanon, Venezuela and Afghanistan.
nya: Serbia, Bulgaria ndi Romania awonetsa kukhara maiko omwe apititsa patsogolo kwambiri pakakhalidwe kabwino ka anthu. Kutsika kwakukulu mu mndandanda wa kukondwera, zomwe zatulutsidwa Lachisanu, wachitika ku Lebanon, Venuzuela komanso Afghanistan.
mt0: <pad> Serbia, Bulgaria ndi Romania adawona bwino kwambiri. Madziko amene adagwa kwambiri pa World Happiness Table, omwe adatulutsidwa pa Lachisanu, adali Lebanon, Venezuela ndi Afghanistan.</s>

en: Lebanon, which is facing economic meltdown, fell to second from last on the index of 146 nations, just below Zimbabwe.
nya: Lebanon yomwe ikukumana ndimavuto akuonongeka kwa zachuma, yafika pachiwiri kwa omaliza mukaundula wa maiko 146, pamusi pake pali Zimbabwe.
mt0: <pad> Lebanon, yomwe ili pafupi ndi kugwa kwachuma, yatsika kuchokera ku chiwiri kuyambira kumapeto mu index ya mayiko 146, pansi pa Zimbabwe.</s>

en: War-traumatized Afghanistan, already bottom of the table, has seen its humanitarian crisis deepen since the Taliban took power again last August.  U.N. agency UNICEF estimates one million children under five could die of hunger this winter if not aided.
nya: Afghanistan, dziko lomwe lazunzika ndi nkhondo lomwe lili kale pansi pa mndandanda, zaonekera kulowa pansi kwakukulu kwa kakhalidwe kabwino kapena thanzi la anthu awo kuchokela nthawi yomwe matalibani anatenganso ulamuliro kachikena mu August wapitayu. U.N. agency UNICEF anayelekezera kuti ana osapyora zaka zisanu okwana 1 miliyoni akanatha kufa ndi njala mnyengo yozizirayi akanapanda kuthandizidwa.
mt0: <pad> Afghanistan, yomwe yakhala yovuta ndi nkhondo, yawona kuti mavuto a chitukuko awonjezereka kuyambira pamene Taliban adatenga mphamvu mu Ogasiti. Kampani ya UN yaku UNICEF yati anthu okwana 100,000 amene ali ndi zaka 5 atha kufa ndi njala m'nyengo yozizira ngati sathandizidwa.</s>

en: "This (index) presents a stark reminder of the material and immaterial damage that war does to its many victims," co-author Jan-Emmanuel De Neve said. The World Happiness Report, now in its 10th year, is based on people's own assessment of their happiness, as well as economic and social data.
nya: Mumulingo umenewu ukuimilira kukumbutsa mmene mulungo unalili wa zipangizo komanso zomwe sizipangizo zomwe nkhondo inachita kwa okhudzidwa, co-author  Jan-Emmanuel De Neve  anatero. The World Happiness Report, pano muchaka chawo chachikhumi, ikutengera paziganizo za anthu pachimwemwe chawo, chimodzimodzi pazachuma komanso kakhalidwe kawo
mt0: <pad> "Nkhaniyi (index) imapereka chidziwitso cholimba cha ukulu wa nkhondo ndi ukulu wa zinthu zimene zimachititsa kuti anthu ambiri azivutika," adatero wolemba Jan-Emmanuel De Neve. The World Happiness Report, now in its 10th year, is based on people's own assessment of their happiness, as well as economic and social data.</s>

en: It assigns a happiness score on a scale of zero to 10, based on an average of data over a three-year period. This latest edition was completed before the Russian invasion of Ukraine.
nya: Inapeleka mulingo wachisangalalo pamulingo wa ziro mpaka 10, kutengera pa mulingo wakaundula  wa nthawi yoposa zaka zitatu,zomwe zinalembedwa zatsopanozi zinamalizidwa  dziko la Russia ndi Ukrain asana ukilane.
mt0: <pad> Ikupereka nsonga zokondwerera pa chiyambi cha zero mpaka 10, potengera ndi mlingo wa deta kwa zaka zitatu. Nsanja yatsopano inamaliza kupanga musanayambe nkhondo ya Russia ku Ukraine.</s>

en: Northern Europeans once again dominated the top spots -- with the Danes second behind the Finns, followed by the Icelandic, the Swiss and the Dutch. The United States rose three places to 16th, one ahead of Britain, while France climbed to 20th, its highest ranking yet.
nya: Anthu aku Northen europe anapambananso kachikena  pamalo apa mwamba ndi Danes achiwiri pambuyo pa Finns, motsatirana ndi Icelandic, Swiss ndi Dutch.Dziko la United States anakwera  ndi malao atatau kufika pa 16th, patsogolo ndi  mulingo umodzi kwa Britain, pamene France  inakwera kufika pa 20th, mulingo waku waukulu pakali pano.
mt0: <pad> Ndipo anthu aku Northern Europe adali kutenga malo abwino kwambiri -- ndipo Danes anali wachiwiri pambuyo pa Finns, okondedwa ndi Icelandic, Swiss ndi Dutch. United States inakula maudindo atatu kufikira 16th, kupitilira Britain, ndipo France inakula kufikira 20th, yomwe ndiyo nsonga yabwino kwambiri yadziko la France.</s>

en: As well as a personal sense of wellbeing, based on Gallup polls in each country, the happiness score takes account of GDP, social support, personal freedom and levels of corruption.
nya: Kuphatikizapo kuti ngati munthu amene zinthu zake zilibwino, kutengera maganizo a anthu mu dziko lina lililonse,  kupambana kwa chisangalaro kumatengera  kuwelengera GDP, kuthandizilidwa ndi ma ubale, ufulu wa munthu  komanso mlingo wa katangale
mt0: <pad> Ngakhale kuti anthu amadziwa, kuphatikiza pa chidziwitso chabwino kwa munthu, malingana ndi Gallup polls mu dziko lililonse, chiwerengero cha mtendere chimatenga ndalama zambiri, chithandizo cha anthu, ufulu wa munthu ndi kuchuluka kwa corruption.</s>

en: This year the authors also used data from social media to compare people's emotions before and after the Covid-19 pandemic. They found "strong increases in anxiety and sadness" in 18 countries but a fall in feelings of anger.
nya: Chaka chino, oyambitsawo anagwiritsiranso ntchito data pa tsamba la mchezo la intaneti kuti asiyanitse maimvaima a m'malingaliro mlili wa Covid usanafike komanso utafika. Iwo anapeza "kukula kwa nkhawa komanso kukhumudwa" mu mayiko 18 koma kutsika mu mkwiyo.
mt0: <pad> Mchaka chino olembawo adagwiritsanso ntchito deta za pa intaneti poyerekeza makhalidwe a anthu asanayambe ndi pambuyo pa pandemic ya Covid-19. Apeza "kuwonjezeka kwakukulu kwa nkhawa ndi chisoni" m'mayiko 18 koma kutsika kwa maganizo a ukali.</s>

en: "The lesson of the World Happiness Report over the years is that social support, generosity to one another and honesty in government are crucial for wellbeing," report co-author Jeffrey Sachs wrote.
nya: "Phunziro la uthenga opezeka mu World Hapinness Report pakudutsa kwa zaka ndilakuti kuthandiza pa maubale, kupeleka kwa wina ndi mzake komanso kuona mtima mu mboma  n'kofunika pa kukhala bwino kwa munthu." olemba nawo uthenga wa mu ripoti Jeffrey Sachs analemba.
mt0: <pad> "Chinthu chimodzi chimene chidaphunziridwa ndi lipoti la World Happiness kwa zaka zambiri ndikuti kuthandizana, kukondana ndi kukhala mwachilungamo mu boma ndizofunikira kwambiri kuti tikhale ndi moyo wabwino," analemba wolemba lipoti la World Happiness Jeffrey Sachs.</s>

en: "World leaders should take heed."
nya: "Azitsogoleri adziko akuyenera amve"
mt0: <pad> "Atsogoleri adziko lapansi ayenera kudziwa."</s>

en: The report raised some eyebrows when it first placed Finland at the top of its listings in 2018.
nya: Zotsatira  zinadzidzimutsa pomwe Finland inaikidwa pamwamba mu 2018
mt0: <pad> Nkhaniyi idakweza maso anthu ena pamene idayamba kulemba Finland pamwamba pamalo ake mu 2018.</s>

en: Many of the Nordic country's 5.5 million people describe themselves as taciturn and prone to melancholy, and admit to eyeing public displays of joyfulness with suspicion.
nya: Anthu ambili a mu chiwerengero cha 5.5 million ochokera kumayiko a Finland, Iceland ndiScandinavia anazifotoza okha kukhala osayankhurayankhura ndi osavuta kuvutika ndi kukhumudwa, komanso anavomereza kuti amayang'ana kuonetsera kwa chimwemwepagulu la anthu ndi chikaiko.
mt0: <pad> Nzika zambiri za dziko la Nordic la mamiliyoni 5.5 zimafotokoza kuti ndi zogwira ntchito komanso zokonda kukhala ndi nkhawa, ndipo amavomereza kuona maonedwe a chisangalalo cha anthu wamba ndi kukayikira.</s>

en: But the country of vast forests and lakes is also known for its well-functioning public services, ubiquitous saunas, widespread trust in authority and low levels of crime and inequality.
nya: Koma dziko la nkhalango ndi nyanja zikuluzikulu limadziwikanso ndi ntchito za boma zogwira ntchito bwino, malo osambira mthunzi opezeka paliponse, kukhulupilidwa kwa adindo ndi anthu ambilikomanso chiwerengero cha milandu ndi kuyanjanitsa kochepa.
mt0: <pad> Koma dziko la mitengo yambiri ndi nyanja limatchulidwanso chifukwa cha ntchito za boma zogwira bwino, saunas zomwe zili paliponse, chikhulupiliro chochuluka mwa anthu kwa akuluakulu komanso kuchepa kwa ndende ndi kusagwirizana.</s>
